author: Tam
body: Didn't work on fine lines or any wrinkles at all. I'm 56. Healthy. Eat great. Been using Clinique since my late 20s.  This is the second wrinkle formula I've tried.  Sidebar:  Don't use AtterPay. Not with Clinique. Located in the Netherlands overcharged my card. They have No US number.

author: JAC39
body: I can notice a huge difference when I use this serum. My skin is smoother and I have a healthy glow. I can tell the difference if I don't use it for a few days. It has never bothered my sensitive skin.

author: lisha
body: tightens skin and lifts facial lines

author: Rudy T.
body: I don't know why Clinique discontinued the Clinique Repairwear Laser Focus Serum. I used this product for 3 months and it's the only serum since can use. It approved my skin and many people asked me what product I use. I cannot use Retinol A and vitamin C based products. Clinique should have kept this product and if they wanted to add a new serum for those who can tolerate Retinol and Vitamin C, go ahead. But at least think about all those who have sensitive skin.

author: Sway
body: Really helped my skin with plumping up after continuous 8 week use

author: TVB17
header: Makes my skin turn beet red and gets irritated.
body: Why oh why did Clinique discontinue the previous Smart Customer Repair Serum? That worked just beautifully on my sensitive skin and combined w/ the smart line of moisturizers, I had my skin care routine down. The addition of Retinol A did it for me. My skin is way too sensitive for this ingredient and now, I am left w/out a serum option from Clinique. I don't want to try another product by a different vendor because Clinique's products are made to work well together, so now I don't know what I am going to do. I just hate it when Clinique discontinues a product and offers a sub-par new product in its place. This seems to be more and more common w/ Clinique now-a-days, and it gets so frustrating. Why on  earth would you add such an ingredient knowing that so  many people cannot use a product that has Retinol A in it and not provide an option w/out Retinol A? Ever heard of user acceptance testing before you discontinue one product for another?

author: Wendie
body: This  made my skin peel. I couldnt wear my foundation.

author: Roxann13
body: I'm so excited to try this!! I put the first on as soon as I washed my face and opened the box and it is so creamy with a very light scent. I'll check back with an update and picture's to show how well it works in a few weeks

author: eki
body: After use it a few weeks, I really love this product, I used it everynight after cleaning and toner.  It made my face look shiny and healthy.  I will keep to use it.

author: Kiki
body: I like this serum very much. It works so well that I feel my skin is getting better after using it.

author: Cece1029
header: Makes my skin glow and looks great!
body: I used the previous serum and really like it. So I was not sure about this new serum with the retinol. I finally decided to give it a shot and boy was I shocked. The results that I got were amazing. My skin had a glow and I could go without makeup if i wanted to. I had several people tell me my skin looks great. This is by far the best serum I have ever used. Very happy with it!!

author: Cathyb
body: Works wonders on my 62 year old skin.  Does not irritate or make my skin itch.  Makes my skin glow and my pores disappear. I always worry about supply issues so I always have an extra bottle!

author: Peachy
header: Great anti wrinkle cream! Non irritating!
body: My love affair with  Clinique started  in my 20's. It was a love and hate relationship. I would veer away and try something else as other products kept evolving and popping up. But I always found my way back to my one true love in skin care, i have used other anti wrinkle cream more expensive ones andI I found my skin itchy and all the time with redness. This Clinique  Smart Clinical Repair  Wrinkle Correcting Serum  ( the entire line ) is actually the best one for sensitive skin yet effective with visible results. I have stocked up that will last me for for a year or so. This is how much I love this product. My o my complaint is how I wish these products are sealed to ensure integrity of the product. I would buy online and receive bottles that are either half full of or 3/4 full never really a full bottle. So at time I would prefer purchasing from a physical boutique so I could check first. Otherwise product works great on my skin!

author: GeeGee
header: Clean up...aisles chin, nose and forehead!!!
body: I was gifted forty years of good skin...when I hit that forty year mark, all changed!  I knew nothing of SOPs for dealing w problematic skin.  My pores quadrupled in size, filling up with whatever gunk they could find!  Terrible!  I tried many different products, most being too thick and immediately causing pimples; some too thin, leaving no benefits and only dry skin.  Clinique was lovingly recommended and I, begrudgingly, ordered this serum.  How fortunate I feel that I not only found a good serum that fulfills all promises but a whole line of skin care.  This serum is great and the skin care line has changed my life.  It's been like putting a shammy on my face that absorbs all crud.  This has been an amazing experience...after washing, I use the #2 astringent before I apply the serum.  After serum, I apply the broad spectrum moisturizer with sunscreen, and then I'm ready to go!  Since I began this twice-daily routine about four months ago, I've seen no heads, black or white, and overall, my skin has improved dramatically.  It's like this serum does it all, it's amazing!!  Thank you clinique for making this old lady feel good about the skin she's in again!!!

author: Karmon
header: Clinique does it again! Amazing Product
body: This product went on easy and had no off putting smell and made my face feel marvelous. I always love Clinique products and have purchased many! I will be adding this product to my anti-aging skin care regime.  5 stars!!!

author: Julie
body: I have been impressed with this product, I have seen a difference after using it for a few weeks.

author: booboo
body: I used this product each night and with moisturizer. My skin is softer and smoother. Wrinkles around my mouth are reduced.

author: moshangmomo
body: I bought it for my friend and she loves it, brightens the complexion

author: christina.s
body: This is the second product from Clinique I have felt let down by. I was lucky enough to receive a refund for previous product due to being sold a bad batch therefore wanted to try another product from them. I chose this one and after using it once, my skin was red, inflamed and I broke out. Sometimes this is normal when using a retinol product (would have been nice if the percentage was disclosed so I knew the potency before purchasing...the highest I have gone so far is 0.25% therefore if it is closer to 1% people should know before taking the risk of a reaction) I started by using it once a week and every time after the reaction would get worse. I had full body hives and needed to take allergy medicine for it to go away. Now I don't know what to do with it but I certainly cannot use it anymore.

author: Lisha
body: Apply slippery, non-greasy

author: Donna
body: I have used Clinique products since 1997 and this serum is one of my favorites, light weight, not greasy, softens wrinkles and lines, feels wonderful on the skin.

author: Kathy
body: I have given up on Clinique products this is the only anti aging serum they offer and it has retinol A which is very irritating and drying. I did not know this had retinol A so I tried it and it was very irritating.   I tried this because you discontinued even clinical better I tried the replacement and for this the interrupter and had rash for over a week.  Went to Clinique counter  explaned what happened and hey gave me a sample of this and same thing I broke out.  The only serum I have not tried and I won't try because you are discontinuing is Repairwear laser focus.   I have been using Clinique products for over 20 years sad to say they are now very irritating and so I m going to have to try another brand as you don't offer non irritating products anymore.

author: Jone
header: It brightens my skin and I love it so much!
body: It brightens my skin and I love it so much!

author: Sandy
body: I just finished a 30ml bottle.  This serum is amazing.  My pores look smaller, the blackhead on my nose is almost all disappeared. My skin feels so soft and smooth.  I love this serum, and just ordered a 50 ml bottle.

author: Steph
body: I use this very sparingly, on my forehead and around my eyes.  I could tell a difference in the appearance of my lines within a few days of using it regularly.  Very hydrating but not greasy.  I loved the old smart serum, but this is even better.

author: Lorraine
body: I used this serum on my husband for 2 weeks once before bedtime. The before and after pics are astonishing...I highly recommend this product! It actually works really well.

author: JM
body: Got this as a sample with my purchase. Love the texture and how smooth it makes my skin feel.

author: Cindy
body: it's my first time to purchase this product, not bad...

author: Mary 73
body: Is my first time using this products and my skin look beautiful

author: VSD
body: VERRRRRRRRY USEFUL!!

author: xiaoyujie
body: I bought this product after the introduction of my friend, and I am using it now. I like it very much

author: aiden
body: makes me yonger!

author: Sophie
body: Good to use

author: Asonca
body: I like the feel of it and hope it helps my skin

author: ANNA
body: A very easy-to-use product. My skin is very sensitive, but it won't be allergic at all. Very comfortable to use

author: Vicky
body: I really like it and will buy it again.

author: Linda
body: This product is very good and makes my skin smoother and brighter. I will keep using it.

author: Coco
body:
good product like it  
i will recommend it to my friends

author: Ann
body: Recommend it

author: Sharon
body: It fits my skin well

author: lili
body: It doesn't have to be tolerated, it's mild, it's softer and firmer than it used to be,

author: Bo
body: I tried the free travel size gift last year, then I use it every day. It makes my skin healthy.

author: hanxixi
body: New product, buy it and try it! Hope it works against age!

author: Disappointed Clinique junky
body: I have used Smart Custom Repair Serum for years and loved it.  If this is the replacement for that product, it is a massive failure.  It is definitely not rich and nourishing nor does it do anything for a mature neck and minimal changes on facial lines.  Very disappointing.  Please bring back Smart Custom-Repair Serum.

author: Anet
body: Bought for my mother and the result is very nice. Now her skin has less wrinkle!!

author: Jude
body: This combination is very good, the emulsion effect is very good, does not stimulate not greasy, recommends everybody to use.

author: Jackie
body: good

author: Bri_Sunfl0wer
body: I got this as a sample and was super excited to try. To be fair I do not have many wrinkles. But I did notice my skin began to glow more. It definitely got some of it's youthful vigor back, and my skin is no longer dull and flat. I didn't expect huge results being I am still a younger age. But if anything I feel it's certainly a great preventative measure and really boosts the radiance of my skin.

author: Calibee
body: AMAZING

author: Cai
header: Oil free, but not for a young skin
body: It feels like there's a lot of silicon in it. That's fine since I get used to it. But I can't feel the effect - maybe because it's for someone over 40? I'll ask my mom to have a try later.

author: Lauren93
header: Makes my skin glow and feels great
body: Makes skin more youthful and even toned. Also my skin feels smoother

author: Anna
body: I like this product. After using it for several weeks, I feel my face has less wrinkle. It works !

author: TD
body: This stuff is amazing! Been using it for about 3 weeks now, and my skin has never looked better. I'm already seeing reduced wrinkles, more hydrated skin, and a much more uniform complexion!

author: Mat
body: I have been using couple of months, looks it's working.

author: lisa
body: I have only used it in travel size, but after a few uses I fell in love with it. It leaves my skin moisturised and comfortable and keeps my skin smooth. Even though I have sensitive skin, it is very gentle and not irritating at all.

author: Niche
body: I've used this product for about 3 weeks and I've noticed a significant difference in my forehead lines and the line between my brows from frowning. My forehead lines are less noticeable and my frown line is nearly gone and most important it didn't make my skin oily and breakout which I'm prone to.

author: Kmn68
body: I'm glad to see Clinique putting their own spin on retinol. It's truly a miracle ingredient and I like that Clinique has found a way to put it in a gentle serum and not a tub of moisturizer that you have to put your fingers in. Since starting this product, I have seen some smoothing in the forehead but it has also cleared my skin in certain areas. I use a CPAP at night and I was breaking out along the mask area. The smart serum has really helped all the imperfections, not just age related ones.

author: Gia67
body: I have been using this product for several months without any problems.  There is a noticeable change in the wrinkles.  I have friends and family commenting on the smoothness of my face.  Thank you Clinique.

author: Ses
body: I hate to give negative reviews but this particular product deserves one.  It is not inexpensive, especially on a fixed income but I noticed ZERO results.  I have faithfully used as instructed for a couple of months now and there is no change to the signs of aging (small wrinkles) at all.  I wanted to give it a great chance, but every time I use it I wonder why I even bother!  It's just not working for me.  I wish I could be refunded since I tried faithfully to use this, and at this point I am not sure I'm even entitled to a refund or a credit.  Sorry, Clinique- your DDML is wonderful, but this product would receive no stars if I had that option.

author: Lucy
body: You can see the difference after use

author: Lin
body: Irritate my skin!! Please bring back the old one!!

author: Lindsey
header: Not a replacement for discontinued product
body: For years I used the Clinique Custom Repair Smart Serum and LOVED everything about it. Overall made my skin look smooth, fresh and vibrant. This serum is sold in its place, and is fine but pails in comparison. If you've never used the discontinued product then you have nothing to compare it to, but even on its own it does nothing wonderful for my skin. Not worth the money. Bring back Custom Repair Smart Serum Clinique!!!

author: Amanda
header: Even better than the old formula
body: I love this product. I was so upset when the old clinique smart serum was replaced with this...but then I tried this one and am thrilled with the results. I have VERY sensitive skin and still get breakouts even though I'm in my mid 30s. This product has never irritated by skin or caused breakouts. I noticed other reviewers mentioned when they started using the product, it made their dead surface skin peel off. This happened to me too and I started incorporating the clinique seven day scrub into my routine and that got rid of the dead skin. I use this serum and the Clinique Smart night time cream and my skin is truly better now than it has ever been.

author: ML
header: Feeling like a snake that shed its skin
body: So one week after using this product I noticed I had an itch, not a big deal but by the end of the day I was questioning it so I got out my magnifying glass. Yep there it was a whole bunch of flakes, yes I know it sounds gross but it really isn't. Off to do my Clinique facial routing and added a scrub this time the newest one with the bamboo in it for exfoliation. WOW! Like brand new baby skin, so I quickly put on nice moisturizers and Moisture surge to help keep the dry winter from making me dry and I feel wonderful and excited. Every time I pass a mirror I peek at myself. Yes that is really me, now many of you might think this is a bit over kill but I have to tell you that I have been using Clinique skin care products for 45 years, and no matter what there is age on your face, but no one believes I am a senior citizen. Even with a great product your company always does even more.

author: Judi
body: I had been using the original Clinique Smart serum for years with amazing results. It left my skin smooth and radiant and my skin drank it up.This new recipe made my face peel like I had a sunburn. After three days I stopped . What a huge waste of money. Unless you bring back the original formula I will have to try another companies serum.

author: Gabby3000
body: This serum has a cream like texture that is different from other serums I have used in the past. But it still packs a punch when you apply it. It's lightweight, non-greasy and absorbs into the skin fast. It does have scent but is so light that it barely registers. I received a small sample so cannot comment on this product long term (ie wrinkle repair/ filling). However, it hydrates beautifully and gives the skin somewhat of a "glow". I enjoyed using this product and feel like it will work well for all skin types.

author: Liz47
header: Made my skin firmer and glow
body: I don't understand the bad reviews on this serum I love it made my skin firm and young looking no one believes my age I been using these products since in m late twenties now I'm 47 still look in my 30s this serum dint cause me no allergic reaction of no type love you clinique! Keep making your magic products ❤️

author: DCast5887
body: Like many others mentioned, I loved the original Smart Serum!  Then Clinique discontinued it (should've kept it as an alternative for those with a sensitivity to retinol!).  They added Retinol to this serum because it is considered the "gold standard" of anti-aging.  So I understand why they did it… but for those who have sensitive skin - you need to start using this SLOWLY.  I started using this once a week at night for a month, then twice a week for a month, etc.  It's a long process but so worth it!  Now I'm using it every day in the AM and PM.  I love it! My skin has never looked better!  My hubby tells me every day that I look better every day with age!!

author: Sherri
header: Made my skin peel & look sunburned
body: I can't even give this product 1 star. I was told Clinique smart custom repair serum which I have used when it 1st came out was discontinued but the smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum was amazing & you won't believe the difference. The 1st day I put it on in the morning & in the afternoon I was washing my hands, looked in the mirror & wondered what was on my face & realized it was skin peeling. Second morning I used it again & in the afternoon noticed the other side of my face was peeling, looked up the product & saw others experiencing the same. Next morning my face looked badly sunburned & stopped using. I have been using Clinique for over 40 years & would like to know if Clinique is going to bring back the custom repair serum asap? I guess I will have to start researching a new skincare company 😢

author: sdk2fm
body: My skin showed improvement after a month of use. I used Olay retinol night cream before testing this product so I have to switch to a non-retinol night cream while testing this. Overall well made product but the instructions asked to limit sun exposure while using really is not practical at all. I suggest clinique improve on this as sun exposure is a fact of life but I can apply day moisturizer with SPF protection.

author: Sara715
header: No comparison to the smart serum
body: I loved the Smart serum so much. I ran out and went to order more and it wasn't available. Only this was so I ordered this instead. It isn't as moisturizing and makes lines more noticeable. How is that possible with a wrinkle serum. Also it caused breakouts that I'm not usually prone too. I'm very disappointed in this product, and will not be repurchasing. Please bring back the smart serum it was wonderful!

author: Mini
body: Previous serum was good. I did not see much of difference.

author: GP
header: Please bring back the previous Smart Serum!
body: This new serum is hard on my skin, very drying and irritating.  I'm assuming it is from the addition of the retinol.  I loved the previous serum.  Couldn't we have a choice?  Right now I've had to discontinue using the new serum and am trying other brands.  Please bring back the old formula as an option!

author: Jay
body: peeling, breakout, dry skin. Horrible!!! Old former was good, now I had to changes my whole skin care.

author: Stasymipip
body: Iâ€™ve been using this product for several weeks now and Iâ€™ve noticed that wrinkles around my eyes are less noticeable. The skin is firmer. The product is easy to apply and it feels good on my face.

author: JCat
body: I've used Clinique products since I was 16, I'm now in my 60's.  I've "upped" my various skin care as I've gotten older and since I loved the Custom Repair Serum, (and can't find it through Clinique any longer), I decided to try this new Clinical Repair Serum.  First, it has a very medicinal smell to it. Clinique products don't have fragrance, which is one thing I love about them. This serum did just the opposite of what I expected.  Not only was it drying, after two uses I ended up with several small dry patches, (red and painful), on my face.  Why yet again, do you take a wonderful product like the Custom Repair Serum and "improve" it with an even more expensive product that not only doesn't work, but is actually harmful.   I plan on finding my receipt and returning it.  Very disappointed.

author: Stacy
header: Makes my skin not only smooth but glow!
body: I'm so incredibly impressed with your amazing formula. Bravo, Clinique, my skin has been smooth and glowing since day one. There has been absolutely no peeling or burning at all. I have told my friends about your amazing product and Ihave heard nothing but glowing reviews. Thank you for making such a fantastic product! I will continue to use this for as long as it is available!

author: Sam85
body: I wasn't sure that a small sample would make any difference on my face since there wasn't really all that much to use to begin with. So I took a picture on the first day and then a day later and my face instantly looked so much better. I can just imagine what the long term benefits will look like. Very impressed.

author: Labmom1974
header: No replacement for previous Smart serum
body: I loved the original Smart serum and used it for years. That, combined with daily use of SPF has done a lot to keep my skin in good shape. This one is drying, irritating and actually makes some lines more noticeable. Please bring back the original!

author: Heather B
body: As many other reviews, I have been a long time user of Clinique but was down to only using the Smart Serum because everything I used to buy all got discontinued and replaced with much worse replacements, including this. Since the Smart Serum has been replaced, I am now forced to take the last of my business elsewhere. I refuse to try this because I've been fooled too many times trying to like everything else that Clinique replaces just to be extremely disappointed. Instead of wasting my money on C. R. A. P., I'll just buy something elsewhere because I'm done with Clinique. Don't bother with your dumb response to this review "... discontinued favorites are not done impulsively or without a great deal of research..." as I've gotten it many times. Products get discontinued because you can make worse products cheaper and charge more for the so-called new and improved. Ughhhh.

author: Zeb
body: I purchase this for my mom and she loves it. It makes her face glow. This is a perfect serum to powerfully fight the look of multiple signs of aging.

author: Nanna Kitty
body: I like this serum. It doesn't leave any greasy feeling on my face. It works gradually and my fave felt soft while using it

author: Clinique
body: I tried this as a sample and it has a very light (nice) scent to it. What I like about the product description is the recycling part. I am noticing that when I finish my Clinique products, these packaging bottles/plastic jars are good quality plastics but I don't have anyway of reusing them (it's not as if these packaging is like strawberry jam jars that can be used) so I sort these out as plastic but I thought they could be recycled & re-used. **Personally I wouldn't mind if Clinique used the recycled packaging.**

author: Laice
location: The state of New York, New York
body: With a small kind, very suitable for my skin, and I ran out of the essence in this paragraph

author: Kate07
body: I really enjoyed this product. It didn't feel greasy on my face and left it feeling refreshed. I didn't have enough product to notice a big difference but I did notice a little big. I'm going to buy and see if it works well overtime.

author: Dawn76
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair serum left skins feeling amazing!

author: Doreen
body: I thought think 2 weeks is enough to see dramatic changes in wrinkles but the product was nice, left my face soft, did not irritate.

author: Jessica666
header: Smooth texture when applied on skin.
body: The correcting serum was very easy to apply. Takes a couple of days to achieve results.

author: Gymnastics50
body: I used this product as directed for 25 days. I applied Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum on my forehead and lines around my mouth. This product did not remove any lines, however it did seem to maybe tighten the lines on my forehead. It gave the appearance that the lines were less noticeable. The serum did not make any difference to the lines around my mouth. Overall I would buy this serum again as it did make my skin feel soft.

author: Lookingyoung
body: Left me feeling younger than with most other creams

author: Pisce
body: After receiving my free sample, I immediately wanted to try it! It's lightly scented, and non greasy. My skin felt so silky after applying. Although my sample was small, I didn't see any results with my fine lines.

author: Momma B
body: I found the product dried my face. I had to get up to wash and put just night cream on.

author: 19-Jun
body: Very smooth product to apply with a pleasant scent.

author: lindy 123
body: i really liked this product. this product blends in nicely and doesnt feel greasy.

author: MissC
body: Personally I loved this serum, it gives me a glow without irritating my skin whatsoever. I find that it does help with my wrinkles quite a bit as well as my laugh lines, forehead lines and neck lines have diminished since I started using this. It's quite plumping and I have been getting compliments on my skin. Seems to be great for crows feet too. I have already told my friends to try it! This makes my skin happy, I recommend it.

author: MelC1
body: After two weeks of using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle correcting Serum, I was able to see a reduction in fine lines and wrinkles. My skin was overall more hydrated, plumper and looks great even without make up. The serum makes my skin look smooth and healthy. Make up on top looks even more flawless. Exceptionally impressed with the results and have purchased more to continue the great results seen after only two weeks!

author: JustJulia
body: I liked how it made my skin brighter, and my fine wrinkles less noticeable. I even felt it firmed my skin! My jaw line appears firmer which is something thatâ€™s been bothering me. Highly recommend this!

author: Rosie
body: Perhaps I had set my standards too high; however, I have not seen a significant difference to really notice a difference. If anything, my under eye area may have seen a very minimal change.

author: Tester
body: I like the texture and how my skin felt after applying the serum but have not noticed any wrinkle repair

author: Nbbratt
body: This serum was very nice. I noticed a few different things. First is all, after 1 week there was a definite improvement in the softness and elasticity of my skin. My skin also feels more hydrated and appears smoother. There was minimal results as far as fine lines go but this may come with longer use of the product. Overall my skin looks healthier and brighter and I am happy with the results of this serum and would definitely purchase it.

author: eagleswing
body: This is a clean and fresh product to apply to face, results noticeable, and I am happy with results.

author: Paulina
body: I really enjoyed the serum. It goes on the skin very nice and I love the smell. It has a great texture. It left my skin moisturized and was great under my daily moisturizer. I will definitely continue to use it.

author: Nay11
body: I tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a little over two weeks and I am honestly impressed! Within the first two days of using this product I saw a minor change to my skin. The general skin texture looked smoother and my skin felt softer. With two weeks of use my skin looks much smoother and even. The serum itself is a good consistency. Itâ€™s not sticky at all and just melts into your skin. I would definitely buy this product!

author: AdrienneJ
body: I loved the feel of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. It was silky without heavy a greasy feeling. Unfortunately I found it tended to dry my skin out a bit. Great product, just not for me.

author: LaurA
body: This is a nice feeling product. Glides on smooth, absorbs well. I didn't notice any difference in wrinkles, but my skin felt nice after using it. Maybe using it for a longer time might produce a better result.

author: leighttl
body: Love it. I love anything made by Clinique anyway so this didn't disapoint

author: Edddie
body: This is a popular clinique product. I always wanted to try. I love the texture and it easily absorbs. I does make my skin feel better.

author: Lisa R.
body: I like the serum. The consistency is nice - feels good on a skin. Great as a part of a skin care routine. I did not notice any visible effects yet, but maybe I just need more time.

author: Manu84
body: I believe it is a great product and with enough time of using it, you would notice a difference.

author: Margie
body: I liked this product it felt nice in my skin and didnâ€™t feel like there was any residue once it soaked in which happened quickly. I would buy this product for sure.

author: Marfabul
body: The Clinique Smart Serum proved to be exactly as it claimed. Fine lines started to smooth after 2 weeks. As always the Clinique brand of products are of quality of many other brand that are 3x the price. I am very satified with the results and will recommend to my friends!

author: Emilie
body: Am happy with using this serum so far, after 2 weeks. But I believe that to get the full scope of the product's benefits, one needs to use for 4 weeks. I will buy the product and do so myself because I have liked it at this point.

author: winnie88
body: I've been using this for the past month or so, mostly on my forehead where I have some fine lines and closed comedones. I haven't noticed any difference in texture or appearance of my skin. The serum isn't bad though, no smell or irritation. I would not purchase based on this testing period because of how expensive it is, but I still have some left so I'll keep testing that.

author: Sk104
body: I tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a few weeks and have noticed noticable results. My skin looks a d feels smoother, plump, and refreshed. You only need a tiny bit of product to see results.

author: Karinespace
body: It seems like a good product. I applied it before a light moisturizer, it applies really well on the skin and you don't need a lot of moisturizer. Skin feels hydrated with it. I think my skin looks smoother with use, and some little wrinkles are less evident. Nothing major, but it helped to make my skin look younger. Would probably buy.

author: Momma
body: I received a very small sample size of the product. It was used up prior to two weeks. I did not see much of a difference within a week of using it. The product felt lovely going on thoigh

author: Denise6789
body: I think the branding of it as a correcting serum may be misleading. I do feel it hydrates and reduced some fine lines, however it was minor. Depending on the market price, there may be more effective alternative solutions

author: PK269
body: I did not notice a significant improvement in my skin texture, however it was not stripping/drying like some retinols are.

author: Mommaoffour75
body: I loved this so much I went and bought the product right away!

author: Yeg_girl
header: Hydrates skin in the dry months
body: This serum helped my dry skin immensely. It was flaky before but this restored itâ€™s natural barrier. It however didnâ€™t help much with my fine lines.

author: Agnes70
body: Overall I thought the product was great! The serum is very light and glides on smooth. After two weeks of using the product I could see the lines diminish on my forehead and around my eyes. I would recommend to my friends.

author: JahLovin
body: This serum smells good and is easy to apply; a little but goes a long way. But I did not notice any difference in skin tightness nor in the appearance of fine lines while using this serum.

author: Stoff
body: I didn't want to review this item, but the emails were unrelenting and included threats. I was possibly allergic to this product, redness. There was no option to not review, my emails went unanswered.

author: KM1182
header: Didnt see much of a difference
body: Didnt see much of a difference however I think using for a longer time may have had a more noticeable result.

author: HYJENIST
body: Need only a tiny bit and it goes a long way. Not greasy or sticky. Goes on smooth and soaks in. Makes fine lines minimize.

author: Karen
body: I was super excited to try the product . I followed the directions applied 2X a day am and pm faithfully and got zero results . I was extremely disappointed.

author: sunnyc78
body: Clinique smart is a nice lightweight serum. I used it both night and day. I always loved my morning results, my skin always looked fresh and rejuvenated. I love that this serum includes retinoids and hyaluronic. This is a product I would consider buying in the future.

author: Nessie28
header: Left my face smooth and soft
body: It left my face feeling smooth and soft. There was a reduction in wrinkles and how they looked.

author: Catlap
body: I really liked this product. It smelled good and was easy to use. I did notice a change in my skins texture. My skin was softer and a little more fuller.

author: Anne88
body: This serum from Clinique is fantastic and I recommend it to anyone who uses an anti-aging serum. The skin looks plumper and there is a noticable difference in texture. It makes your skin much much softer. I really enjoyed using this and it has become one of my favourite serums! I definitely suggest everyone give this serum a try!

author: Sue56
body: Quickly absorbed, skin is smoother, would love to use it longerâ€¦

author: chicosmom
body: Product dried skin out. I used for the full 2 weeks as instructed but found no improvement in my skin after trial. I did notice that skin appeared to be drier and dull. Since I use Clinique product, I was very disappointed that this did not live up to my expectations. I have normal skin type so was surprised it made my skin so dry. I would not purchase again.

author: Sarah
body: This serum was easy to use and nice on the skin. There was not a noticeable change in any wrinkles but did notice a "tightening" feeling of skin after using it for a few weeks. I would try it for a longer term and see if it continued to tighten skin and work on wrinkles.

author: Helgs
body: really enjoy how it was on my skin, didnt feel oily and sticky. Felt like it minimized my wrinkles around my eyes area which really help defines my big eyes a little bit more.

author: Maria J
body: Found this product left my face feeling fresh, scent is delightful and it not greasy.

author: Amandala
header: Great addition to night skin routine
body: I was excited to try this serum as it has useful ingredients to brighten skin and reduce signs of aging. I like that it includes vitamin C which is a natural and effective skin brightener. The serum itself is slightly viscous so easy to evenly apply. After using the serum for 2 weeks I noticed an overall more even and bright complexion. Fine lines around my eyes have also been reduced. Thanks for providing me a sample. I have already purchased the full size now.

author: pjyammers
body: This product definitely makes your skin feel soft and powdery as soon as you put it on. I used it for 2 weeks but didn't see a big difference in my skin. Any fine lines I have are around the eye area and it says to not use it there so I used it just below and between.

author: Hylissa
body: Product was very runny. Would have liked it to be more creamy. It did moisturize pretty well, but didn't notice any results in wrinkles.

author: Amber
body: Goes on so smooth and repairs the wrinkles by diminishing their appearance. With any Clinique produce I can always be guaranteed that I wonâ€™t have a breakout or be allergic to it. Itâ€™s comforting to know that my skin always looks great, feels great when using Clinique. This serum goes on so smooth while repairing my wrinkles.

author: Tinyw
header: Wrinkles. The product I tried was good
body: I found the product went on very smoothly. My face felt refreshing

author: Sharonde
body: Non oily product that reduces under eye bags and redness

author: CristalP
body: I really enjoyed using the sample product and really liked the results I received!! However the sample was a little small to get a really good feel for the product!! When I used it I immediately noticed my skin felt tighter!! After a few uses it seemed my fine lines were less noticeable.

author: Amanda
body: Nice feeling but did not find any difference in wrinkles. Couldnâ€™t layer though as it would peel off with other products.

author: Beejer
body: I used it for a week and I found the fine lines getting smoother â€¦ felt really nice on my skin my skin looks healthier

author: Mamallama
body: I feel like I didn't use this long enough to really notice the benefits, but I would definitely like to use it! It went on smoothly and didn't leave my face tacky or any weird film. I only had a few days worth and I don't think that was enough time to fully see the benefits, but my skin felt lovely and I definitely feel this would make the desired difference over time.

author: Paisleyrose
body: After trying the Clinique Samrt Repair, I did not see any difference. I did however like the smell and would like to have had a longer time to try the product, and see if there were longer timed results.

author: Trisha42
body: It was okay, I think I saw a difference but family didnâ€™t

author: Mommamsd
body: I really enjoyed testing this product. I really liked that a little went a long way. It was nice to put on my face. It went on smoothly and left no residue behind. I would have liked to try it longer to see if it would give even better results then I got just trying out a sample size. I think it did a great job smoothing out my fine lines and wrinkles. I would buy this product again.

author: Sasha88
body: I really enjoyed this product went on very nicely not greasy feeling. Would definitely buy this product to see how much it could do for me. Saw a different with the short time of using it.

author: MommaJ
body: I love how smooth my face felt after applying the Clinique serum. It absorbed nicely and didn't leave it sticky or greasy

author: Roses

It's hard to tell if it helps with wrinkle correcting with a sample, but I like the innovative formula, and I did notice that my skin looked more hydrated and nourished when I use this!

author: SLS#1
body: This is a great serum for repair of fine wrinkles. It seemed to fit in well with my morning routine. The serum went on quickly and provided a great base to add moisturizer. I have already purchased the product and a couple of others from Clinique

author: smnthac
body: I don't currently have any wrinkles, so I wasn't able to see much of a difference when using this product.

author: Runningmom
header: I can't get enough of serums
body: I used the serum for week and I'm quite impressed by the results. It left my skin glowing and hydrated. I did not have any adverse reactions or breakouts during my trial. I'm a big fan of serums and how easy and nice it glides on my skin while applying. I like that it is odorless and it has hyaluronic acid which I have heard very positive comments. I am interested in buying this product to keep seeing more improvement to my skin.

author: Daria
body: It's a fantastic serum that has become a staple in my skincare routine. I use it day and night. It layers great under makeup and other skin care products. The retinol is gentle yet very effective. My skin has never been more radiant!

author: Santina12
body: Skin softer and smoother. Feels good on the skin.

author: LCN15
body: I love how this serum feels so silky when I apply it on my skin. It is easily absorbed and doesnâ€™t have a strong smell which is perfect for me. Makes my skin feels so smooth and hydrated all day long!

author: Airy12
body: I do like the Clinique wrinkle cream but think that I would be must better if I used it more, for example I used the product over a period of time instead of just trying a small sample of it.

author: Mollybobs
body: It works good so far. No harsh smells. Not greasy to the touch. Goes go pretty good.

author: Anita12
body: Thank-you for the opportunity to try this product. This product came without directions on exactly how to use it. The directions basically stated to limit sun exposure. The product, however, is simple to apply. I could feel a little sensation when I put it on and it seemed to plump up fine lines a little. I would recommend trying this product on a very small area first before covering a larger area to see how the skin reacts to the serum.

author: Vika1451

I did find that applying it 1-3 times a week for 2 weeks was not enough time to notice any results on my fine lines but I would definitely like to incorporate this serum into my skincare routine as I have heard great things about it.

author: Kimmy
body: I wasn't that impressed with it . It was a good moisturizer. But it didn't do anything for wrinkles.

author: Ruvikazz
body: My skin felt so smooth and soft. It really keeps the skin hydrated and absorbs quickly. Totally worth it!

author: FraFra
body: This should get 5 stars alone for how smooth it instantly makes your skin upon application! I would buy this JUST because of that! I love the texture of this, itâ€™s a nice gel-like texture, not too runny/watery and not a cream. Itâ€™s not greasy or sticky and melts right into the skin. The immediate effects are SMOOTH and SOFT skin so I tried using this in AM to prep my skin for a flawless makeup look and it did not pill. When used in the PM, I woke up with my skin looking more rested than usual despite how many hours I slept. I have this wrinkle that bothers me so much that I obsess over and it looked more relaxed. I stopped using all other serums in my skincare to give this a fair and honest review. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because I would have loved to have longer time with more product to truly test the results on the wrinkle. I will purchase this now after trying it!! Overall: Wrinkles appeared to be more relaxed. Super smooth and super soft skin!

author: Wrinkles123
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum was very easy to apply, absorbed in my skin quite quickly. Did not leave a greased residue just soft and refreshing skin. I honestly think that a couple weeks are not long enough to truly try a product. I would love to try it for a longer time. But I did like it!

author: Kayleigh
body: Very nice and smooth serum. Will most likely buy full size bottle. Seemed to work very nicely and would like to continue to use.

author: Mamac
body: I found clinique serum to be underwhelming and to not actually do anything for my wrinkles or fine lines so I found the product unsuccessful

author: Sj381
body: I tried this product for 2.5 weeks. I found little to no change in appearance. I found it sticky in texture, and smell seemed off. Donâ€™t feel I will be purchasing in the future.

author: Ccoco
body: Loved that this product left my face feeling soft, but canâ€™t say that I saw a big difference.

author: Shelly b
body: Great product but I can't say if I noticed too much of a difference in my skin by the type I finished the sample. Perhaps I was using too much but the sample size was too small to notice any difference in my skin. This did not irritate my skin and there was no strong smell. I love the clinique brand so I would be willing to try a full sized item if given the opportunity.

author: AChickenLover
body: Feels nice on the skin without feeling greasy. In the week that I sampled this product, I did not notice any difference.

author: Kolya88
header: Great product in a small little bottle
body: I was given the opportunity to try the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for 2 weeks. The little sample that I received was more than enough to cover me for two weeks. One day one, I took a picture of myself after I applied the solution under my eyes. The solution was faintly scented but not overpowering. The liquid serum was easy and smooth to apply. It did not leave a sticky residue or feeling. I kept up with the application and took a picture of myself every 5 days. During the two weeks, I didn't feel any dryness or discomfort. In fact, the areas where I have prominent wrinkles actually look slightly firmer and less noticeable. A great product and I would consider purchasing if it met my budget.

author: Merlot403
body: I have sensitive skin and am middle aged with wrinkles starting to show around my eyes and forehead. I'm not big on skin care other than the basics of washing and moisturizing. I was hesitant but was pleased with the results. It was so nice to get a product that wasn't difficult to incorporate into my simple routine. It also was fragrant free which is a real treat. I used it for two weeks and my wrinkles seem smoother and less defined.

author: Momof4
body: I was glad to #tryitfree and test this serum. The scent is the classic Clinique fresh scent and the product is light and goes on well. I am not sure if the product Works to repair fine lines, time will tell.

author: Lorann2
body: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks now. I was very skeptical at the beginning. I noticed a significant difference in dark spots and wrinkles. I am very impressed with this product.

author: Cool Grandma
body: It is a great product!! When I finish what I have I will start buying and using the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. Love it!!

author: Nadia13
body: Very smooth lines after using this product for 10 to 14 days. My face feels and looks healthier and younger.

author: teluspanda
body: Loved this serum. Absorbed quickly into the skin. Didn't leave a sticky residue on my skin. And the best part was that it didn't break me out nor did it clog my pores. My skin appeared smoother and plump. Hard to find anti-aging products for oily acne prone skin as some products are too rich and greasy. Will be buying the full size since I could see some results already with 2 weeks sample use.

author: Nan82
body: The serum was a little late in arriving....but I must be honest, it was well worth the wait. The texture is so silky it glides on providing tired skin with the feeling of being more hydrated and rejuvenated.

author: Ann800
body: Its applies nicely to face. Smoothest skin. I use sunscreen with the product. Do not see wrinkle relief yet, too soon to tell. Light scent.

author: Miranda1
body: I never noticed a different with product. So I wouldn't purchase this myself.

author: rholtm
body: I was really excited to try this product. While I don't have a ton of wrinkles, I definitely don't want to get any more. This product feels good on my skin and after using for a few weeks, I do think my skin looks smoother. I would buy this product to see continuing results.

author: Dds26
body: Great product! Really helps combat wrinkles! This product does not irritate sensitive skin. It is light and absorbs well. I recommend.

author: Vmm46
body: I loved the way it made my skin feel. I often breakout when I use serums or creams. The Clinique Wrinkle Correcting Serum made my skin feel silky smooth. I used it with Clinique dramatically different moisturizing gel. They work well together. I never really thought that any serums or creams would diminish the wrinkles I already have. I was proven wrong. There isnâ€™t a big difference, but it is noticeable to me. I have to say this serum did itâ€™s job, and I will definitely be adding this to my skin care routine. My skin looks and feels great.

author: Torontonian21
body: I saw an immediate improvement in the texture of my skin as well as the tiny fine lines around my eyes. The serum absorbs rapidly and without leaving any heavy or sticky residue.

author: maggiemay
body: Having used the sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum I was surprised to find a product that actually does what it claims. The texture is creamy, absorbs well and does not leave a residue that results in a substance that you have to wipe off. With the continued use the appearance of lines and wrinkles did actually look diminished. I highly recommend this product for people who want to see actual results instead of wasting their money on products which make statements and do not deliver.

author: Sandra J
body: The product made my skin very soft and the fine lines were not as noticeable.

author: GirlyoneB
body: I really loved the product from its scent to the ease of use. I also found that it helped minimize the fine lines in my skin.

author: Skiddlebits
body: I really enjoyed testing the wrinkle serum. Overall I found that it did help with the look for my fine lines. Definitely made them less visible and smoothed out my skin.

author: Elena24
body: I have used the serum for over a month now, but I have to say that I have noticed positive results from the very first time! My skin appears plumper, lines are deminished and overall my face looks refreshed. I am a toddler Mom, sleeping in is usually not in the cards, but this serum erased some of the sleepless nights for sure. I have sensitive skin as well and this did not irritate it one bit - just smooth, glowing skin. Definitely would recommend!

author: Karen29
body: minimized my forehead wrinkles very smoothing and felt nice on the skin.

author: CandyC23
body: This serum absorbed quite well into my skin and helped to smooth out some of the fine lines and wrinkle on my face. Worked quite well in my opinion.

author: The brunette
body: It just works. It enhanced my skins overall appearance reducing to some degree the lines to my forehead. My skin was also noticeable soft with continue use. The serum is very concentrated so a small amount goes a long way, the texture is silky soft without a tacky residue left on your face. It quickly became one of my favourite products and part of my skin care routine

author: Donna58
body: Product was fragrance free. It came out of the tube easily. Easy to apply and absorbed quickly. It had a little tingle the first time I used it. I noticed by the 2nd week that my fine lines looked less obvious

author: Wylie99
body: I haven't tried any Clinique products in many years and I was pleasantly surprised. I liked the texture and smell and it absorbed well. However, It didn't layer well with other products

author: Lance1999
body: I found It gives me a glow without irritating my skin. It has no scent which is nice also. I feel like my skin has tightened a bit and feels smoother

author: Raspberry Ice
body: This Serum went on nicely and absorbed well. A little went a long way as the sample size was tiny. The Clinique Serum was easy to apply to my face and spread over without pulling. I did get a little dry and red toward the end of the trial. That is expected with Retinol use, yes? I enjoyed the moist feeling for quite a while after without and tightening. I didnâ€™t really notice a difference in the texture or diminishing of lines/wrinkles unfortunately as I was hoping this would be something to go out to purchase. Alas, nothing better than what I already use.

author: Chalene8
body: This is the first time trying this product and I am fairly happy with it. The serum went on smoothly and didnâ€™t have any weight to it. It was a great base to use under my regular skincare products. A few days after using it, I did notice a slight reduction in the fine wrinkles on my forehead.

author: Jenkto
body: This Serum melts and absorbs on the skin, without leaving my skin greasy, I used the product for a week and it made my skin smooth and looking refresh.

body: This Serum melts and absorbs on the skin, without leaving my skin greasy, I used the product for a week and it made my skin smooth and looking refresh.

author: shersexy
body: I received a sample size the Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum from Home Tester Club in exchange for my honest review. I was using it for 2 weeks and noticed that my skin is more hydrated and it's a really good base for my foundation and SPF.

author: clm2275

author: Dzov

author: Annsumme
header: My skin looks very radiant just after 3 days!!!
body: Absolutely stunning results and so fast I am very happy with this perfect product. Skin looks so smooth and plump and have had lots of very nice compliements. This is first product of Clinque that I have used and look forward to trying others.  Thank you !!

author: Lucy
body: My all time fave

author: Julez3
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum feels and smells amazing on my skin. I used every drop of my sample and my skin looks better. Itâ€™s not a night and day difference by any means. With longer use I could see results being more prominent.

author: Appy s
body: Loved the product. I tried it for a month and I did see bit difference in my skin. I love the consistency as well, it doesnâ€™t dry out the skin and makes the skin feel soft afterwards

author: Pikasan
body: I enjoyed the feeling of this serum. It was smooth and smelled nice and left my face feeling refreshed. I'd try it again!

author: Andrea82
body: I was excited to receive this product and I like Clinique brand. I was disappointed though as this product caused me to break out after only 2 days. I stopped using it for a week and then tried again but with the same results. Glad I didnâ€™t pay for something that I canâ€™t use.

author: Cad81
body: I used this product for 2 weeks on my chest as this is the place on my body that has the most defined lines. Two weeks is not a very long time to notice a significant difference and as such I did notice a change in the lines on my chest. The texture is nice and does not leave a sticky or oily residue. author: Maya 16
body: Really enjoyed using this serum on my skin it definitely made it feel a lot softer and took away the dryness

author: Sher74
body: I used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for over 3 weeks, every night and most mornings. I noticed no difference, positive or negative. My before and after photos also showed no difference. My goal was to eliminate wrinkles around my mouth, eyes, and forehead.

author: Lara649
body: I used it faithfully for a period of 3 weeks and did not see any noticeable difference. I was very disappointed with this product and definitely would not buy it.

author: Sarah12
header: First time trying this type of product
body: Iâ€™ve never tried a product like this. I had heard it could make your skin react badly or peel for the first while when using. I had no bad reactions. The texture made it easy to apply and you only need a small amount to cover your whole face. My other products easily went overtop and all were able to absorb into my skin.

author: Flash
body: As a base I found the serum fine. It went on smoothly. Absorbed fast. Makeup went over it well. However as a wrinkle remover I didnâ€™t notice any difference.

author: Soniap
body: I really like Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. Are used it every day morning and night for two weeks. The serum felt really smooth and felt really nice on my skin. There was no obvious scent which was great. I would definitely consider buying this product again.

author: Aliia
body: This serum has such a lovely texture, silky and lightweight, which makes it easy to apply and it immediately absorbs into the skin. author: Wild32

author: Safay
body: Didnâ€™t like it, first of all the amount was not enough, and secondly, didnâ€™t give me any result.

author: Ashley
body: I really enjoyed trying this serum. Itâ€™s very smooth and silky when applied to your face. I did see some reduced wrinkles but will continue using it and see if results get better

author: Kriss
header: A Little Goes A Long Way !

author: Aliia
body: This serum has such a lovely texture, silky and lightweight, which makes it easy to apply and it immediately absorbs into the skin. Iâ€™ll keep using it and see if anything changes.

author: SC1989
body: This is an amazing serum and I saw results fairly quickly! I will definitely purchase again!

author: Elisa
body: The product is very light on skin and is like water for the skin. The product has no strong smell and is very very light. I can see results around the fine line though I have not used it every day. I would surely buy the product to see better results.

author: Fran23
body: This serum is so smooth and silky to apply and blends right into your skin without feeling heavy and sticky. It really helped with my forehead wrinkles. What a difference I saw within the 2 weeks!

author: Courttt
body: I think itâ€™s a nice serum! It feels great on the skin and didnâ€™t irritate my skin at all which some products do

author: Liz86
body: Great serum! My face feels plump after few days of use, definitely going to repurchase this in a full size bottle!

author: Jess26
body: I received this product in exchange for my review, & personally Clinique is a brand i trust very much. It makes my skin feeling super soft & glowing. Overall its a great product i would reuse.

author: Jfurlicious
body: As a 39 year old woman I was very excited to try out this product for the fine lines around my eyes. After using it for only a week I could see them diminishing. I've always loved Clinique products and this one is definitely no different!

author: Jackie27
header: Great product. Love the feel of it
body: It gives me a glow that can last all day. Great product that helped around my mouth and my crow feet around my eyes.

author: Carrie1966
body: I used the Clinique for a couple of weeks. I noticed the wrinkles were a little less noticeable and around my eyes the skin was softer.

author: Rlt70
header: Needed more product for a accurate test.
body: There was no change in my skin, I believe if I had more then 2 weeks worth of product I might have seen a difference.

author: Jotrito
header: Fells good on skin but not much results

author: My Girl Frayday
body: Loved the feel of it going on my face, And how quickly it was absorbed into my skin. I was impressed at how almost instantly it worked and reduced the fine lines around my eyes as well as on my neck! Not only did it make me look younger but it made me feel younger too. I actually had compliments and was asked what I was using, And without hesitation, told them!! I was however, disappointed in the price, as when I went to purchase it, was unable to due to the fact that I'm on disability and can't afford to spend that much on myself, What a fantastic product though! I will still tell everyone that it works amazingly well and instantly!!

author: Appy s

author: Pikasan

author: Julez3
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum feels and smells amazing on my skin. I used every drop of my sample and my skin looks better. Itâ€™s not a night and day difference by any means. With longer use I could see results being more prominent.

author: Snuffie
body: I have been using this 'new' serum for about 4 months. I had used the previous serum for years and was told (even by a dermatologist) how beautiful my skin was. But since using this new formulation, though my skin is smoother - it is also drier and looks OLDER! I know some people are happy with this new formulation (per reading reviews) so why not keep this version for them and bring back the previous formulation for those of us (seems like a lot of us also per reviews) who did much better with the original!

author: lilitake
header: Caused wrinkles and skin to burn and flake
body: I used to use and love the Smart Custom Repair Serum, but because they discontinued the product, I thought I'd try out this Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I only wore it at night because I was aware that retinol makes your skin sensitive to the sun, but after using the product for a few days, I woke up one morning to find wrinkles where I'd never seen them before around my eye area. It looked like I'd aged 20 years overnight. What's worse is that since I stopped using the product, my face has been painful to the touch and a few days later my skin began to peel. A non-prescription retinol product should not cause so much irritation. I have tried twice to return over Clinique's Live Chat, but I have not yet been sent a return label despite promises from the representatives that they would email me one within 48 hours. Clinique does not stand by its return policy.

author: OhReally123
body: This product has a nice feel to it, both in hand and on the face. It applies easily, blends into the skin very nicely. There is no fragrance which is good. After only 2 weeks I canâ€™t say definitively that it reduces wrinkles but Iâ€™d certainly be willing to try the product for an extended period.

author: Purplefridge

author: Jodi45
body: This was a free trial from home testers club and it is amazing. My skin felt so soft like it had been brought back to life. Smells amazing, seems I'm stumped for the first time for what t

author: Huang

author: Cheetah123
body: I received a free sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum in exchange for my honest review. The sample was very small but with this product, a little goes a long way. The serum is easily applied to your face and soaks in quickly. It is not greasy at all. It almost immediately makes your skin feel moisturized and very smooth to the touch. It almost feels like there is a built-in primer in this product. There is no noticeable scent which I really appreciate. My skin does look better after applying this product but I can't really say I have seen a huge difference in my skin over the past two weeks. This product cannot be used around the eye area and unfortunately, that is where most of my wrinkles are. I was hoping to see improvements on my forehead and around my jaw area. When the product is first applied my wrinkles do seem diminished, but as soon as I wash my face in the morning or remove my makeup at the end of the day, my sad wrinkes are back.

body: I was pleased that a serum would have the smooth gel like texture that this one has. They are normally liquid and not as easy to apply due to dripping. There was a slight burning sensation around the crows feet area of my eyes which wasn't unpleasant and made me feel it was having some effect in plumping up fine lines. After only two weeks I felt it lessened the fine lines on my forehead and around my eyes. I used it around the mouth area and lower cheeks as well and noticed some improvement which I think would become more pronounced with regular use. I would definitely buy this product for the serum component of my skin care routine.

author: keppers
body: I have been testing out the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for the last few weeks. The serum is an opaque almost gel like consistency that is reasonably thick in consistency. It absorbs really quickly into the skin leaving a very matte like finish I don't typically get from other serums I've used. I have felt some burning and irritation whilst using it but I found I was mixing actives o my skin seems to be okay now. I didn't experience any flaking of the skin like I have with some Retinol products. I have fine lines and I think their is a slight improvement but nothing to get too excited about yet. I would need to continue to use the product to see the longer term results. I have dry skin so I would need to use a thick moisturiser or a hydrating serum with this serum as it's just so mattifying. Overall its a nice serum but only using it for a short period hasn't seen a lot of results.

author: Elise
header: Great Serum for those early wrinkles!

The instructions advise to wear with sunscreen and to avoid sun exposure, as well as to avoid using with any other products that also include retinol. I found Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum worked amazing to reduce the look of wrinkles. I am 29 and therefore certainly starting to show aging, however I do not have deep wrinkles - yet. This serum worked well with the aging that I do have.

author: LLAReviews
body: I love Clinique and wasn't disappointed with the new Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. Why? New and revolutionized ingredients. The top players in this formula would be; 1. Clinique uses a potent Retinoid which is formulated for high-performance de-aging effects with a gentle touch. It helps accelerate your skinâ€™s natural cell renewal to speed up bringing fresh skin cells to the surface. It also helps shed dull surface skin to visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles. I noticed a difference after 4 days. That's quick!! 2. Hyaluronic Acid Concentrate: This is a MAJOR key to Instantly hydrating and plumping your skin. It also helps restore suppleness and volume to diminish the appearance of fine, dry lines. NOT kidding......I noticed a major difference after 10 days!!! 3. NO Oil, denatured alcohol, SLS, SLES, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, or fragrance. Just a pure Clean Serum to make you look your best! It's now my Go-To! You won't be disappointed!!!

The biggest result I felt was the plumpness and smoothing effect it had on my skin particularly my forehead and cheeks. My usual retinoid/retinol products are very drying and appreciated having a product that worked well and provided moisture. I am interested in purchasing it to try it out for a longer period, I just need to convince myself 30 ml for $88.00 is worth it. If itâ€™s in your budget I definitely recommend it.

author: Gabina
header: My skin is glowing and happy
body: I have used this serum for three weeks so far. My skin is supple, glowy and looks more even in colour. I am 51 and will continue to buy this serum as I want to see just how much better my skin will continue to look.

author: Petcrazyj
body: The product improved the overall softness and smoothness of my skin without leaving a greasy or oily finish.

author: SherBear
body: I really enjoyed using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. It made my skin feel great, light and smooth. I definitely will purchase this product again! My life is pretty crazy and I definitely like using this product in my daily routine. Only a few minutes out of my evening, and keeps my skin beautiful and wrinkle-free. Definitely would recommend this to my friends!

author: Oggie
body: The first time I used Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum I felt and saw a immediate difference . I applied it to my most pronounced wrinkles at the side of my eyes Every second day for 2 weeks. My skin feels much softer in that area and the wrinkles are definitely less noticable. The skin is plumper and appears smoother in the applied area. Overall this is a very effective product and white likely the effectiveness will continue with ongoing use.

author: crestiaux
header: I don't look as tired as I use to
body: When I first used Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum I was pleasantly surprised. It didn't take years off of my skin but it did make me look well rested. I felt like my skin firmed up a bit. My boyfriend noticed a change in my skin which is a good thing because he didn't know that I was trying something new. I am happy with the changes that I see and will continue using this product. (It's already on my things to buy list) I recommend this product for all women.

author: anner2050
body: I was really happy to have been given a chance to sample before buying. Some products bother me with their strong smells, but this didn't. It goes on smooth and soft and I love how it feels on my skin. I will definitely be adding this product to my drug store list.

author: d3vilz78ca
body: I used this product and found that my skin became firmer, smoother, and my wrinkles became less noticeable. Very impressed with this product.

author: Bee_93
body: I wanted this to be a great serum as I like other Clinique products but it definitely fell short of my expectations. I used this serum for 3 weeks on the crows feet area of my left eye and continued to use my current eye care product on my right eye area to compare the two different products. The Clinique serum did not improve any of the wrinkle lines. The lines did not become worse but there wasn't any noticeable improvement. I feel that my current product worked better and will continue with it instead.

author: MAGICK2828
body: THIS PRODUCT IS A MONEY GRAB IN MY OPINION. IT. PROVED USELESS WITH ZERO NOTICEABLE RESULTS.

author: bratysue59

author: Francesca

Over a few days, I felt my complexion was brighter and my face was more supple. I can't wait to see the long term results of this product. Will definitely add it to my skincare routine.

author: Mom87
body: Sorry for the delay. I used this product in the morning along with a Clinique moisturizer. This serum was easy to apply skin felt soft & plump & helped my wrinkled skin looked softer & radiant. I have asked for this for a Christmas present, so I can say I love this new skincare product. Thank you for letting me try this sample for free.

author: ToCo1
body: I found this serum to be light and effective. I really love my serums because of the fast absorbency and this didnâ€™t disappoint. Left my fingers and face not feeling with minimum oily residue. My skin felt amazing, too. I did try staying out of the sunlight to get the best results, and my skin does appear to be smoother looking.

author: SpongyJo
body: I liked that the serum has a nice texture and absorbs quickly. It felt good on my face. I also liked that it contained antioxidants and skin brightening ingredients. I didn't notice any improvement in fine lines but my skin seemed really hydrated. Maybe if I was able to use it for a longer period I might see some difference. I love Clinique products and might give this a try in the future if the price is right. It seems expensive for something that 'might' work.

author: Eeyore23
body: Having young looking skin in a matter of weeks is awesome. Found my partner and will never part from Clinique!!!

author: Petcrazyj
body: The product improved the overall softness and smoothness of my skin without leaving a greasy or oily finish.

author: GH
body: I have used the original serum and I was happy about it. I bought this one because the old version was discontinued. This product makes my skin very itchy. I've been using Clinique products for many years and I haven't have any issue with any of them except this one. I'd suggest to improve the formulation.

author: Urnotyrkhakis
body: This has been a game changer for my forehead lines and eye creases. It goes on smoothly and is very fast absorbing. I noticed a difference within the first 3 days.

author: PrimeAddict
header: Easy to apply, absorbs in nicely
body: I've been using this every day and night for the past 3 weeks. I'm 31 with dry-combination skin and some deep smile lines and eye lines. I think the serum has made a difference in my smile lines, and helped acne to fade. Didn't irritate my skin or dry me out. It's very easy to apply, has a nice spreadable consistency, no fragrance. I would definitely consider buying more!

author: Ksheila
body: This product felt nice on the skin and absorbed into the skin very nicely. I did not notice the effects of the serum right away but after a couple days I began to notice the disappearance of fine lines on my forehead.

author: Louloutegege
body: I like the feeling of the serum on the skin. It's soft and not sticky. The smell is nice too.I didn't really see the results for now but it's been only 2 weeks I use it...

author: MJ101
header: I really enjoy using this serum
body: I really enjoy using Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum feels so good on skin and I actually saw a difference on my skin after using it. I definitely recommend this product.

author: Schh9
body: I thought this was a great product. Would need to use for longer to know how it works long term.

author: LitleDi

author: Bunnystac

author: Shanny
body: I had high hopes for this serum but I was let down. After 3 weeks of daily use I say no sigh of improvement on any of my wrinkles

author: KatieA

I liked the feel of the product, it didn't leave any sort of greasy residue, but felt that perhaps the claims were overstated. This could also be a result of an insufficient trial period though. I will continue to use the remainder of the product until the bottle is empty.

author: Jenni
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair is fantastic. It has little to no smell and a little goes a long way.

author: Sa$hionthesun
body: I have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair and noticed that the fine lines on my left eye slowly dissapear. Though it need to be continously do it in order to have it very effective. The serum is light and not oily at all as it dissappear and absorbed into the skin. I like it.

author: Trista81
body: After using this product for only 3 weeks, I do not yet see any difference in my skin. But I will say that it leaves my skin feeling fresh and hydrated. It goes on smoothly and leaves it feeling great. I will keep using it!

author: Letta
body: I've been using this product 3 times a week for the last 3 weeks now. It goes on very smooth, no greasy feeling. I have noticed that some of my fine lines are no longer there. I'm sure using this product more often and for a longer time frame, I could visibly reduce a lot more of my fine lines and wrinkles.

author: xforeverlostx
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum is an excellent addition to any skincare routine. The serum itself is fragrance free, light textured and goes on silky smooth. It absorbs quickly and a little goes a long way! I initially experienced some mild peeling of my skin, but then my face was so nice and smooth! I would definitely purchase!

author: Rav222
body: I received Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum as a sample few weeks ago. After trying for about 3 weeks i did see some visible changes however i think i might have to take it longer to see a full impact. I would definately recommend this serum to someone who is worried about wrinkles

author: Rannarae
body: This product has been working well over the last few weeks. It is cheaper than my normal product but still works great

author: Nandy
body: Great product. The texture and smell was good. It the feel was better. I really like that I could see results after a week . Will definitely keep this in my routine.

author: Gurdy
body: I was not impressed as I did not notice any improvement of my wrinkles or sun spots.I was hoping to see alittle improvement.

author: Goodpick
body: I loved the way this product helped relieve my mainly dry irritated skin , it also helped reduce the â€œ puffinessâ€ around my eye & cheek area due to my seasonal allergies .

author: Gemsbok
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair wrinkle correcting serum actually works! I have been using this regularly for the past few weeks and noticed a considerable improvement in the appearance of wrinkles, especially on my forehead. Itâ€™s not sticky, feels very smooth on your skin and you only need a small amount. Definitely recommend!

author: Treebee
body: I absolutely love this serum. Especially around my eyes and mouth. After a week I thought I saw some improvement. But after 2 weeks of daily use I definitely noticed improvement. Iâ€™m also very impressed how little you use each time

author: Lacey1983
body: My skin absorbs the product very easily, with no sticky residue. My skin legit feels smooth after and soft. I tend to use it morning and night. I find if I use a microdermabrasion device and then this product - skin skin looks fabulous, youthful and healthy. There is no scent that I could notice from the product - some people hate scents - so this is a great product for sensitive people. The little trial size went a long way - I have been using it for about 3 weeks and still have some left. I would repurchase. It keeps my skin hydrated and smooth.

author: MacSteph
body: I really liked this serum! I found that it really absorbed quickly.

author: KaseyAn
body: I was a bit nervous to try this - I've been hesitant to try wrinkle products in the past, because even though I'm a proud "elder millenial", I have sensitive skin. I try Clinique and gave this a try. I use it nightly, after I wash my face, and use a good moisturizer after. The serum is light and not strong scented at all (which I appreciate), and my face feels great! A nice way to ease into ageing skin care and take care of myself :)

author: RockingMom
