The texture was great, not greasy or oily, and application was easy. I did see a little improvement, but I was expecting a little bit more after 3 weeks. All in all a great product, but as with this type of product, miracles don't happen.

author: trisha
body: very pleased with clinique wrinkle correcting serum. I noticed a difference within one week. Wrinkles seemed to be less pronounced and finer. Will be purchasing this product for future daily use.

author: Kimmy10
body: I was surprised by my two week trial. I love that the cream wasnâ€™t greasy and and went on smoothly. I found after using it a few days my skin seemed softer in skin texture and a more smooth look. I also found my face was brighter looking and seemed to tone down my red spots. Overall I liked this product and would definitely buy in the future!

author: hitea
body: This is my first skincare product by Clinique. I've used retinols before and stopped using them while I was trying this. The email itself didn't mention to only use it 1-3 times a week, it states to use it twice a day for a month. But because it was a sample size, I used it for a few days at night followed by sunscreen the next day which is really important. I found myself breakout by the 2nd day and that might be because this retinol strength is strong that the ones I've used and my skin purged. I used it over a toner and essence and then followed it up by a night mask. I found that this serum was easy to apply, and not tacky either. It was easy to work with but I would defiantly not recommend using it twice a day everyday until your skin has build a tolerance. I would also like the know the percentage of retinol used in this product as well. Overall, it was an okay retinol product.

author: joycen
body: I received this for free to try out and give my honest review. I did like the serum, it didn't smell too strong. My skin felt really nice after two weeks. I would definitely buy this product.

author: Pinsri

Unfortunately the amount of the tester was not enough for me to determine weather it helped wrinkles for the rest of my face (my eyes etc)

author: Dayniviolin

author: Banzy
body: Itâ€™s a nice serum. I have another serum as well that I use in conjunction with this. Absorbs well. Lightly scented. Havenâ€™t seen a huge improvement but as the months get colder, my skin needs a lot of moisture.

author: Mom4life
body: Love the serum as it helped minimize my wrinkle and smooth out my skin after using the product. It does sting my skin as my skin is sensitive.

author: Crystal04
body: Wow! I have had problems with wrinkles for a while. At first I was in denial that I even needed a solution but as the years went by I swallowed my pride and finally tried the Clinique Smart Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum! I say wow because itâ€™s the only word I have to say how much my face has changed. I still have slight wrinkles but nothing like before. The serum is smooth, easy to apply. It is a little oily so I decided to use mine as a nighttime ritual instead of having to apply makeup afterwards. My skin appears so much more youthful and this serum is definitely my best friend when it comes to my reality of getting older. Definitely recommend to anyone that struggles with wrinkles!

author: Shantal

author: MHABCA

author: Carla

Decreased the look of fine lines and made my skin look smoother and less creased underneath. Thank you

With some anti-wrinkle creams and serums, you can feel your skin tightening, therefore it feels like it is working however with this product, I did not feel any difference in my skin. Maybe long term use might show more results but I definitely wasn't motivated to run out and purchase this product.

body: I used Clinique smart clinical wrinkle repair nearly every day for 2 weeks. My fine lines are smoothed out and my skin is softer.

It went on smooth. The pump allowed myself not to waste any as you do not need that much on your face. There was a few times I forgot to put it on at night but once you get into a routine itâ€™s so simple to do. I started noticing my skin around my eyes less wrinkly. Yes I still have wrinkles I mean Iâ€™m 43 but my skin feels smoother. You donâ€™t need a lot which I love and itâ€™s non Greasy. Itâ€™s too bad when I got the sample there wasnâ€™t a coupon. I wouldâ€™ve love to give the coupon to my neighbour next-door when I showed her my free sample.

author: PrimeAddict
header: Easy to apply, absorbs in nicely

I think the serum has made a difference in my smile lines, and helped acne to fade. Didn't irritate my skin or dry me out. It's very easy to apply, has a nice spreadable consistency, no fragrance. I would definitely consider buying more!

author: Ksheila

author: Louloutegege

author: MJ101

body: I really enjoy using Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum feels so good on skin and I actually saw a difference on my skin after using it. I definitely recommend this product.

author: Hoops12

author: K2justme2

author: BreeBee
body: I really enjoyed this serum. Iâ€™m 29 years old and wish I would have started with wrinkle and fine line care earlier. But I will say, this made quite the difference in my skin! My forehead and â€œ11â€™sâ€ are noticeably less deep and my skin all over is looking nice, plump, and rejuvenated!

author: loru23
body: I believe that since trying Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, I have finally found what I have been looking for. Since first applying the serum I noticed how nice it felt on my skin, and how it wasn't heavy/oily. Best part is that my skin looks younger - those aggravating lines now look softer. Seeing how the serum contains hyaluronic acid, peptides and retinol, it clearly does the job it is supposed to with dealing with lines/wrinkles. Overall, my skin has improved significantly, by how it feels and looks and I believe it is best suited for my age group (50+). I would recommend this product for anyone dealing with the appearance of lines/wrinkles and does not like the heaviness of a cream or fragrance, and would rate it 10/10.

author: Jungleprincess
header: Seems ok,would need to use longer.

It was a small sample so I think I would need to use it at least a month to really see a difference in my skin . I did like that it has no fragrance .

author: Goldie
header: I love this product so so much.
body: This is so good. It has made my skin so fresh, rejoiced, and relaxed. The product itself is high quality and not oily. I used it twice a day and it really Improved my skin

Overall I recommend this especially for those of us over 40, who are starting to show those first signs of aging.

author: TeeTee

author: Aggiee
body: I think it worked well. Didnâ€™t see amazing results but it may have been based on the tiny sample size received.

author: Saby24
body: I really enjoyed using this serum! It felt great on my skin and I felt amazing in the morning! I noticed a difference in my eye area and saw that it was less creased! Great product and I will be buying the full size bottle

author: Urnotyrkhakis

author: Liltam

I normally have hormonal pimples appear right before my period but this seemed to help with that as they didn't appear this time around! It also seemed to give my skin a glow overtime too! Definitely would recommend :)

author: Leoana
body: Itâ€™s a mini tube, not enough to see results for the trial dayâ€™s.

author: Jo Cool
body: I really loved this serum. Ive basically tried everything on the market and have never purchased the same thing twice , until now..

Only using it for 2 weeks, I didn't see any immediate difference on my skin, but I would definitely be willing to try this product for a few months, based on my positive experience.

I didn't see any improment to my skin, but it also didn't cause anything negative to my skin.

author: Kim09

body: I really enjoyed testing the clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum. I felt that I woke up with clearer looking skin in the mornings and it didn't irritate my skin like a lot of retinols do. The texture is a little thicker than a traditional serum but it feels nice going on the skin. I also noticed one of my dark spots seemed to lighten a little which is exciting so I will definitely continue to use this product

Clinique is the leader in quality skin care products and I would definitely recommend this serum to my friends and relatives.

It felt nice going on and doesn't really have a heavy scent or anything, but as far as seeing my wrinkles diminish, it didn't happen. Perhaps if I used it for longer time or had a different type of wrinkle issue, than it might work. Overall, I guess I would have to say that this is a product that you'd just have to try for yourself and see if it works for you.

author: Jjgrace
body: I enjoyed the texture of this product and could see myself repurchasing it however, I did not see any noticeable changes in the 2 weeks of use as you have to start slow with retinols so I would only use it a few times a week. I am excited to keep using it and see if I have any major changes

author: Lyn123
body: I highly recommended this kind of product, it really helps and make your skin soft and smooth

body: I have used Clinique products for years. I use a daily moisturizer from Clinique but had never used wrinkle correcting serum, as I get older I notice fine wrinkles. I used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a few weeks now and so far I am really impressed with it. It goes on silky smooth, absorbs nicely. My skin feels softer and I noticed a slight improvement in those fine lines. It is a product I can definitely see myself continuing using.

author: Sami93
body: This product is okay, at best. I don't think it's anything super special or a must buy. I believe you could achieve the same results with retinol and vitamin C serums at a fraction of the cost. The smell isn't too bad, I don't like overly fragrant skincare.

author: Monas
body: love this serum! Iâ€™m a 40 year old mother of three who recently became overly aware of some fine lines and wrinkles. I have mildly sensitive, dry skin. The product: The serum itself is a cloudy-clear liquid slightly thicker than water. I donâ€™t think it has an added scent, per say, but it does have a light, clean smell. Use: I jumped right in and started using this product twice a day, morning and night. I use it after washing my face, before I apply moisturizer or night cream. It causes absolutely no discomfort or tingling and goes on smooth. It dries quickly, and leaves behind a slightly tacky residue. After applying moisturer however, my skin is soft and smooth. I even got some nice compliments recently that I look like my kids sister. Thank you so much I will definitely recommend this product to all the ladies out there.

body: I've been using this morning and night for two weeks now and my face definitely feels smoother and looks brighter. Didn't notice a huge difference on fine lines. It actually feels like nothing when it's dry, which is fantastic, and I can't smell anything during or after application. I experienced no negative reactions whatsoever... it seems really gentle.

author: peppy
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum. works well left my skin smooth and felt corrected. no smell and no reaction for people with allergies

author: Stacey2423
body: It didnâ€™t have a huge impact on my wrinkles around my eyes. I wouldnâ€™t be able to purchase as the price is too high for the lack of results I received. It was quick to absorb and pleasant on my sensitive skin!

author: BeckyC
header: No sticky texture like other serums
body: Really enjoy the feel of this serum. Goes on very nicely and doesn't leave any sticky feel or residue after application like some serums. I also have pretty sensitive skin so the fact that it's fragrance free is a huge plus for me.

author: alexis22

author: karikt
body: I received a small sample of the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair from Home Tester Club, and this is my unbiased opinion. This serum has almost no fragrance and has a light consistency, feels like a gel and is absorbed quickly by my skin. It made my skin feels more hydrated and tight. Whoever, I did not see much difference in my fine lines. I tested this serum for a few weeks, using it only at night. I used the smallest quantity possible per day to make it last as long as possible to make it last 25 days, as instructed, but it wasn't enough. I believe I would have better results if I used it twice a day for over 30 days.

author: m3lizch

It was easy to implement it in my daily skincare routine; I use it every evening before applying a moisturizer. I would recommend it.

I applied it every night as part of my routine. I noticed immediately how smooth and shiny my face was after application. It did not feel sticky or greasy afterwards. But, I did not notice as much difference with the product reducing overall fine lines and wrinkles. Overall, it made my face feel hydrated and smooth.

author: melmac2013
body: I really enjoyed this serum and highly recommend it. It is lightweight and left my skin smooth. Fine lines less visable.

author: Chromediva82

author: Kim09
header: Noticed a difference in the fine lines
body: This serum did not make my skin feel dry and noticed a difference in the reduction of fine lines. However I will wait for some more time to see how it works.

body: I started to use this product a week ago. It makes my skin burn and I am getting acne. It also makes my eyes red even though I do not put the product near it. It is definitely not made for sensitive skin. I do not recommend using this product and I use a lot of Clinique products.

author: yito2609
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a great facial product that I use only for a period, but it already make my light wrinkle disappeared,and have a smooth, shining skin, I will continue use it and highly recommend it.

author: Mars50
body: It's test time the new #clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle corrector serum #resurface #replump #renew #skincareproducts #skincare #hometesterclub #pr #testandreview #inthemailday There wasn't enough to try for 2 weeks, I was able to get about 1wk of use by using once a day in the morning. My skin did feel nice & soft, serum glided smoothly on skin, no skin reactions. As for helping out with wrinkle or fine lines there wasn't enough to see any difference. I have combo skin type.

author: Queenb56

I do have some wrinkles on my forehead and i did notice a small reduction in the look of these. The product stated not to use around the eyes, which is where i have more wrinkles and could have been more beneficial. I did notice an overall smoother look to my face which was awesome! The product went on smooth and had a lightweight feel.

author: Momi3
body: This cream is so silky. It left my skin feeling truly hydrated. I used it under my normal day cream and really noticed a difference within a week.

author: Andy65

One thing I would like to see added to the packaging is instructions on how much product should be used at one time.

author: Mojingles
body: I liked the texture of the serum on my skin which went on smoothly. It was not drying which was nice as Iâ€™ve tried others that I was sensitive to. The feel is like and non greasy and good for all skin types. I would use again.

author: Nudang99
header: Must have on skin care routine

author: Realcalgary

author: Sookiesam
body: I tried it for 2 days and my skin had a drastic reaction to the serum so I did not continue the trial. My skin can be oddly sensitive to random products so I think it was my skin being the issue and not the serum. I wish it had worked for me as I have heard great reviews on this product.

author: Chrissilv
header: Looking for a effective wrinkle serum
body: I used this sample size cream for two weeks and I noticed a change in areas a definite must buy. It was a great texture and a little goes a long way.

author: Hbkmom
body: I received this product in trial size for review purposes, even with the trial size I was able to tell a nice difference in my fine lines and wrinkles it has made a different and I love the feeling of this product on the skin it is not greasy and soaks right in my skin loves this it does not dry your skin out I highly recommend this product and I will be purchasing a full size.

author: 5liltees
body: I really enjoyed using this serum. As someone with fine lines just beginning to emerge it has been a much needed product in my skincare routine. It definitely left my skin feeling hydrated, looked and felt smoother. It did not irritate my skin as Iâ€™ve had issues with that in the past with other skin care products. I will definitely make this part of my Am and pm skin care routine!

author: Preet
header: Good to use and feels hydrated
body: Very good it feels better after each day use , it get absorbed in skin no oily touch afterwards

author: Kath26
body: I found this serum to be thick but not too thick. If feels like it was absorbed quickly and didn't leave my face looking "shiny" from access oil. I am not sure I would make the purchase due to cost.

author: Meow21
body: I used this every 2nd day for 2 weeks. I noticed that after using my skin did look firmer to my liking.

author: Wendy66
body: have used this serum for a month now-went and bought more i have never used a product with hyaluronic acid before my skin looks much more hydrated and the wrinkles are much less visible

author: miss_nobody
header: Gentle enough as a retinol product!
body: This is the first retinol product I started using after my pregnancy, and I didn't experience any of the skin purging that happened when I first used the ingredient, so I was very happy that this Clinique serum was so gentle. I never saw the immediate results of extended use from retinol, but I keep using it because I truly believe it will make a difference in the long-run, so I believe the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum would do just that!

author: Helen
body: This product is magical. I tried it as a free sample for just two weeks and can see the difference already. My skin is smoother and lines have reduced. The serum feels so refreshing and soaks in right away, so no greasy feeling at all! I love this!

author: Dana84
body: I was pleasantly surprised using the Clinique serum. My mother has always used clinic products and now I have switched her onto Clinique and I will be using Clinique as well. I seen a difference within one week my mother seen a difference as well and asked me what I was using

author: YegHunny

author: Jewell
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair is a great product . I seem to have less lines around my mouth. I got it free to try and been using it for 2 weeks now and I just love it. author: Peppermint
body: Before I tried this product I took some pictures of the areas of my greatest concern. I have 2 deep frown lines that I wanted reduced. I started this trial on October 20th when I received the product. I applied it as the instructions directed without using any other serums. It took about two weeks before I could see any changes. Now after one month of applying the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum I can see a very noticeable difference in the depth of the frown lines. One in particular has greatly reduced. I will definitely purchase this product for continued use. I have maybe two days remaining in the small sample tube that I was given. I used it very sparingly as the size of the sample was very small. Because of using the product sparingly and the results that I found tells me that you don't have to apply very much to get great results. I will be letting my friends know about this product.

author: Adn87
body: I have really been enjoying the addition of this serum to my skin care routine. I have noticed smoother skin and it always feels extra hydrated on the days that I use it. Great consistency, and I did not experience any breakout during the trial.

author: flyinfacer

author: Blanche
body: Great texture, not perfumedâ€¦goes on your face smoothly,face feels rejouvenatedâ€¦and after application, I use my moisturizer and it doesnâ€™t take much and my face feels refreshed using bothâ€¦love it and will buy itâ€¦

body: Itâ€™s okay but doesnâ€™t really help with wrinkles and fine lines it did leave my skin extremely dry as well

author: Sparks11
body: I liked the smell of the product, not overbearing like some others Iâ€™ve tried. No adverse reactions with my sensitive skin, and my face looked great after using!

author: Zombievoodoo
body: Iâ€™ve always been a big fan of Clinique and have been using their skincare since I was in my 20s. I have not used it as frequently these past few years as I started using k beauty products but this serum has brought me back to the Clinique line. My skin feels fantastic and looks smooth, I donâ€™t have a lot of wrinkles for my age to begin with, but I do notice a difference with the fine lines. author: Jennifer84
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum left my skin feeling extremely soft and plump feeling, without any greasy feeling. Serum was easy to apply and absorb quickly. I felt that this product did have an impact on wrinkles. A quality product worth trying.

author: Yllek
header: A little goes a long way
body: It was great for a moisturizer, I didnâ€™t notice a difference in any wrinkles over the short period. It was gentle on my skin and caused no breakouts.

author: MrsH2021
header: It's like a wrinkle eraser serum!
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair not only reduced my deep set creases but vastly improved the texture of my skin! I have tried lots of serums but this one is a game changer. I used it for 2 weeks and I have to say a little goes a very long way. I love the texture, and it absorbs well, and even works great under makeup. There's no doubt that my skin is smoother, softer and more hydrated. Even my enlarged pores are less visible. It contains some powerful and-aging ingredients including hyaluronic acid, collagen and retinoids. I love that this serum doesn't contain any oil, denatured alcohol, SLS, SLES or sulfates. It's also fragrance, paraben and phthalate free. It's was also gentle on my mildy sensitive skin. It's super concentrated, I'm really impressed with how well it worked. Goodbye stubborn lines!

author: TiffyK
body: I did really like the feel of this serum. However, I am not sure how well it worked. I did feel that the area underneath my eyes seemed to be smoother after using this serum continuously for a couple of weeks. I found I noticed more visible smoothness to my skin texture when I would exfoliate my skin prior to putting on the serum. This would definitely improve your results. i found it hard to compare the results of this serum because a lot of my wrinkles are big smile line type wrinkles. This serum will not change those big wrinkles. However, if you have some fine lines or skin texture issues, this may help you see some improvements. Not sure I personally would repurchase mainly because of the cost.

author: Jackie
body: I liked the serum. The consistency of the product is thick enough that it actually leaves your skin feeling moisturized. The amount of retinol in the product didn't cause any peeling of my skin. After using for 2 weeks, my skin was very soft and my complexion looked clearer with smaller pores. I wish it was a bigger sample so I could get the full, long term benefits of the serum.

author: micromaltese
body: love this serum. great results with consistent application. makes a great gift for the holiday season. highly recommend and will repurchase.

author: Mfitz

author: Carrie14

author: Parya

Overall, my skin felt softer and smoother after using this serum and I would be interested in trying it out for a longer duration to see the full results.

author: Rosee
body: Serum was great! I saw a slight difference in my fine lines. It got softer as I consistently used it. The serum absorbs quickly into my skin and the texture is light and not sticky. The only concern is that if I looked closely, it looks like there's glitter (?) in it? I'm not sure what it is. Because I am more aware of what ingredients I use on my skin, that would be one thing I would keep in mind.

author: Jo2021
body: Product was great but sample was too small to really get the full benefits. I am sure if there was a bit more I would be able to see more results. Still very happy I was able to sample!

author: Beauty
body: The serum was nice to put on abs made my skin feel smooth. After a few weeks I noticed a smoother skin with less wrinkles. I donâ€™t have alot but want to start a skin regiment to help. I would use this product again.

author: Yojo12
body: This retinol product was very smooth, not greasy or oily. Application of product has good coverage, and doesnâ€™t leave you feeling sticky as some oils or gels do. This is the first retinol product I have year that indicated to use twice daily, with sunscreen of course, so I am not sure if that means itâ€™s less potent. I did not experience any adverse affects as sometimes happens when you start using retinol, however I had been using retinol prior to this product so cannot comment if a â€œpurgeâ€ might happen. I noticed my skin got a little flushed upon application, but that might just be from massaging it in. No negative reactions. In terms of effectiveness, I think my skin seemed brighter as retinol accelerates new skin production. In terms of reduction of wrinkles and fine lines, I would say yea to an effect; although at the same time as trying this product I was trying this in conjunction with some other Clinique creams, and the effect was noticeable; I just canâ€™t attribute to which one!

author: Kelbelle85

Tried the serum for the 2 week trial and I'm noticing softer skin and less lines... Definitely going to be including this product in my daily skin care routine

I love the feel of the serum. My skin feels soft after I apply, not sticky or oily like some serums. So I would like to give it a try for a longer period to see if it really does anything.

author: Creme Brulee

author: Sarah
body: I enjoyed using clinique correcting serum. I did find it a little bit greasy for my face but did lighten dark spots and moisturized my skin

author: Rosee
body: Serum was great! I saw a slight difference in my fine lines. It got softer as I consistently used it. The serum absorbs quickly into my skin and the texture is light and not sticky. The only concern is that if I looked closely, it looks like there's glitter (?) in it? I'm not sure what it is. Because I am more aware of what ingredients I use on my skin, that would be one thing I would keep in mind.

author: Jo2021
body: Product was great but sample was too small to really get the full benefits. I am sure if there was a bit more I would be able to see more results. Still very happy I was able to sample!

author: Beauty
body: The serum was nice to put on abs made my skin feel smooth. After a few weeks I noticed a smoother skin with less wrinkles. I donâ€™t have alot but want to start a skin regiment to help. I would use this product again.

body: This new serum is not good with rosecea or sensitive skin. The Custom Repair serum was amazing and many of my friends also used it.  Why would you stop selling a top product? Everyone keeps saying you will bring it back for this holiday season. Please tell us when.

author: LEEOWEN
body: Itâ€™s a great product. Went on very smooth with any grease

author: wasabi100

author: Egibson36

author: Rayraytray
header: Excellent serums would continue to use.

author: jana421

This correcting serum made my skin feel very soft. My skin felt plump after application. There was a nice tingling sensation that felt like it was working.

author: NEWFIE SAM
body: I have tried Clinque smart clinical repair for 2 weeks and I have found that my deep seated wrinkles have become less visible my face has become more vibrant when I look in the mirror now I see the 25-year-old instead of the 55-year-old woman that I am, I am totally amazed at how well this product works, they say that age is just a number, but there is no better feeling at looking in the mirror in the morning and love the person staring back at you. I am not one of those people who enjoy aging and I will not go gracefully into it, I will fight to The bitter end to give myself the self-confidence and the youth I had when I was 25 and this formula has given that to me it goes on so softly it is not oily like other products I have tried in the past it absorbs very well into the skin and I believe I have found myself a new product which gives me back my youth, my confidence and the ability to start my day loving myself, my skin and who I am as a person.

author: Sharn

author: Tammyd

author: Phoenix123

author: HC621

I will be using this product again in the future.

author: Tangrang

I also loved the moisture it gave me, unlike others which dries up my skin. I feel it would definitely give good results with longer use. I would update my review after using it for 2 months as I feel it would give visible results. I also recommended to a girlfriend.

author: Jenno3
body: It was a good serum. I did find it super runny compared to the other serums I have used. Because it was so wet, it felt like it took longer to â€œsinkâ€ into my skin because of it. I would recommend if someone asked me..but I would give them my honest opinion. I donâ€™t think I would purchase after receiving my sample though.

The lines around my eyes are not as noticeable and my skin looks so much more brighter and even.

author: Tammyd
header: Amazing Must Have now a staple
body: I absolutely loved this product. It has now become a staple in my facial routine. I highly recommend you try. You won't be disappointed.

author: Amanda75

author: KayfromTO

The sample only had enough for ten days but I do believe my skin looked better, felt amazing and my fine lines were slightly diminished. I can only imagine how great it would be after long term use!

author: Steelers87

author: Tina2010
body: Saw little or no results. My skin is softer. I don't 2 weeks is enough time to see actual results. Will use up what's left.

author: Dnoble
body: This serum is fantastic goes on smoothly. No parabens or fragrance. Seen Less wrinkles and fine lines. Love this product. Would highly recommend this to my family and friends.

author: KayfromTO
body: You need to add this wrinkle correcting serum to your daily skincare routine. Over two weeks, I saw a huge improvement in the wrinkles forming around mouth and eyes. Even in spots where I had no wrinkles forming, this improved those areas. I'll be making this serum part of my routine moving forward. As a high performing product and at a decent price, I highly recommend trying this product out!

author: Ash12
body: I love how smoothly this product applies and absorbs without leaving a unpleasant oily feeling afterwards. I have noticed a slight difference in my wrinkles around my eyes and am very curious to see the results after a longer period of time.

author: Mell B.

My only issue is that I wouldn't use this serum in the summer as you have to be careful not to be in the sun

author: danielladef
header: Review of Clinique Repair Wrinkle Serum
body: I personally did not like this serum as it did cause a rash. It is possible I was allergic to one of the ingredients however I have used many Clinique products in the past and never had a reaction like this. It has a nice smell and texture but did not work for me.

author: Mamabear1313
body: Not the results I thought I would have at all. Yes my skin was soft, however after 2 weeks or so of using this twice a day, there wasn't that much of a difference in the lines or spots on my face.

author: SarahJP
body: This serum is fantastic! After 3 days of use I noticed that my skin was softer. After a week my skin was noticeably smoother with some of the small smile lines reduced.

author: Eelaine
body: This is such a lovely serum - When using, it immediately made my skin softer and more supple. I am looking forward to purchasing the full size product very soon, and recommending to all of my friends!

author: Chickadee
body: I loved this serum! It was such a pleasure to try, so easily absorbed and took so little to use on the whole face. I found skin was hydrated and plumper, look of fine lines were diminished. Also took away a couple dark spots that were on my face, faded away. A little pricey but so worth the money. A definite must for a skincare regime at any age.

author: Jumpingranny
body: This product works. It was a bit irritating. The first time I used it, a layer of skin over a dark spot turned white and started to peel. The skin turned white and then flaked off. I had to be very careful to use sunscreen or I would burn faster than normal. The dark spots on my face did diminish. I believe that if I used for several weeks and am diligent with sunscreen my discolourations will be paler, if not gone all together.

author: MmmcL
body: I received a sample of the NEW *Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum* from The Home Tester Club, in exchange for my honest opinion. My Skin seems to be visibly rejuvenated and smoother to the touch. The serum definitely keeps my Skin hydrated all day. The product spreads evenly when applying and doesn't leave any oily feeling. I also love the fact that this product is ðŸš«fragrance free. As for the fine lines, i haven't noticed much difference at moment, i would possibly need to try the product a little longer.

author: Sarah156
body: I really liked this serum! It absorbed quickly and made my skin feel nice. I would purchase the full size to see the longer term effects of it.

author: jemardy
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a nice consistency and absorbs very quickly into my skin. It leaves my face feeling immediately very soft and smooth and feeling nice. However I have found since I started using this product that Ive been experiencing some breakouts. I haven't changed anything else in my routine so think my my skin just doesn't agree with the formula (could be something else though, hard to say). I havent seen much improvement in my wrinkles but its only been a couple weeks so would like to give it a chance to see if it works better over a longer period of time. It seems like a great product just might not be for me.

author: Libby40
body: I found the wrinkle correcting serum very nice. Makes your skin feel smooth & refreshed

author: Breanna

I noticed a better texture and it absorbs nicely without feeling sticky or greasy. The scent was also not over powering and quite enjoyable. I will be purchasing this again asap!

author: Pgervais
body: This product feel so good on the skin. I use it right after washing my face and it give me an instant glow and hydrate my skin. After a few time of using it i felt my skin more soft, plump and bouncy. Thereâ€™s no smell to the serum so its perfect for anyone. I would buy this serum again for sure!

author: Kcorb
body: I did notice a difference towards end of trial. Will be purchasing this product to keep momentum going. As a 50 year old female I need a product like this.

author: Keira
header: The product seem to be good
body: The packaging seem to be too small and I notice little to none when it comes to the effect of the product. It didnâ€™t give me any break outs but maybe its you have to use it for a longer period of time to be able to see the difference.

author: Miss Opter

author: Lisa C.

author: Rebeccave
body: I found this product to be very lightweight and plesant to use. It was easy to apply and even smelled nice. I would recommend this and would likely purchase again.

author: Hammond09
body: I found the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum to go on so smooth. You only need a little it goes a long way.

author: kat60
body: This serum works nicely. Even after using it for only a couple of weeks a can see a difference

author: bestie
body: I used this product twice daily after cleansing I didnt notice any difference and my face seems dry

author: Jyotika

author: Alli22
header: Clinique is a tried and tested product.
body: I have used Clinique products for years and the Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a great new product which i will continue to use and tell my friends about it.

author: Tracy

author: Melyane

author: Emandash

author: Wee_B

author: Lenny2

author: Lisa66

I liked the fact that it was scent free, easy to apply to my skin and immediately made my skin feel smooth and hydrated. Wrinkles appeared less prominent and noticeable. A little went a long way. Definitely recommend

author: Bella1982

author: WenWen78

author: Sallytricia

author: Sam Kerr
body: inique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum, is fantastic! This products reduced some of my fine lines and smoothed out some of my wrinkles, leaving my skin, looking smoother and brighter.

author: Dani39
body: I wasnâ€™t impressed with the product at all. It had a nice feel on the skin but I saw little to no improvement in my skin even using it everyday. The lines around my lips were smoothed out a little but it did not make any difference otherwise.

author: Racheld
body: I was impressed with the product and the results. I would buy again.

author: Meaganjoy

author: There
body: Fantastic job on this product ðŸ' ðŸ'Œ ðŸ' ðŸ™Œ ðŸ˜€,...........

author: Rayray
body: This was something new to try for me, Iâ€™m 37 and I have fine lines, so I was very excited to try Clinique smart clinical repair! There is no overpowering smell at all, the texture was amazing. It felt very nice and smooth on my skin not oily at all!

author: Pixxy
body: The Clinique wrinkle correcting serum is absolutely wonderful. It left my skin very soft, hydrated not oily at all. I feel that the wrinkles are slightly visible, but Iâ€™m sure if I was to use it longer I would probably notice a bigger difference.. I only received a small sample so not enough to notice a big difference. Would definitely be something that I would purchase and recommend to family and friends.. thanks for letting me sample this serum, Iâ€™m always looking for products that really work at improving the different challenges that we face as we age.

author: mom2samcar
body: I was very pleased to test the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I find the packaging VERY eye-catching and "posh". author: lynnz
body: The Serum has a delicate fragrance and it has a light Creamy texture. author: penelope
header: Amazing product and brighter skin X
body: In my 40s so some age spotting and tiny lines around my eyes. Dark circles, big pores...I could go on all night. But this stuff has made a huge difference in the feel and look of my skin. Age spots are slowly but surely fading. I have even noticed a little improvement in my dark circles. I plan on continuing using this product and it has even inspired me to incorporate a little more self care when it comes to my skin. Added bonus..it doesn't stress out my generally super sensitive skin.

author: Julia68
body: After a couple of weeks I did notice a little bit of my wrinkles smoothing out, they are quite deep and I am sure with longer use they would become less noticeable.

author: Gracie

Which has made my tester size last a long time. Will definitely be buying this product once my tester is out! Everyone, it's phenomenal!

author: Carcranna
body: I do notice a difference using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum each morning and evening for 4-days straight. The wrinkles on my forehead are not so prominent.

author: BeeSky
body: Serum keeps my skin feeling rejuvenated and fresh. Fine lines are reduced.

author: Nisie
body: This is a great lotion that you can easily buy anywhere. Clinique knocks it out of the park with their great skin supporting products

author: Pkg15
body: Full disclosure, I received this free to try. I have been using the sample provided for approximately one month now and overall I havenâ€™t noticed significant improvement although I do like the texture of the serum itself as it is voice rising and absorbs quickly. I will continue to use it to see how much additional benefit it brings. Worth a try!

author: RaeRae
body: This light weight serum was amazing on my skin. I felt a difference right away, I am excited to see the results in a few weeks.

author: Jenn08
body: Iâ€™m starting my adventure of being in my 40â€™s, & while I may no longer be a spring chicken, I keep my fingers crossed that my outer appearance continues to match my immature inner self. Iâ€™ll gladly take some help with that! I actually love Clinique smart clinical repair, as it may not reverse my years of neglect, it certainly added softness, & a new glow to my tired face, & eyes. My new must have favourite face product. Forever young! Or at least this little bottle of magic will keep me forever almost young.

author: Rhon902
body: Not a fan of the consistency. Nice enough product, but considering the price, not something I would buy.

author: mumonthemuv
body: This serum helped to reduce my dreaded â€œ11â€ lines. As someone who is just starting to purchase anti-aging products, I really liked how thick this serum was. It allowed for easy application and didnâ€™t run between my fingers like other products have.

author: Griffes64
body: I started using Clinique Wrinkle Correcting Serum 10 days ago and I noticed a difference within a few days. I think the longer I use it the better the results will be. I would definitely recommend this product to family and friends

author: Mamaof3
body: Was able to try this product for 2 weeks with a sample size. Did not notice any significant changes to problem areas but it might be that it wasnâ€™t enough time for the product to do its work. I would think a minimum of 1 month would be needed to see any visible changes

author: Snurse7
body: I like how this serum feels on my skin. After two weeks of use my skin feels tighter and the skin smoother. I have a line across my forehead has decreased and hopefully with longer use it will continue.

author: designerlover
body: excellent product that works well on wrinkles and prevention of new ones

author: Zercia
header: feels ligth on the skin. clea skin soft
body: My skin is softer smoother and it is not heavy on the face. I feel refresher is the face would add to my skin care.

author: Tabitha1925
body: It wasn't bad it would have probably been better if I had a proper skin care routine

author: Shorty
body: This wrinkle serum is fantastic. It goes on smooth and doesnâ€™t leave a sticky feeling. After a week I noticed a difference in my fine lines. My skin feels smooth and hydrated after using it daily. This will become part of my daily routine

author: Miss Opter
body: After 3 weeks of using this product I found that my skin was taunt and in some areas flaky. I generally have dry skin and thought this would be ideal. Sadly I was disappointed especially since I love other Clinique products such as moisture surge

author: Eva1957
body: Finished using vmy sample and my skin feel s nice and subtle and smooth. Right from the beginning I could feel the difference and hope to get some for Christmas.

author: Whammy
body: I didn't find a big difference in wrinkles but i did like how it made my skin feel and it didn't smell bad or chemically. I would continue to use it.

author: Eephee
body: I am not sure if itâ€™s because this product was very small for me to try over extended period of time . I find the serum good on the skin but I wasnâ€™t able to notice a significant difference

author: Carms
body: I have been using this product for 2 1/2 weeks. I used sparingly for the first few days and no reaction, so then used a good amount after that. It was very nice to use in the morning under my makeup and before bed. It left a nice sheen to the skin with some shimmer to it. After a week I noticed that there was some dryness and red to the skin, but this is expected from a retinoid. This seems to be passing now. I have received compliments about my skin from a couple of people! I havenâ€™t noticed any wrinkle reduction, but I think it is far too soon for that. I really liked this product overall.

author: Nanlovemath
body: After maybe 10 days I observed some improvement but not really work. 3 weeks using the product and still no notable changes.

author: trish3
body: I waited a couple of weeks to do my review so I could get a really good feel for this serum. I used it nightly after washing my face and applied a moisturizer after letting the serum soak in for a couple of minutes. I experienced no irritation whatsoever and found my skin looked and felt smoother and clearer after just a few days. I didnâ€™t expect to like it as much as I do! I will most definitely purchase it after my sample supply runs out.

author: JenLee Bee
header: Not the results I was hoping for
body: The product goes on smoothly with no greasy feeling and just a little does the job. I did not see a major improvement in my wrinkles disappearing. There is little to no smell of the cream to interfere with your other daily face product routine.

author: Boymom
header: Not sure I have seen results.
body: I have been using the product for 2 weeks now but I am unsure that my wrinkles have diminished. Maybe after a longer period I would see better results.

author: Mickybum
body: I love this serum. I smooth ribbon at night and it makes my skin feel silky and soft. Non greasy and absorbs easily.

author: Summer

author: Nana P.
body: I really like this serum! I noticed a positive difference in My skin! I would definitely use it again.

author: nora 62
body: This is a nice, light product with a very light fragrance. It feels nice on my skin, and seemed to brighten my skin quite a bit. I'm not sure how effective it was, but I may buy it in future. At the moment, I have quite a lot of other serums, so I need to use them up first.

author: A believer
body: I really got a surprise at how much of a difference this little sample made.

author: Pasky
body: After 2 weeks of use it works as far as 60 %. Day use leaves the smooth nice skin, after overninght the skin is sometimes dry. I would recommend to use it for at least one month

author: Catspajamas
body: This is a light and refreshing serum that absorbs beautifully into your skin. After using for 2 weeks, I can notice a slight plumping effect around my eyes and mouth. My skin feels smooth and hydrated thanks to the hyaluronic acid. It has not promoted any breakouts on my sensitive skin. I will be adding this product into my beauty routine.

author: Poko204
body: I enjoy using Clinique, it's a well known company and I love the quality. It almost felt I was using a primer,

author: Heidi35
body: This product was great. It was very smooth going on. Was very pleased

author: Mar-72
body: I loved how hydrating the clinique serum felt on my skin. I did notice some improvement in my wrinkles. I am sure if I keep applying it I will see a bigger difference.

author: Leanneonastar

As I continued to use the serum and my skin developed many dry patches, red spots and an overall sensitivity to the product. I continued to use it in hope it was just my skin adapting.. but sadly it did not improve. I love Clinique products but this one will not be added to my must haves.

author: Sona87
body: There are products with better efficacy on the market for a similar price point. Nothing great

author: Jag114
body: I found my skin texture improved with fewer visible lines and less redness. Also found my skin brighter.

author: kcvrossi
body: I'm in love with this product, it's a shame it's not long, but I'm already planning my purchase, I really liked it,

author: Mum123

author: Troj79

author: Jenn867
body: The serum itself was nice and made my skin soft. I was using it on fine lines around my eyes and forehead. I didnâ€™t notice a difference for fine lines.

author: BNL80
body: I received this clinique serum from Hometesterclub with the promise to write a review. I wondered how I was going to make such a little bottle last long enough to know if It worked and if I liked it. It blew me away! After just a couple days I started noticing changes in the worry lines in my forehead, theyâ€™ve been becoming less noticeable. I will definitely be buying more!

author: Jayee47
body: I noticed results within a week. My skin looked more smoother and fresh,. I get lots of compliment since i used this. I love this product

author: TheJillian
header: You can feel the active ingredients
body: This serum doesnâ€™t specify the ingredients on the tube but I feel like it must have retinol in it, from how my skin feels. Retinol does work to smooth wrinkles but it takes months of use. Short term this product softened my skin and gave it a kind of matte texture, which is very different from most serums I use. It absorbs very quickly which I love because Iâ€™m always in a hurry to layer my skincare. Overall this is a great product, I would love to continue using for a few months to be able to really tell how effective it is.

author: MelGaL
body: I have been using Clinique products for years now so when I saw a sample for the clinical wrinkle repair I was so excited! And it did not disappoint. Iâ€™m 45 and have fine lines and dull textured skin with visible pores. I used the clinical repair only in the evening and noticed a tremendous difference in my skin! My skin appears brighter, pores are less visible and overall my face looks so much more healthy! The price is high for this product but you donâ€™t need much to do your entire face so I believe itâ€™s worth the price. I have already told my friends/family about this product and I have purchased the full size. Thanks again Clinique and Home Atwater Club!

author: Thradia
header: Smooth and easy, but slow results
body: My first use of the Clinique serum was that it felt 'wet'. However, once you massage it into the skin that quickly goes away. It feels light, not like a heavy dense creme. It goes on smooth and I appreciate that it has no scent at all. I used this every couple of days for over two weeks and small a very small amount of change. It could very well be that it takes a longer time to begin working, but for this trial, I saw only a small change. The redness in my cheeks did get better and became a more normal colour. However, I did not see any other changes in my skin. Overall, it is a nice feeling product, go on easily and smooth. Probably a longer duration with a strict routine would bring better results.

author: greekgoddess

author: Rae132

author: Mon29

author: Rita2
header: It was easy to put on, but not sure.

author: Melissa91
body: It felt nice on the skin and just a small amount covered a large area.

author: DebrahB
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a very good product, easy to use and would recommend. Clinique has always been an innovative company and their products reflect that

author: Holly$$
body: Love this product. I have already purchased the full size product. Any women out there just looking to be smoothed out it is great! Canâ€™t recommend enough!!

author: Onelove
body: Works wonders the serums was fabulous and was so happy that it all worked out for me

author: Jess89

author: Ann01

author: daksha26

author: Trisha1869

author: itslaurlmao
body: Iâ€™ve really been enjoying this product. Every time I apply it I immediately notice my skin feels so soft and smooth.I didnâ€™t really notice any reduction in wrinkles or fine lines, but itâ€™s only been two weeks so I have high hopes.

author: Melissay
body: I really loved this product for tackling my lines and wrinkles. The texture is smooth and had a good fragrance.

author: EmilieMM

author: DizGal

It goes on easily (a little goes a long way) and absorbs very quickly. It made my skin feel smoother.

author: Lollylmh
body: I received the serum and started using it morning and night. It has a very nice smooth feel and absorbs quickly. I didnâ€™t feel there was enough product to form an opinion on wrinkle reduction

author: Natfur
body: It seems to be a fairly strong retinol product, which is what I need. It would be better if the packaging said what percent retinol it contained. I think it is unscented, which a lot of people will appreciate.

author: Eaaja
body: I found this to help with hydration and making my skin appear smooth and soft. The sample wasnâ€™t large enough to use long enough to be able to notice any longer term effects

author: Meganlj
header: I would buy and add to daily routine

author: Sunnysoleil

I didnâ€™t notice changes in my fine lines, but it was probably too early too see any. Maybe after longer use there would be visible results.

author: Jinny
header: Does feel that the skin get very smooth,
body: feels great applying it, i just wish i could see a good difference

author: DJW144
body: I used this product for 2 weeks. I did notice a bit of a difference in some of my problem areas for sure. I have very oily and sensitive skin and this product felt amazing! author: Daliah
