author: Momofthree
body: Clinique smart clinical repair truly repairs! I love how my serum is super light. I really like the smell also its not overpowering. What i love about the clinique smart clinical is you will see the result in just a couple of days. Will definitely purchase a full size and use it in everyday routine.

author: MrsJ13
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum has some powerful ingredients like hyaluronic acid which helps draw moisture into your skin especially in these winter months. As well as retinoid which is key to clear skin and fine line reduction. I was able to layer serums with ease. My skin felt fresh and very soft after application. A definite must try in serums.

author: Bon76
body: The Clinique serum glides easily on to your skin and is absorbed right away. I use it before putting on my makeup. I love how it makes my skin feel and have seen results already. a great serum.

author: Danni23
body: This serum is absolutely incredible! Iâ€™ve tried a lot of different anti-aging serums but find they donâ€™t react well with my skin. My skin in just a few weeks feels so much softer, and brighter. Itâ€™s very gentle and soft smelling

author: JojoK
body: Iâ€™ve used many Clinique products and I think this is the best one so far. I used a small amount twice daily after toner. Smart Clinical Repair had very minimal fragrance and a thin, yet lush half cream-half gel consistency that smoothed easily over my face. My skin rapidly drank up this light, refreshing serum. It left my face deeply hydrated with an amazing non-greasy glow, was a great addition to my other skincare products and wore well under my buildable foundation. The sample only had enough for ten days but I do believe my skin looked better, felt amazing and my fine lines were slightly diminished. I can only imagine how great it would be after long term use!

author: Steelers87
body: Actually surprised that I saw any results as usually these products donâ€™t work. There were minimal results, but most definitely were noticeable. Quite happy with the product for what the normal price is!

author: Griffes64
body: I started using Clinique Wrinkle Correcting Serum 10 days ago and I noticed a difference within a few days. I think the longer I use it the better the results will be. I would definitely recommend this product to family and friends

author: Shorty
body: This wrinkle serum is fantastic. It goes on smooth and doesnâ€™t leave a sticky feeling. After a week I noticed a difference in my fine lines. My skin feels smooth and hydrated after using it daily. This will become part of my daily routine

author: Alliemac
body: Really nice serum. No smell and it didn't irritate my skin. It left my skin soft, plump, and radiant.

author: Kitty
body: It did not work well I still have fine lines I like that it has no scent. The sample is too small. I barely had enough for 13 days.

author: Vicki
body: So overall I think its "ok" I don't have very many wrinkles to begin with. The ones that are there are not super defined, so in reality, a wrinkle cream like this should've approved their overall appearance, In my opinion anyways. I don't see much change to be honest. My complexion seems to have improved. I use the cream once in the morning as well as at night.

author: large1cream
header: I had no idea I had sensitive skin...
body: Unfortunately, I had a reaction to this serum. My skin near my eyes seemed to break out in a rash. I really wanted to love this one but had to stop using after a few days.

author: Backwoodsboots
body: The product definately provided moisture and was non sticky or greasy. It worked great under makeup and was easy to layer with multiple other moisturisers. Including cream and oils. However I wasn't wowed. I didn't notice a huge difference in skin appearance or texture. My go to is Nivea in the blue tub at night and with sunscreen during the day and I usually swap out other drug store brands to try periodically. I was excited to try a luxury brand, I just wasn't impressed. I would not spend my money on this. The scent was nice. Not too sweet or medicinal and didn't linger once absorbed.

author: Kibbles n Bits
body: I like how light it feels when I apply and definitely noticed some results after about a week and a half of use. Helps my skin look fresh and tighter.

author: spacey
body: As requested, I tried this serum twice a week for two weeks, morning and evening. The serum is very strong. The first week I had some reactions, redness and slight peeling. I only used it on my forehead where I have set wrinkles. My forehead isn't usually sensitive, so I was quite surprised that I had this reaction. After the third use I had no more reactions. I was a bit sad I can't use it for the undereye area, where I have some fine lines, but since my forehead reacted, this was probably for the best. I suggest starting slowly with it, once a week in the evening only. I can't notice any improvement in my forehead wrinkles, and I will continue to use the sample to see if continuous use will provide better results.

author: 40andFab
body: Overall, good product to apply on the skin. No irritants or scents. It could have been a bit more creamy and moisturizing.

author: beehive
body: The product soaks into your skin very quickly. I found it difficult to know if you have applied enough of the product equally over your entire face without taking more out of the small sample. The product is also unscented.

author: Runriz
body: I don't typically gravitate to Clinique products but was surprised at how much I enjoyed this serum. It has a light, cream-like texture that applies smoothly and absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky or oily residue. It does have a very light scent which is not overwhelming or bothersome like other skincare products. One of the things I noticed immediately as I started using this serum is that my skin felt so hydrated the morning after using it. I find that anything with retinoids can be drying but this was not the case at all and I think the addition of Hyaluronic Acid in this serum really helps. I haven't seen any changes in my fine lines or wrinkles but I think that takes time and comes with more consistent use.

author: 40andFab
body: Overall, good product to apply on the skin. No irritants or scents. It could have been a bit more creamy and moisturizing.

author: beehive
body: The product soaks into your skin very quickly. I found it difficult to know if you have applied enough of the product equally over your entire face without taking more out of the small sample. The product is also unscented.

author: Runriz
body: I don't typically gravitate to Clinique products but was surprised at how much I enjoyed this serum. It has a light, cream-like texture that applies smoothly and absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky or oily residue. It does have a very light scent which is not overwhelming or bothersome like other skincare products. One of the things I noticed immediately as I started using this serum is that my skin felt so hydrated the morning after using it. I find that anything with retinoids can be drying but this was not the case at all and I think the addition of Hyaluronic Acid in this serum really helps. I haven't seen any changes in my fine lines or wrinkles but I think that takes time and comes with more consistent use.

author: Skier58
body: Serum was fragrance free and didnâ€™t leave skin feeling greasy or sticky. After trying this for three weeks skin felt softer and more plumped. Neck wrinkles and fine facial wrinkles appeared less noticeable.

author: Nancy63
body: Used this product for the specified amount of time. It did leave my face feeling soft, but not sure that it did much for the wrinkles?

author: katli
body: This product worked well for me. I felt and saw a difference in the firmness of my skin. My skin seemed to look younger after using it for a while. Left my skin feeling firm, hydrated, and radiant. Will definitely continue to use in the future.

author: Testing123
body: The serum went on smooth & silky without leaving any tacky residue as some I have tried in the past do & do not find at all pleasant. There was the faintest of scents when applying but just a hint lingered once applied. It gave my skin a look of renew, possibly with less wrinkIes but I'm unable to tell from one day to the next. Perhaps next time it will have to be before & after photos. I received Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. #FreeProduct #TryBeforeYouBuy #GotItFree

author: Mini23
body: I love how easily the serum was absorbed into my skin, and how the fragrance was light and subtle so that it didn't irritate me.

author: Victoria99
body: I love the formulation of this serum; it is an easy to spread, gel like consistency and I found that a little pea sized amount would cover my entire face. No noticeable fragrance either which I loved and I didnâ€™t get any sensitivity from it either. Overall I would definitely recommend if youâ€™re looking to incorporate an anti-aging type product into your routine, although for those already using a retinol I would probably suggest skipping this as it may not be strong enough for experienced retinol users.

author: PEI Girl
header: I did not see any noticeable changes.
body: The product went on very smoothly and made my skin feel good but just see any difference.

author: Brinikins
header: I truly think this has worked
body: I'm getting lines around my lips, and it's really bothering me. I was excited to jump on the chance to use this Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I applied it twice daily, morning and night before my usual moisturizer. I swear after a few weeks of use that the wrinkles are appearing less noticeable- not as deep, less pronounced. And I mean these really bother me as they're the only lines on my face- and I blame it on my cigarette smoking days. I shall use up every drop in this tube and purchase a full size, cuz I am confident these lines are fading!

author: Angela
body: Deep lines on my forehead have faded and my skin has a nicer glow! The cream feels nice and light, not too thick or greasy.

author: Pugmama
body: I throughly enjoyed using this product. It had such a lightweight texture. When I applied it, it gives my skin a soft matte feeling. I used this product every day for 2 weeks and can clearly see a difference in my overall skin appearance. I immediately purchased a full size Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum!

author: Britt92
body: A nice thin retinol product. I really enjoyed using this

author: Bug21
body: Not happy with this product. No change is my skin after using the product 2 times per day for three weeks.

author: jessvach
body: Iâ€™ve been using serums for a while, trying to find one that works and I honestly saw REAL results with this one in just a few weeks. My skin was softer, smoother and my fine lines disappeared. Especially on my forehead and around my eyes. I highly recommend this serum and will be repurchasing it.

author: ShiSha
body: I used the serum for 14 days straight and am thoroughly impressed. Not much difference was seen in fine lines but I think over time it will be effective. Skin overall was brighter and plumper. No dryness was noticed as with other retinol serums, even when the serum was not supplemented with a moisturizing. On a regular day I applied the serum as part of my night into routine after cleansing and before applying my moisturizer.

author: GingerSnap
body: Loved testing this Clinique Wrinkle Repair Serum. I found it goes on very smooth and absorbs fast. It didnâ€™t leave my skin feeling oily and it didnâ€™t leave a shine. I was actually putting it all over my neck as well and found it left it feeling soft. Iâ€™m only 41 but I know protecting my skin now will only benefit me in the long run. Not too mention my skin has witnessed a lot of sunshine in its 41 years. Definitely recommending this product!

author: Neet89
body: I recieved the serum as a trial product for 1 week. The serum is light in base and doesn't make ur skin oily. It leaves my skin well hydrated and has a nice light scent. I can't say much about fine lines as i used it for a short time but its a worth trying for daily routine

author: Kimberly1010
body: I would highly recommend this product! The product itself was a nice consistency, easy to apply. Roducy goes on smooth and didn't alter the appearance of my foundation.There is no smell, not good or bad. The results took some time, I didn't notice any change in the first week, but by the end of week two the results were visible. By the end of week three, I saw serious improvement in some of the deeper wrinkles. I was surprised at how much improvement I saw after only three weeks! I only used the product in combination with my daily moisturizer so I could be sure to track any changes and that they were solely attributable to the serum. Overall, super happy with this product and will add to my arsenal.

author: Pindy73
body: Amazing product with great results. The product goes on light & smooth leaving your skin feeling soft & radiant.

author: Sherese
body: I donâ€™t have a lot of wrinkles to start with but my forehead lines and smile lines were a bit prominent so after testing be sure to follow the instructions and use sunscreen .

author: HippieDippie
body: This product was just okay overall. It would definitely work on sensitive skin. I used it for 2 weeks, but didn't notice any change in the condition of my skin

author: JB
body: Since using this product, the only significant differences I've noticed are negative. Within a few days of starting use, I developed dry, scaly patches around my face (despite having used the other retinol cream prior to this), really bad acne, and for everyday I've used it, I've had horrible headaches. Not sure if the third one is related, but I RARELY get headaches--never ones that last for days or can't be cured with an aspirin. After washing my face and avoiding the product, all three of these symptoms have begun to subside. I still love Clinique and will continue to use their products, but this one's a total bust.

author: ellmgpnty
body: It is nice on the skin after using for several days. It is most effective when I use it in the evening. Feels soft and smooth in the morning.

author: Ausomemom2
body: This serum was awesome! I loved how it absorbed into my skin and didn't leave it feeling greasy as I've found some serums do. I liked that it wasn't harsh and didn't leave my skin red. It really made me feel like my skin was firmer and definitely noticed a difference in the fine lines, especially on my forehead. Very happy I got chosen to try this sample out for free as this is a product I will be seeking out in the near future!

author: Jackie27
header: This product stands out among the Rest
body: Clinique Smart clinical repair wrinkles correcting serum is by far the best serum I've ever used. For as.short as 2 weeks, it made a lot of difference on my skin and crow deer around my eyes..it doesn't have a strong smell and was not sticky at all.. I highly recommend this product to everyone who wants to reverse aging!

author: Skin Care Gal
header: Clinique wrinkle repair serum is light.
body: Clinique wrinkle repair serum is light weight and feels great on the skin. I do not wake up feeling like I need to wash my face immediately unlike some heavier serums. It doesn't have a smell and applies evenly. Would definitely buy these for myself and as gifts.

author: Monchan
body: I had the chance to try the Clinique Smart Clinical serum for 2 weeks. I love the fact that the smell was not too strong. My skin was well hydrated after each applications. I like the serum, but there was no wow effects.

author: KellyK08
body: I received this serum free of charge to test out. I used it twice daily around my eyes and frown lines and notice a slight improvement in smoothness. Very moisturizing.

author: chefborkd
body: It goes on lightly and smoothly. I think that there were some results, but they weren't very noticeable. Perhaps because of the fact that I only used it for 2 weeks. I'll finish up the tube and hopefully see more visible results.

author: SuzieZie
body: I have been using the sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum, and I am pleasantly surprised with the results. I noticed a difference around the two-week mark and have maintained those results throughout the month. It glides on your skin well and is absorbed quickly. I recommend this serum for anyone who is looking to combat fine lines, especially around your mouth.

author: Amazing40's
body: Hello all... I have been using this amazing Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for about 3 weeks. I can already notice my fine wrinkles around my eyes disappearing like magic!! The serum that you apply rubs in quite easily. You need that especially around your delicate skin around your eyes. It is not greesy at all. A little bit of it goes a long way. Dare I say that it's also a little plumper around the eyes as well. Looking youthful in a bottle !!

author: FannyF
header: I did not find it overly moisturizing.
body: I found the serum to be thicker than I expected but, it wasn't as moisturizing as I had hoped. Still a decent product from a very trusted brand.

author: lolawest
body: I applied this serum under my moisturizer as directed. The results were not miraculous, but there does seem to be a reduction in the lines between my eyebrows.

author: ellmgpnty
body: It is nice on the skin after using for several days. It is most effective when I use it in the evening. Feels soft and smooth in the morning.

author: Alzan
body: The product is lightweight, like a gel, and easily spreadable. I didnâ€™t experience any irritation, even close to the eyes. After application, the skin feels soft and plumped. I still need more time of use to evaluate the results on the wrinkles, but up to now, itâ€™s a really good product!

author: Stephanie 16
body: I received my sample of the wrinkle serum from home tester club and I totally loved it! My skin looked and felt so much better! It totally helped with my fine lines and wrinkles! I will definitely be purchasing this product!

author: mtl mom
body: I tried Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for the first time over the past couple of weeks, applying every 2-3 days. I find it was especially efficient on my forehead, I didn't notice much change elsewhere on my face, but I'll take it! I will keep using at night and look forward to continued improvements.

author: Xaleah
header: Absorbs well, not sticky, no residue
body: I am not sure if this will help with any wrinkles or not as the length of testing and sample size is significantly small and I prefer to try skin care for longer amounts of time to see what it is doing for me. However, It its a nice gel like textured serum, I really like the thickness of it. It absorbs really well and quickly. There was no sticky feeling or residue, so all of these things are fantastic properties that I look for in Skincare.

author: Naz79
body: After using the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for two weeks, I noticed that my skin looks brighter and smoother! very satisfied with this product and would definitely recommend to anyone looking to improve the color and texture of their skin.

author: emily12
body: Product goes on smoothly, however feels a little bit tacky on the skin. I noticed smoother plumper skin after first use and even more so after third use.

author: BeautyGran
body: This is a super-concentrated serum with anti-aging components, including peptide-rich blend, CL1870 Laser Focus Complex and potent retinoid and hyaluronic acid. The product is supposed to target Your first fine lines to those stubborn creases, which I was hoping it would do. There was no scent to speak of, and was a light formula which absorbed quickly into my skin. Because the sample was a small one I only had enough for 15 days usage, used sparingly morning and night. Iâ€™ve seen a little bit of improvement on the wrinkles under my eyes/upper cheeks, where the wrinkles appeared plumped up. My skin does feel significantly smoother. Cautions were to avoid too much sun and not to use other retinol products when using this product, which I followed. If I were to use this product for several months I would hope for better results.

author: Terri
body: I thank you for the sample.I have tried so many face products that say one thing but when you try the product it does nothing. Your product does what the label says.Do you have any coupons for facial products? Thank you again

author: Vivi55
body: I loved the texture of the serum and the way it went on smoothly. My skin looked noticeably smoother with a decrease in the look of any wrinkles within two weeks.

author: Sallez
body: Works amazing! Gone on super smoothly and without any residue. I notice results within 2 weeks of using it.

author: Mannamanias
body: Clinique Smart Clinicial Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is quite the impressive product, powered by its unique blend of 1870Laser Focus Complex (TM),Retinoid, and Hyaluronic Acid, fighting your fine lines and wrinkles from 3 different angles (Resurface, Replant, and Renew) and such high rated test stats 84%- Deeper Wrinkles Look Reduced, 94%- Skin Feels Smoother, 87%- skin feels more plumped (after 10 days)) I've been using this product now 3 times a week for about 3 weeks now and can honestly say this Serum REALLY DOES live up to "uts hype!" I too after only 3 weeks am starting to experience slow improvements. Considering how richly potent this serum formula still a pleasant use experience, nice light weight, non greasy, quick absorb formula with absolutely zero irritation or "tingly's of any sort and leaves you with a nice dewy glow. I feel that for what all this product not only offers BUT DELIVERS (in results) that its priced at a very reasonable price point. Great and Effective!

author: Rachel7884
header: Helped reduce the start of my fine lines
body: I used the serum for 2 weeks. Unfortunately it was a small sample that I had to use it sparingly just between my eyebrows and on my forehead where a few fine lines were starting. I did notice a reduction in the fine lines of about 50%. I believe the product would work very well if used on a regular basis.

author: Skincare11
body: I really enjoyed the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I could feel the results. I have fine lines that were smoother and my skin felt and looked tighter. I look forward to see the difference when I keep using it. You couldn't see instant results but you can see the changes week by week and feel instant results.

author: Xxpmmilm
body: I love clinique so Iam super excited to try this smart clinical repair serum. It glides smoothly on skin and absorbs quickly without sticky feeling. It does give hydration and makes skin feel soft and smooth. I have dry skin and my skin is loving this serum. I did not notice drastic and significant effect with wrinkle and fine line reduction but it is worth a try. I would love to purchase this serum to continue and see the best result it can offer.

author: Ginnyp
header: It turns back the hands of time
body: I received my free trial of Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I had no expectations as I have never tried a serum before. I have to say I'm impressed. My forehead and eye lines have significantly diminished.

author: apera99
header: Too soon to see any difference
body: Iâ€™ve been using it for about two weeks now. I was happy with how quickly it absorbed without any greasy feeling. Thereâ€™s also no heavy scent, itâ€™s really light which is a plus for me. As far as reduction in wrinkles, itâ€™s much too soon to tell. Iâ€™m going to keep using it though as Iâ€™ve been happy with the application and product overall.

author: CliniqueFan
body: Started using it on October 27, once a day at night, every single day. The texture is creamy yet liquid. Absorbs nicely and very quickly, yet you can still feel it because the skin becomes smooth and soft. It does not leave any residue or shine. I used quite a lot of product every time, since I like to thoroughly saturate my face, neck and chest. There is no allergic reaction or breakouts after using it for 2 weeks. Unfortunately it has not been enough time to see the difference so itâ€™s hard to tell how effective it is. I have been Clinique fan and user for 2 decades and Iâ€™m sure itâ€™s another amazing product. Clinique never disappointed me.

author: Renski54
body: I've been using this product two times a day for the last two weeks. My skin seems brighter and smoother. No more dry patches and blotches seem to be fading.

author: Oldlady64
body: I liked the feel of it and its smell this is very important to me, it did not leave a greasy feeling after using it. I also felt the firmness of it after just a few days it plumped up the areas where the wrinkles are and diminished them quite somewhat.

author: PriscillaCV
body: I started using this day and night for about 2 weeks. I have some early signs of aging on my forehead, between my brows, and under my eyes. I noticed quite the improvement within a few days! I was very impressed and it's gone to kind of even out my skin texture. I love that the product is easy to apply and the slight pearlescent sheen helps with blurring any imprefections.

author: Canadafinds
body: I found the serum to give my skin an instant smoothness. My skin felt moisturized and softer.

author: RizDaud
body: I tried and tested Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum. The serum has in it's composition skin texture improving ingredients like retinol and Hyaluronic Acid that helps make the skin more smoother and plumped. I loves the serum and looking forward to keep using it in my skin care routine. After two weeks, my skin texture looks really good! The serum is a bit on a pricey side but it is worth the splurge. If you are looking for and good quality serum this Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a good investment.

author: Beri1872
body: This is a really nice anti-aging serum. The texture is a light, liquidy gel, very soft. Applies nicely on the skin and itâ€™s fast absorbed. Has a very low, almost not-there scent. Iâ€™ve been using it as the third step on my skincare routine day and night: after cleanser and toner, before my moisturizer. It is recommended to use SPF while using this product and for two weeks after because of its retinol content. I really like the immediate results of plump and glowy skin. Even though itâ€™s a light formula, it feels very hydrating and moisturizing. Iâ€™m only giving 4 stars because two weeks werenâ€™t really enough for me to see a difference in my very fine lines around the mouth and a bit deeper ones on my neck.

author: Aly456
body: The serum feels so nice on my skin! Improved my texture and feeling!

author: SyerraE
header: No visible difference but does feel nice
body: I had high hopes for the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum however I was sadly a little disappointed. After two weeks of continuous use morning and night, I did not see any visible difference to my skin or wrinkles. I took before and after photos in the same lighting to do a comparison and even upon closer inspection did not see a difference. My skin did however feel a bit smoother and I did like the feel of this product as I applied it and the rate of absorption.

author: Neatchica
body: The liked how the serum goes on nicely on my face. I loved the smooth feeling of the serum. There is no greasy feeling.

author: Linder
body: I tried this product and immediately felt a tightness in my skin. My skin felt really good ,did not feel greasy just refreshed. I would defernatly buy this product and have loved using it.

author: Nicole123
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a nice serum. The serum has a good consistency and applies nicely. Used it daily for 2 weeks and donâ€™t see much if any change in skin but I also donâ€™t have lot of wrinkles. I would continue using it.

author: RiyaB
header: It helped but could have done better
body: I have been using it for about 2 weeks now. It seems to work by making my skin looks brighter but my problem area (my forehead lines and very fine crowfeet) didn't improve as much as I would have expected. They are still visible.

author: Littlea ash
header: A serum I like to try
body: Got the sample try full tube. The unsecnted liquid texture was smooth and easy to spread. It didn't irritated my skin and my face feel soft after use.I didn't see obviously result for the wrinkle yet but willing to try a full size later.

author: Kelligirl
body: I've been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for about 2 weeks now. I haven't noticed a huge difference yet, but with wearing a facemask and glasses everyday, I'm not surprised. I will continue to use the product though, to give it more time to work.

author: jonandjules
body: I applied this serum every day for two weeks, concentrating on the area of my face with the most wrinkles - my forehead. The serum went on smoothly, absorbed well and had no noticeable scent. I took a picture before and then another one after two weeks of use and I believe there is a noticeable improvement in my skin texture. I think this serum is effective!

author: misscharr
body: This serum turned out to be awesome. I was slightly nervous because it is thicker then a regular serum in my opinion. However it goes on smooth and is not sticky which was my concern. It made my skin feel smooth and soft and overall was very satisfied with this product.

author: victoria
body: The serum is a nice consistency not too thin like other ones and has a nice light scent to it. However, after using it I never noticed a difference in my skin.

author: F_Sim
header: Great light serum that asborbs well
body: I liked trying Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle correcting serum, the formula was light and easily absorbed by the skin. However it left my skin a little dry by its own and I had to apply another cream or lotion on top. I did not notice a big improvement in my wrinkles but I still enjoyed trying the product and would recommend it to anyone looking for a light serum that will help reducing wrinkles.

author: Babysou21
body: The product is fluid, spreads well and penetrates easily into the skin. After more than 2 weeks of use, there is a slight improvement in the pockets under the eyes. There are also shallower fine lines. So there is some long-term effectiveness but nothing spectacular.

author: Momof5
body: I very much enjoyed using this serum. I would put it on before bed and would notice my skin feeling softer by morning. The texture felt softer and smoother. Unfortunately, I did not notice any change in my crow feet lines around my eyes or the ones on my forehead. The wrinkles didnâ€™t not change at all. I did like the consistency of the serum. It was light and easily absorbed. It wasnâ€™t oily and did not feel heavy or leave a film on my face (so nothing on my pillowcase!). The smell was very light and pretty, as well. I would consider purchasing this product with the hopes of more change in my skin, with a deeper, prolonged use.

author: Jama
body: I love the way my skin feel with this serum, looks fresh and silky.

author: Mistay23
body: I enjoyed this sample, it goes on smooth and dries on your face instantly. Made my skin so soft and smooth and feeling firm after a few days. Light scented. I would reccomend it.

author: Tra-la-la
body: I always liked Clinique products and was happy to try this one. This serum goes pretty well and absorbs quickly. Itâ€™s smells nice but not overly scented. I think this serum made my skin brighter and healthy looking. It does have some effect on fine lines if you use it daily for some period of time. Unfortunately my sample was very small to see the full result. Overall, I am satisfied and may consider to buy a full bottle in the future.

author: Suzie
body: I tried this and i love that uts not greasy. Its smooth and made my skin not so dry

author: Mich123
body: After using this serum every other night for a couple weeks, I noticed a small difference. I didn't find that the serum did anything for fine lines in those two weeks, but I did notice that my skin looked slightly firmer. I have a fine line on my forehead, and didn't notice any difference in the depth or size of this fine line. I do however think my face looked generally firmer the morning after I put the serum on, as I applied it to my whole face with emphasis on the fine line. I think I would have to use the serum for longer to truly test it. Otherwise, the packaging was nice. The letters were easy to read and the white letters on the purple background look great. The screw on cap does get messy as the serum is thin and a little runny. The pearlescence of the serum was pretty and not super noticeable once applied.

author: Rosie
body: I feel like my skin is softer. It seems like some of my fine lines are fading as well. Doesnâ€™t leave my skin feeling greasy. I like a lot.

Even though I did not see a difference in the wrinkles I feel like it definitely changed the feel and look of my skin. Made it feel more soft and look more plump as soon as I put it on. I would absolutely recommend trying this product,

author: AGS26
header: It is a great product and I would buy it
body: I donâ€™t think 2 weeks was long enough to see huge results. Iâ€™ll keep using it!

author: Watkins_sahm
header: Unfortunately did not work for me.
body: Thank you Clinique and home test club for letting me try clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum for free. The packaging is very eye catching, the feeling of the serum itself is your typical smooth almost watery texture. I tried this serum for almost 3 weeks twice a day and unfortunately I did not see any improvement in my wrinkles.

author: CherylOtt
body: I love the lightweight formula. It left my skin feeling soft and supple. I noticed a difference in about a week with daily use. My skin looked much brighter and it looked much smoother.

author: Dana30
body: This wrinkle serum is a great product. I feel like it really penetrates my skin without leaving it feeling oily or greasy. I felt like I started seeing results and my skin felt great.

author: Shasha

author: Kerry74

My skin definitely feels smoother, and I believe that some of the fine lines are looking less noticeable. I think that with a longer period of time, my skin would show a more significant change than it currently does. The serum soaks into the skin nicely and smells pleasant. I was careful to follow the instructions of using sunscreen, so I cannot testify as to whether it does, in fact, make your skin more sensitive to sunlight. Overall, I am glad I got the opportunity to try this serum and will consider purchasing a full size bottle.

author: Mommy.joyjoy

Honestly, being a mom of 3 super energetic toddlers will give you many wrinkles, but I used this cream for 2 weeks and glad I tried it. I noticed my wrinkles on my outer eyes and forehead have a little improvement. Also, my skin seems more even in texture. I wish this is a big bottle so I could have seen more of its magic for a month.

author: bellabamba

author: Mas40

author: Melpinto86

author: ashley
body: This product seems pretty good. I would like to see more long term effects, but so far I would definitely recommend it. It does make your skin feel smoother

author: Yvieeh

I definitely see a difference and I think if I can see a change within that timeframe then I would expect to see more in another two weeks. Itâ€™s light and not greasy. Iâ€™m happy with the application and overall product. I would recommend this for sure.

author: Hanajee
body: I received this trial product in the mail and started Using it right away. The product is light weight and creamy textured with a light fragrance to it. I apply the serum as part of my skincare routing after my toner and before moisturizer. Product does not pull the skin and layers really nicely. I noticed some of my smile lines are softer, so the product looks very promising! Iâ€™m excited to see the full results with longer use.

author: mayaa0702
body: My skin loveeeed this serum! it gave it some hydration, some lifting and some anti age preventing! I felt a difference in only 2 weeks of use and I would recommend it to everyone who is looking for an anti-age serum.

author: Princepa71

author: Dana30
body: This wrinkle serum is a great product. I feel like it really penetrates my skin without leaving it feeling oily or greasy. I felt like I started seeing results and my skin felt great.

author: Shasha
body: My face felt fine on the first 3 days of using it. Then suddenly on day 4 my skin started feeling tight. I thought of just ignoring it but the next day it started peeling off and my skin started getting itchy. That is when I decided to stop because itching is not a good sign.

I have not noticed n improvement yet with wrinkle but the skin does feel a bit plumper after each use. It works well with the rest of my skin products and is a great base for my moisturizer or night cream.

author: Annie

author: NicciB
body: I have been using this serum twice daily for approx 2 weeks, has a very light scent and glides over the skin easily. I have definitely seen an improvement to the texture of my skin. I cant say I have noticed a dramatic change to fine lines but my skin feels lovely and soft. Will buy again.

author: Keta0124
body: I found this serum to be wonderful. I noticed that my skin looks and feels nicer since using it. I have sensitive skin to so I was apprehensive but luckily didnâ€™t have a reaction.

author: SFL11
body: I have used the serum for 2 weeks now and find it has smoothed out my skin overall. It goes on nicely, has a light scent that is not irritating and is nice under makeup. My skin looks smoother and there is at least the illusion that fine lines are reducing..which is okay by me. I would definitely buy this in the future.

author: Wrinkles
body: I like this format of this product-it is not heavy or too thin. I also liked there are no strong smell. I tried not to be in the sun while using this product. In the end I didnâ€™t notice anything changed to my wrinklesâ€¦

author: Miranda

I took before and after pictures to compare when I started and what the fine lines on my forehead looked like after two weeks and, unfortunately, they actually looked worse. Iâ€™m not necessarily gonna blame that on the product but it clearly didnâ€™t help so if youâ€™re looking for wrinkle correction, Iâ€™d suggest looking somewhere else. However, if youâ€™re looking for soft, supple skin, this is where itâ€™s at.

author: sheenalee36
body: I received this product as a free sample to try, and I have already purchased the full-size product! I am impressed at how well it changed the texture of my skin, and filled in old acne scars. I have even noticed the deep set in lines on my forehead softening, I am quite a lover of clinique already and this made me love it more. There is no overpowering scent like in most face creams, which I am never a fan of. And this product absorbs into the skin so smoothly and does not leave a greasy residue behind. The only downfall of this product is the price, it is quite steep in price

Also fine lines between eyebrows and tiny fine lines under the eye area. I never used retinol before and I was very excited to try because of a wide admiration about this ingredient. But after 20 days my wrinkles are still there and my fine lines too. I can say that in general the skin looks a bit firmer but I'm honestly not that impressed. I expected much more.

author: Birdyg
header: I enjoy the smell and final finish
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum, is great fo everyday use, smells wonderful and works!

author: Ari007
header: Great and effective anti wrinkle product
body: This is an amazing product. I tried it for 3 weeks twice a day- morning and evening. There is a positive visible difference in my skin. My skin now feels more radiant and plump. There are fewer visible lines now. I even got many compliments from my colleagues. I will definitely buy it and I highly recommend it to everyone who want their youth back.

author: Sunshine
body: I have not really noticed any difference from using this product!

author: Sandra72

Despite that I prefer more organic products as I see one of the first ingredients is Dimethicon, it explains why it's used for wrinkles. I would not buy this product and have stopped using it. Dimethicon should not be in any facial products or other's for that matter.

author: OntGirl
body: Iâ€™ve tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for two weeks now. I like this product, it absorbs nicely and doesnâ€™t smell absolutely awful like some of the other products that Iâ€™ve tried. Itâ€™s not super sticky either - which is always a bonus in my opinion! author: Michellem

author: dani___gurl
body: I enjoy this product. Its not greasy and absorbs and it seems to lessen the appearance of fine lines. It doesnâ€™t seem to have a scent. Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. I always enjoy cliniqueâ€™s products. It made some improvements so Iâ€™m going to keep using it. #freeproduct

author: Betty
body: This product feels amazing when applying to dry, clean skin. The next morning I noticed my skin was noticeably smoother.

author: Tiiamariia
body: I enjoyed testing out this product. I found it to go on smoothly and not feel caked on my face. There isnt a strong smell to it which is nice for people who have sensitivities to things like that. I stopped using my regular products, so I could see if there was a difference. I didn't really notice a different with my skin but it stayed the same so thats good, it means it doing what its meant to do.

author: Shagufa
body: I love all of the products of clinique..this wrinkle correcting serum is really great..it fights fine lines and wrinkles and give them a smooth and hydreated look..the most amazing ingredient in this serum is hyaluronic acid which is really very good for a smooth and plumping skin..can never go wrong with clinique..

author: Kkohari

author: Manda86

author: Kadmot21

author: Jessyneil
body: I used this product twice a day for 2 weeks-every morning and evening after washing my face and before applying moisturizer and sunscreen. Iâ€™m glad I took a before and after pic as it allows me to see subtle changes. But, letâ€™s be honestâ€¦the improvement is small! author: Curly5

author: MaryRocks

author: Sweetums

author: wachidarin

author: Krylo
body: Iâ€™ve been using this serum since I received the sample size and can say that I havenâ€™t noticed any changes. I feel like it sinks in immediately in to my skin and just disappears. I havenâ€™t noticed any changes to my skins texture or appearance

author: Mshaw2435
body: Overall not super impressed with this product. After using nealy daily for 2 weeks I really haven't seen much of a difference in the appearance of the skin around my eyes and forehead. For the price if this product I've had better results with much less expensive brands

Once applied the serum soaked in quick and made the skin look fuller and less dry but it didnâ€™t last or remove any wrinkles permanently.

author: Goldenhour

author: Joannosaurus
body: This is a great serum for everyday use. It is light weight and easy to apply. It goes on smoothly and effortlessly. I enjoyed that there was little to no fragrance. author: Shan11
body: I have used this for just a week and have noticed a difference in my skin. I am always trying new products and I have found this one to be true to it's purpose. I will continue to buy this product because it benefits my skin. Thank you for allowing me to try before I buy.

author: Lard21
body: The serum took some time to work, but I noticed that some of my wrinkles around my eyes faded quite a lot.

author: Andschand

author: Foodgirl

author: Luchiana

author: Kiki_Me

author: MelM1234

author: Jot25

author: MarianneAlana
body: I really like this serum from Clinique. You donâ€™t need much of the serum to use on your face and neck. I always use a serum on my neck too. This serum absorbs really easily. My face feels really soft and hydrated. Iâ€™m not sure if there is much of a change in the fine lines under my eyes and on my forehead just yet. But I only used it for a few weeks. I used it for almost three weeks as of the date of my review. It was a deluxe sized sample and itâ€™s almost all gone. I used the serum five days per week. I would definitely recommend it and I will probably buy this serum because I love Clinique, itâ€™s a really great brand and the products are always really wonderful. This serum is no different. I received this product for testing purposes and all opinions are my own.

author: Rubyjoan
body: Recommending the most suitable skin care serum is an affordable, and effective product reducing many of my common signs of aging.Clinique smart repair serum has a smooth texture and absorbs quickly into my skin, waking up with healthy firm glowing soft skin moisturize is ideal for women who are experiencing many of the common signs of aging.
