Saw difference in my skin did reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, helps plump my skin for a more youthful look colours on my face again. Clinique smart repair was a winner with me, affordable easy to find enjoy the pump no waste staying clean. Day or night skin really feel smoother moisturizer and hydrated, doesn't irritated but leaving skin smoother healthier. Visible results when used regularly into you're daily routine, rejuvenated my skin in just two weeks feeling younger with no perfumes.

author: Ashley23
body: This is an amazing product. Women in your late 20s, early 30s and up you must try this. I started suffering from crows feet in my early 30s and I have tried many products that didnâ€™t seem to help anywhere near what this one did. I have been using this product for A few weeks now and the results are amazing I donâ€™t think I will ever try another product for a long long time. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for an amazing skin care routine whoâ€™s looking to minimize their fine lines and wrinkles.

author: Airsign78
body: What I love most about this serum is the light weight formula and that itâ€™s absolutely scent free. I used this product consistently for 16 days morning and night, just a pea size amount. With The hyaluronic acid I noticed a plumping affect right away. After 2 weeks my skin feels smoother and my pores appear smaller. I do believe I started to see a visible improvement in my deeper wrinkles as well when I compared my before and after photo. Overall this would be a serum I would add to my routine.

author: jess147
body: I received a sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum and tested over the period of two weeks, morning and night. Unfortunately I did not notice any significant difference in my skin. Everything appears to be the same. I'm not sure two weeks is a long enough test period. I would not likely purchase this in the future.

author: Disneyloo
body: I liked the way this serum felt on my skin. It was smooth to apply and did not tingle or aggravate my skin at all. I did not see any changes to my skin during the trial but maybe it is because I needed to try for a longer period. As it did not tingle upon application I did wonder if it was actually doing anything to help my skin. However I do trust Clinique and would like to think it was benefiting in some way. That being said I would buy this product to give it more of a chance to work for me.

author: Sherry62
body: I have used Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum for 18 days. When I apply the serum, it is very light, does not burn my skin and absorbs quickly. I only need a small amount to cover my face. I used it under my usual moisturizer and sun screen. I reviewed my before and after photos and noticed that my fine lines, especially around my eyes were less noticeable.

author: CarltonBanks
body: I used this in conjunction with my regular moisturizer. Did not really notice a change in fine lines after using it in AM and PM before moisturizer. I really like that this has Hyaluronic Acid and Retinol. It doesn't have a great smell. It is light and you don't need a lot to get good coverage. I was very hopefully when using this product (not that I have wrinkles) but I'm not sure if it really worked. Maybe I need to use it longer than two weeks. Although this goes on smooth and provides extra hydration for my skin, it would not be a product that I would consider buying at it's current price point.

author: SAJW66
header: I really don't see any difference.
body: I have a line above my lip as well as puppet lines around my mouth and saw no difference after using this product morning and night for 2 weeks. I was hoping for a great result as I know this brand is a great brand.

author: Kikuchiyo
body: The serum is creamy texture, and it spreads easily. Shortly after the application, I felt the skin smoother. However, when it comes to wrinkles, I could not get the result I was looking for yet. The text period is just 2 weeks, so it might be different when I use it longer. But for now, I don't see much improvements in terms of wrinkle correction.

author: rgvpc
body: The first thing I noticed was that the serum didn't contain any fragrance and compared to others I've tried, this one had a somewhat milky texture that was very easy to absorb. It did have a slight tacky feel to it as it dried down, but this only lasted about a minute before my skin felt completely dry and soft. Within the first week of use, it did seem like fine lines were less noticeable and more moisturized, especially on my forehead. My skin, in general, looked more plump than usual, which gave it a younger appearance. I did make sure to avoid the eye area, although at some points, I did feel a minimal tingling sensation. It didn't last too long, which was a relief. Other than that, I didn't experience any redness or peeling at all, which can be common with retinol products. I also made sure to wear sunscreen every time I applied the serum. Overall, I really enjoyed the serum and wouldn't mind purchasing the full-sized product.

author: skinlover
body: I liked the combination of ingredients, two of the best in terms of skin care. I used the serum as recommended, the texture is good, it absorbs fast. I could notice my skin plumped, with less visible lines and wrinkles. I just cannot say yet about long term results as I've been using for 2 weeks so far, but overall I'm very pleased about it.

author: Gypsy77
body: I really like this Serum - it feels light and non-greasy on my skin. I have not seen a noticeable reduction of wrinkles as of yet, but my skin feels tighter.

author: Kalie
body: Very nice serum to use. I used this every other day and hope it can improve my wrinkles. It seems to have a bit of an effect but I would definitely need to use it for a longer period of time before I notice more difference. The texture is easy to spread out. I felt like my skin just absorbed it. It does not have any residual feeling or smell and that's why I like it.

author: Bernadette32
body: I tried this product for 3 weeks but my skin did not like it and reacted with acne.

author: Technomama
body: To ensure my trial was accurate, I used this serum morning and night for 2 weeks. I did notice a warm tingling feeling in my skin after applying like it was doing something but I didnâ€™t notice much results with minimized wrinkles after the 2 weeks. I am 42 and have very fine wrinkles around the eyes that that may have slightly reduced but they werenâ€™t much noticeable to begin with. I was hoping my forehead wrinkles would smooth out a bit but didnâ€™t notice any changes there. Iâ€™d be curious if this just needs more time for results as I can definitely feel it doing something to my skin.

author: IrishMinx
body: Im always excited to try a new product in this area, especially one that contains both retinoids and hyaluronic acid. Review disclaimer. The sample we were given to review, while generous due to fact that it was free, was only meant for a couple weeks use. That is not nearly enough time to properly review a skincare product. My opinion is solely based on what I've been able to experience in that short time. What I like about it, firstly, its has a creamy, silky texture that soaks right into the skin. It had a very light, delicate flavour and even that dissipates quickly. A little seems to go a fairly long way, so it's easy to use sparingly and therefore not empty your bank account quickly. When it comes to its clinical claims, my skin definitely feels super moisturized after use. I put it on before bed and when I wake up my skin is still dewy. Love that. Now does it minimize wrinkles? Possibly. Likely. I just cant be certain yet. Come back to me in 2 more weeks

author: Freedom 55
body: The product is easy to apply and no dry or sticky feeling after apply.

author: Vness
body: I have been having some visible signs of aging over the past months and I was sceptical to try a new product. When I received the Clinique smart clinical repair serum, I was interested to see if it would make a difference I could actually notice. The product itself is light weight and didnâ€™t feel greasy. It was a little treat for my skin. Upon using the product I noticed an improvement in fine lines in my problem areas and an overall improvement in the appearance of the wrinkles on my skin. I will be purchasing this product in the future and recommending others to give it a try!

author: Less wrinkled67
body: I began using the Clinique serum right away after getting the sample. After a few days I did notice that my skin was much softer and smoother. Close to 2 weeks in using twice a day morning and night, I have noticed a big reduction in frown lines and facial lines. Now at 2 weeks which is a quick amount of time for any product, Clnique Serum has amazed me at how well it is working for me in a short time and using sparingly. Coworkers are noticing the difference it has made and I am thrilled to say I will continue using this product on my almost 68 year old face! No perfume in it is a bonus for those who are unable to use perfumed products also.

author: Cazzie
body: I was quite disappointed as I saw no improvement in the fine lines I have by my upper lip or the corners of my eyes although the texture of the skin did improve slightly it is not enough for me to want to buy this product.

author: Sonia123
body: I found this product to leave me with hydrated, smooth skin.

author: Lovetotry
body: After I had the opportunity to try Cliniqueâ€™s Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for two weeks, I was pleasantly surprised by the effects of the product especially on the texture of my skin. I used the product morning and night prior to applying my moisturizer. The serum went deep into my skin and improved my skinâ€™s smoothness making my skin look and feel more plump and youthful overall. My skin feels more rejuvenated and glowing and I look forward to these results lasting as I continue to use this great product as part of my skin care regimen.

author: Star427
body: I gave it 3 stars because I havenâ€™t noticed any changes yet. I do like how it applies and absorbed into my skin quickly.

author: Gypseeey
body: I have really enjoyed using this serum for 2.5 weeks. I have seen a difference in the elasticity and firmness of my forehead and T-Zone area, and a noticeable brightness. Will definitely continue to use this product. I wish it had a fresh scent, but I understand that many people have sensitivity to scents. Will definitely recommend this to my friends and family. I think the formula would be perfect for any age group also.

author: Leigh
body: I was really excited to try Clinique's Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. It boasted good results on even deep wrinkles. It's a nice light weight formula, no real scent from what I could detect, and absorbed quickly into my my skin. I hoped for photo worthy before and after shots of my forehead. I used it as directed twice a day, with no other retinol products, and after 2 weeks, unfortunately there was no difference.

author: hryaq
body: This will be my first time to try a serum and from clinique. At first i was skeptical to use any types of this beauty products because i only use the basics, this serum was concentrated and you only need to put a small amount and focus on problem areas, I havenâ€™t seen any big changes so far as i was using this twice a week for 2 weeks now. So far it was good as i dont see any red marks or itchy spots on my face when i applied the serum. Im still hoping for best result

author: Noe33
body: I used this serum for about 2 weeks and found it to hydrate my skin almost instantly after applying it. I loved how the serum is very lightweight and non-greasy. Although I donâ€™t see any results with the fine lines or wrinkles on my face but my skin is feeling flawless. Completely recommend.

author: Mrs.Gibson
body: I truly liked the clinique smart clinical repair. It went on smooth. It did not have a smell to it. I was able to put my moisturizer right over top.

author: Empress
body: I used the serum for the first time at night before bed. When I woke up, my skin felt soft, smooth and supple. I started seeing some changes with regards to moisture retention during the day which is a plus and slight changes to wrinkles around my eyes. I feel confident saying that if I continue to use this product, I will see better results. I applied my moisturizer on top of the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum which worked well together. I definitely recommend this product and I will be purchasing this in the near future.

author: Shanz
body: I can't say that this product is an absolute lifesaver or a game changer for me however I really like it and it makes my face feel fantastic. I wash my face tone my skin apply this product which comes in a fairly liquidy consistency and spreads quite easily. I felt the sample size was on the lower end of what I would expect to get a proper idea of the efficacy. All in all my skin felt tighter and firmer after every use. The scent was minimal and nice smelling.

author: Susan13
header: Love the way my skin feels!
body: I received the sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair serum just at the right time, as I was out of serums for my face. I started using it that night. The next morning, my skin felt so soft, and my face did not feel dry at all, for first time in a while. I continued to use the serum, as directed on the package, twice a day, in the morning and at night. My face has never felt better, smoother, supple, moisturized! And, in addition, the brown discolorations on my skin from my time over under the hot sun of Afghanistan, appear to be fading slowly. I have always had dry skin, and when the cold weather starts, my skin always become drier. This product keeps my skin feeling healthy and soft all day and all night! Other serums would only last for half of that time. I absolutely love this serum, and would recommend it to anyone!

author: Rootbeer
body: It's hard with only a 2 week trial. Everything I have read suggests a 4 week period.

author: Sassycarm
body: Had the opportunity to try this amazing product! I used this for two weeks and noticed a big difference! Would highly recommend this for everyone to try!

author: JessicaRabbit
body: I enjoyed testing this serum. It has a very nice gel like texture and glides over my skin beautifully. It absorbs instantly and is extremely hydrating. It leaves the texture of my skin very soft and does not cause any irritation or break outs on my sensitive skin. I can't say for sure that I noticed any change in regards to improvement of my fine lines and wrinkles after using this product, but it did make my skin feel nice after each application, so for that I would recommend it.

author: Beautiful74
body: I have taken before and after pictures and I don't see any benefits, I actually look worse. I had also found that it had a slight burn for 20 min after applying. I also found that the product was too runny, trying to get it on my face without it running off my finger while trying to put the cap on so it doesn't run out of the tube was very difficult. Overall, I did not like the product.

author: Kayren
body: I really like this serum. I found it didnâ€™t mesh well with my regular day cream but when used on its own, I loved it. Great hydration throughout the day.

author: Pcfillion
body: The feeling of the cream is nice. I didn't like the smell of the cream and I didn't find it did alot to my skin.

author: Maniemanie
header: Serum that does what it says
body: I was provided an opportunity to try Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for 2 weeks. It does not only help reduce the visibility of my wrinkles, but also improve my face skin to be more plumped and and smoother. Also love the texture of the serum, when applied on my face, it felt so refreshed and light. It absorbs into my face quickly without feeling unease. Love using it and recommend this to be used by anyone who would want to reduce deek wrinkles and improve the skin of your face.

author: Danielle1234
body: I really enjoyed trying this deluxe sample. I used it as per instruction twice daily. This product is a combo retinol and hyaluronic acid serum and it does both really well. I always use HA before retinol to increase absorption and prevent dryness and this combines that into one serum and it works so well it could actually save money. I love the feel/texture of this serum and I am extremely picky and sensitive to texture and formulas on my skin. It doesn't leave you feeling sticky or anything and it doesn't pill. I definitely feel like it's very plumping/hydrating and I'm seeing good maintenance of my progress with retinol (it takes 6+ months to start seeing a different but I've used other retinol serums consistently). It does help keep acne and texture down well. I have combination skin that's acne prone and that has bouts of dehydration and oiliness. Retinol and HA help keep me consistent. I do like using this day and night and it works well with my other skincare.

author: Monika
body: I used Clinique Smart Clinical Repair 2 times per day for 16 days, unfortunately I see little to no results.

author: ronnie1117
body: I am not impressed with this product. I'm actually very disappointed.

author: Momma G
body: Have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for 2 weeks, it makes my skin feel soft, refreshed. Soft wrinkles around eye area are softened, not as noticeable. I would say it has met my expections for this area. It is not as effective for deeper wrinkles around mouth, but still makes my skin feel nice.

author: SJunie
header: Absorbs quickly and pleasant to use.
body: Due to the sample size, there was only enough product to use for about 2 weeks. The serum has a pleasant texture and is quickly absorbed into the skin. The retinoid in the serum didn't irritate my skin. There is a plumping effect that is noticeable after the application, and my skin feels a lot softer and moisturized. After 2 weeks of use, my skin does feel more hydrated. I haven't noticed any significant reduction in my wrinkles, but perhaps that would be more noticeable with more prolonged usage.

author: Less wrinkled67
body: I began using the Clinique serum right away after getting the sample. After a few days I did notice that my skin was much softer and smoother. Close to 2 weeks in using twice a day morning and night, I have noticed a big reduction in frown lines and facial lines. Now at 2 weeks which is a quick amount of time for any product, Clnique Serum has amazed me at how well it is working for me in a short time and using sparingly. Coworkers are noticing the difference it has made and I am thrilled to say I will continue using this product on my almost 68 year old face! No perfume in it is a bonus for those who are unable to use perfumed products also.

author: Cazzie
body: I was quite disappointed as I saw no improvement in the fine lines I have by my upper lip or the corners of my eyes although the texture of the skin did improve slightly it is not enough for me to want to buy this product.

author: Sonia123
body: I found this product to leave me with hydrated, smooth skin.

author: Heidi
body: I noticed results within a week or so. My skin looked brighter, smoother, and fuller. My son even asked me if I had gotten Botox!  I love this product. A few months into use, and I'm still getting skin compliments.

author: mary
body: so good to see the difference after using it.

author: DebH16
body: I had the opportunity to give the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum a try. When using it, I loved that it was basically scent free, was easy to apply, felt light and non-greasy and absorbed well into my face. But most of all I loved that it made my skin feel noticeably smoother and I felt that some wrinkles were less visible after using it for a couple of weeks.

author: jess72
body: The product is quickly absorbed, the skin looks healthier and more hydrated, wrinkles and dark spot become a bit pale and smooth out. A great product.

author: YoungatHeart
body: Feels amazing on my skin. It felt tighter after a week of application. What a product!

author: Rosalia
body: I received a 10ml sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum to test and review. I used the serum morning and night for two weeks, on my forehead and the fine lines on my outer eye area. The serum applied nicely and absorbed easily into the skin. It left the skin feeling smooth and soft even before applying moisturizer. I did not have any sensitivity or experience issues with the ingredients. I cannot comment on the serum's long term effect, but I did not see any noticeable difference in the appearance of my wrinkles, however it did leave my skin feeling very hydrated.

author: Barbie
body: The Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a great product from Clinique. In a nutshell, it works. I didn't have any visible wrinkles to begin with but the serum did make my skin smoother and reduce any visible lines.

author: Yaj86
body: I like how my face feels after applying it. It feels soft and smooth. I did not have any break outs while using this. If you want to try a new serum thatâ€™s within budget, I would definitely recommend this. My skin is a combination of normal to oily.

author: GoodKarmajr
body: My skin felt moisturized and plump. I Iike the fact that it doesn't have a scent. Unfortunately, I didn't notice any change in the appearance of my skin. I think maybe if it was used over time, it might.

author: Rose86
body: Overall I really liked this product and have bought a full sized version to continue using. Being as this was a small size I ran out at the two week mark. It was sure starting to show signs of improving my wrinkles. To be honest, I was very surprised and happy to know this product works. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to help with fine wrinkles.

author: Debbs
body: Finally a wrinkle correcting serum that I like. I noticed a difference the first week of testing. Lines around the eye were visible smoother and less noticeable. During week two I continue to see more improvement. lines were beginning to fade. I definitely will buy the full size and continue using this product. I am excited to see the results.

author: Cat lady
body: I enjoyed trying this product very much. Iâ€™m an avid Clinique product user & have been for many years. Though sometimes a little pricy, I honestly donâ€™t mind paying the cost on products that I know really do work. My skin looked & felt smoother, fine lines definitely decreased & I even got complimented on how radiant I looked!

author: Angel99
header: Nothing special . forgot to take picture
body: Sorry but it is just another cream serum whatever .. No difference really on my face . There are still wrinkles fine lines whatever.

author: Kelli
header: Not enough in the sample for 2 weeks
body: Would like to try for longer then 3 days bit the sample provided did not have enough product for 2 weeks

author: Robbi
body: Clinique has made a awesome wrinkle correcting serum. It has retinol added to make a serum and goes a long way. The serum absorbs quickly into the skin for for all over coverage. A small amount is only needed to cover your complexion. I could see results around my ageing mouth area where you find wrinkles. Clinique's smart clinical repair makes wrinkle correcting a breeze. I would recommend this serum if you are looking for a good wrinkle repair serum.

author: Vicky51
body: I was very impressed with this product. The texture is very soft and after a couple of days of usage, the wrinkles started to reduce.

author: LenLen
body: I found it to be very light without any overpowering smell. It had a soft feeling on application but was very effective in smoothing the wrinkles around my eyes and on my forehead. Overall, I liked it and would strongly recommend it.

author: Coleen
body: I've been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, for over a week now. I can't get over the difference this Serum does, I have false teeth on top, so my upper lip is wrinkly, now that I use this awesome Serum which takes away all the wrinkles & fine lines. This Product spreads so easily on Your face, You don't need much. I was so amazed at how, it took the wrinkles away. I highly recommend this Product for everyone who has wrinkles & fine lines. This doesn't have much of a scent, so it didn't bother my breathing. It also never made my face itchy or tight either. This is the best serum I have ever tried. You will be so happy You tried this product, that You'll have to buy it.

author: Jen50
body: I have tried this product, Clinique Smart Clinical Repair using it in the morning and evening before bed. I like the silky feel of this product on my skin and that it is easy on sensitive skin. I like the fact that it has no noticeable scent as well. However, it is supposed to work as a wrinkle correcting serum and I found it only moisturized the skin, but showed no signs, not even even slight of helping to reduce fine lines or wrinkles. I would recommend this product as a good feeling serum, but it fell short in doing what it was supposed to do in reducing the look of fine lines or wrinkles.

author: A.VDP
body: I love serums in general, I use one in the morning and at night. This serum I found to be very light, applied smooth, and absorbed quickly - it had a pleasant consistency and texture and light fragrance (which is super important to me). It has 3 important ingredients that make a quality anti-aging product - peptides, retinoid and hyaluronic acid, and I could see that it would work over a longer period of time, 2 weeks trial is rather short to see these types of effects. The one thing I would change would be to make it a "clean" product, better for the environment and for our skin. The price is a little steep, but you aren't to use it every day so it would last a long time.

author: Babydoll30
body: I would like to say I have used the sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for about 3 days. I love it, I would like to get a big bottle of it, it definitely helps with correcting and reducing wrinkles, doesn't feel greasy, has a very nice scent, feels like a tingling effect on my skin when applied. Great stuff. I would like to get a big bottle of it.

author: CelineS1
header: Product seemed to dry out my skin
body: Unfortunately it seemed to dry out my skin. I had only tried it once and the next morning I woke up with very dry skin especially around my mouth. I kept trying to use it, but each time my skin would end up dry.

author: Abgal
body: I tried this serum for two weeks, usually 2x per day after moisturizer as per the directions. It felt great on my skin, and I'm already a Clinque fan. I don't have a lot for fine lines (yet!) so wasn't expecting miracles on the big line. I did find it smoothes lines out a bit, and makes make up go on bets.

author: Michelle
body: I was very excited to receive this product to review as I am at that age where I need a little anti aging help! In about two weeks I started to notice that my skin looked brighter and it makes my skin soft and smooth before my makeup application. It does not feel that heavy on the skin. I canâ€™t say that Iâ€™ve noticed much of a difference in fine lines and wrinkles, but maybe if I continue to use it I would. It doesnâ€™t cause me any sensitivity or irritation which is huge plus. If you are looking for a decent serum to add to your skincare routine, that is not going to break the bank, I highly recommend giving the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum a try!

author: Sandy78
body: When I first tried it, my face felt so smooth and refreshing. It made my wrinkles less noticeable. Definitely recommend this.

author: Neess
body: This is an amazing product. It has made my skin so even and bright. The application is very smooth and I feel and look hydrated all day. I even see a noticeable difference in fine lines. My friends and family have even noticed. I would definitely recommend this serum!

author: Dgirl48
body: I am always sceptical of new products and their wild claims. But this is actually the real deal!! Absolutely amazed by the results, just after a few days!! Awesome product!!

author: Ismile
body: I like this product for the feel, texture and light scent. I didnâ€™t see a lot of change, other than noticeable redness in my skin.

author: Nikki
body: I started using this product and it makes my skin feel so soft and itâ€™s helping minimize my small lines, diffently will be purchasing more

author: Amber6
body: Great gel textured serum that absorbs well into the skin. It has hyaluronic acids and retinoids that help keep the skin plump and hydrated. Helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines

author: Nana tester
body: The serum was easy to use. Odourless. M skin felt nice and smooth with using the product. I canâ€™t say that my wrinkles were less visible.

author: Jhitch1981
header: Moisturizes skin and reduces fine lines
body: I love that the serum is not scented and a little goes a long way. I applied the serum both morning and night, primarily on my forehead and around my eyes. My skin felt much softer and smoother within a few days, and my fine lines were visibly reduced.

author: Glizsmart
body: I love how light the serum is and it feels like a light moisturizer. It has some slight brightening effects. I just wished they sent a bigger sample so I can see more visible results. For now tho I donâ€™t see drastic change since they only sent a sample size .

author: Chels
body: I used a trial size sample of this product that lasted me 15 days, using this product every other day. The consistency is soft and thin, I had no issues with application. There is a very light scent, nothing added I wouldnâ€™t say. It felt clean and hydrating upon putting it on and was absorbed nicely. However, after completing my trial I didnâ€™t really notice any changes to my skin. I didnâ€™t notice a reduction in any fine lines and I didnâ€™t feel my face appeared any more hydrated than when I started. Perhaps you need to use the product more long term to reap those benefits but I would say that I wouldnâ€™t rush out to buy this product but I also wouldnâ€™t hesitate to try it again!

author: Jess L
body: Not irritating but notice an improvement event after 2 weeks.

author: SampleSally
header: Smooth, easy to apply, and effective
body: Smooth and easy to apply however difficult to comment on the effectiveness of the product. Neutral review as the sample size was good for 3 applications.

author: Kan d
body: I like the serum .the texture is nice not runny not too thick.it absorbs quickly without any sticky feelings.overall I like it .Only problem I have is I received very tiny tube which last me 2-3 days so I am not able to see any difference on my wrinkles,I wish I was able to use it at least couple of weeks to see results.

author: kitty
body: i found the product to be easy to apply, minimal fragrance, but i think i have to use it for another few weeks to see any difference.

author: Dgirl48
body: I am always sceptical of new products and their wild claims. But this is actually the real deal!! Absolutely amazed by the results, just after a few days!! Awesome product!!

author: Pdidz
body: The serum was nice but almost a bit too fragrant. It had a nice texture, but I feel for someone with sensitive skin it would not be there first choice for their under eye.

author: Neess
body: This is an amazing product. It has made my skin so even and bright. The application is very smooth and I feel and look hydrated all day. I even see a noticeable difference in fine lines. My friends and family have even noticed. I would definitely recommend this serum!

author: Kelli
header: Not enough in the sample for 2 weeks
body: Would like to try for longer then 3 days bit the sample provided did not have enough product for 2 weeks

author: Robbi
body: Clinique has made a awesome wrinkle correcting serum. It has retinol added to make a serum and goes a long way. The serum absorbs quickly into the skin for for all over coverage. A small amount is only needed to cover your complexion. I could see results around my ageing mouth area where you find wrinkles. Clinique's smart clinical repair makes wrinkle correcting a breeze. I would recommend this serum if you are looking for a good wrinkle repair serum.

author: Vicky51
body: I was very impressed with this product. The texture is very soft and after a couple of days of usage, the wrinkles started to reduce.

author: Mari2809
body:
I have been using this product for 3 years and this is my favorite, it is quickly absorbed, the skin looks healthier and more hydrated, wrinkles are smoothed out.
Thanks to the Clinique for such a good product)

author: ConnieK
body: I received the Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum. I find it works very well. I used it for about 2 weeks 3 times a week. Even though it is a short time to see results, I did find that it made a small change in my skin. It is well absorbed into my skin and has no fragrance. My skin is soft and smooth. It appeared clearer and dark spots looked less visible. I think if I continued longer using this serum results should be even better

author: Anna19
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum made my skin feel smoother and more even. The dark spots are getting lighter and less noticeable. The change is subtle but it was enough to motivate me to improve skin care routine. This serum is worth the money. It made me feel better about myself seeing my skin so bright and it is a positive addition to my new skin care routine. Too many people give up on self care when they get older but taking care of your skin is worth the effort.

author: MoryMeister
body: No matter your skin type, this Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum works like a charm. This serum is very light and it goes on without being greasy or heavy, which I love. I have used it for the last month or so and I can see the improvement in my skin, now it feels healthier and hydrated, and my age spots and my tiny lines around my eyes they seem smoother. At some point my skin started to peel, but maybe that is from the Retinol, but using the right moisturizer after applying it, makes all the difference. I can't believe the difference, my skin feels soft and looks smoother! I'm so happy I tried this serum.

author: Momof6
body: This product impressed me. It made my skin feel soft, smooth, and hydrated. I have only used it for a few weeks but am excited to see my wrinkles reduce with continued use.

author: KSailor
body: I was excited to try this product but it was only a small amount and barely provided enough for 2 weeks. It was a comfortable enough product to apply but I honestly did not notice much difference from other products I use. I was not happy with the need to use sunscreen and limit sun exposure due to the retinol and was not aware of this before receiving the product to try. This alone would be enough to make me not purchase the product. But it is also somewhat pricey and I would not say the additional cost compared to other products is justified by the outcome I received.

author: JuicyJennDella
body: I have already noticed an improvement since I have started using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair a few days ago. It is especially noticeable on my neck. What an improvement in the appearance of my wrinkles and skin! I highly recommend this product and I will definitely continue to use it. It does not have a sticky feel and seems to absorb quickly.

author: nana4
body: The serum seems to work but I had some dry patches on my skin which I did not have before. I did use moisturizer after use so I am not sure why this happened

author: nana4
body: The serum seems to work but I had some dry patches on my skin which I did not have before. I did use moisturizer after use so I am not sure why this happened

author: ChrisLa
body: After using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair for a couple of days, I noticed a big difference in the feel of my skin. It was smooth and not dry. It was soft. It did not feel heavy on my face it was light. I was able to still use my moisture cream and it still didn't feel like I had anything on. I did notice a slight difference with the lines on my forehead, maybe a continued use will take them away.

author: Donwilli
body: The serum makes my skin bright and even. I love the way this serum feels so silky when I put it on. It is easily and quickly absorbed into the skin. Within a few days, I saw a noticeable difference in the lines on my forehead. The price is a bit expensive, but I would definitely recommend.

author: tuni911
body: I loved this product. It went on so smoothly, and within seconds my skin had absorbed it. It never felt sticky or greasy. My moisturizer slide over beautifully and I think it absorbed better because of the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I decided to watch a particular set of fine lines to see if there was any change, and within a week of using the product twice a day, I did notice an improvement in this area. I would highly recommend this product to anyone in their 50's. It works wonderfully!

author: Lynn1962
header: It makes my skin feel soft and refreshed
body: I love this serum and probably will continue using it. It feels soft and refreshing to the skin and as of yet I have not noticed any wrinkle reduction but I am sure I will later

author: Cheeky
body: I found this product to have improved the laugh lines and crow's feet on my face. It felt refreshing and cool to the touch and almost like it was massaging my skin!!

author: Amanda79
body: The serum is a pearly, iridescent beige colour. Itâ€™s light, buttery and gritty feeling. I thought it was an exfoliant at first. Applied nicely and a little goes a long way. Was expecting a burn from the retinol but didnâ€™t experience any. My face felt and looked smooth and hydrated with a little amount. I will continue use and hope for additional improvements.

author: Rocky
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum really made me look so much more vibrant, like my skin had a bit of a boost. It's not heavy at all and sinks in right away.

author: ruthpaul7
body: I love the wrinkle correc.ting serum. My skin was very soft and hydrated after using the serum

author: hallsy
body: This serum absorbs wonderfully and quickly so you are ready to apply the moisturizer soon after. I do like scents in my products but if you do not, this has little to no scent. I used it daily both morning and night over the past 3 weeks. Unfortunately I do not see any noticeable results so I am not sure I would by this product at its price point

author: Yorkiesue
body: I totally love this product! It is amazing and really does make a difference to my skin and wrinkles even though I am almost 70 years old and have tried lots of different products to help me look the best that I can, this is by far and away the very best.

author: Theonlytitania
body: Was expecting to test for a longer period of time. I did not find much result after 2 weeks of use. Didn't like the texture it didn't feel like a serum. Absorbed into skin very fast and my skin felt bice after use not greasy. Overall 2 of 5.

author: tillieskidder
body: This product works well. The small sample didnâ€™t give me what the product would do for a longer period. But from what I have used so far it seems to work. Serum goes on smooth and makes my skin feel good. It has started to work on my forehead. Iâ€™d like to buy a bottle but not sure sure about the price tag!

author: Travelyn12
header: This Clinique product was hard to test.
body: Unfortunately this Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum was extremely hard to evaluate with only a small sample to try. I am unable to say whether or not the product does what it says. Using a small pea sized amount I would apply only on the wrinkles followed by my moisturizer. My skin did feel softer and I had more of a glow. Beyond that I can not offer any further opinion.

author: Mabelly
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum is really good, my skin got so soft and smoothed out my wrinkles in two weeks, the absorption is good and fast.

author: Philana85
body: Although I did not see any major noticeable results after 2 weeks, Iâ€™m confident I would see better results after long term use. The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum absorbed quickly into my skin, I did find it slightly drying requiring a heavier moisturizer than usual. Im looking forward to permanently adding this to my skincare routine and seeing the results from longer use.

author: Blondie25
header: Good moisture but could do more
body: I found this product to be full of moisture which I also like for my face and a good consistency for a serum. It also has a nice light scent, however for a product that claims to be a wrinkle corrector I didnâ€™t find any difference with the fine lines on my forehead and crows feet over the two week period that I tested the product. Itâ€™s great for providing hydration to the skin as part of my night time routine but it could do more.

author: Lauriem1967
header: Soften Fine Lines With the Power of 3
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum was a really lovely treat for my skin. After just 2 weeks it definitely softened my fine lines and made my skin feel more hydrated and plump. For my deeper wrinkles, I didnâ€™t see any visible improvement. But, it seemed to brighten and help even my skin tone. This Serum has a patented technology called CL1870 Laser focus complex (TM), along with retinoids and hyaluronic acids that makes a power of 3! I used it morning and night for 2 weeks, with no irritation and had less breakouts and no dry spots. It has a light floral scent, but nothing too overpowering. I would definitely recommend this product for quick results. It made my skin feel smooth and soft, and brightened me up too! My makeup went on smoothly over top of this, so no issues there. If youâ€™re looking for a quick glow up for a special occasion, this could it! The product runs on the higher end price wise, retailing at approximately 88$ (Must use sunscreen daily)

author: Erin23
header: Such a great product - must try!
body: I received this product as part of the home tester club to use and provide my honest feedback. Since receiving my sample I have gone out and purchased a full size bottle - I love it! This is now a part of my skincare routine and I love how it makes my skin look and feel. As someone in their early thirties juggling the acne and oil of my youth and the concerns around wrinkles and fine lines as I age I need products that will work for my skin now and as it ages. This delivers.

author: Shaybass
body: So I was very skeptical at first..my skin can be sensitive at times..no issues with this serum easy to use smelled great and actually reduced my wrinkles super impressed

author: Lac70
body: Overall I was impressed with the results I have a very deep line between my eyes and noticed significant improvements in its depth and texture. author: chloechez
body: I really enjoyed using the Smart Clinical Repair serum! It game my skin a glowing look and was super gentle to use.

author: Lacey

I do have fine lines and some deeper set wrinkles, so I thought it would be good for me. I have been testing this over the last couple of weeks and it has yet to show any signs of diminishing wrinkles (or my age). This is a pass for me.

Application was fine but I didn't find that the results were spectacular. I didn't notice any marked difference before and after the two week use.

author: Lola91

author: Trinny

It made my face feel baby smooth. Itâ€™s a very light weight formula. I could immediately see the effects on my wrinkles after only a few minutes after application. It tightened the skin around them and had a softer look to them ( not as defined) After the first week there was a visible reduction in my wrinkles and they seemed to fade out while having my face look and feel moisturized and healthy. Every day I continue to use this amazing serum, I have to honestly say itâ€™s my favourite so farâ€¦ I have already started to share my thoughts with family and friends.. A definite recommendâ€¦ Bravo CLINIQUE

It also contains hyaluronic acid which helps plump up the skin and hold in extra moisture. After a few days I noticed my skin to be uniform and healthy with reduction of pores. I didn't notice much of a plumping effect and feel like on its own it would not be hydrating enough but perfect if you are like me and love to layer.

author: Mumzie

author: Golden hair
body: I used the serum twice a day for 2 weeks. It was nice and light and easy to apply. No fragrance so not irritating. It left my skin smooth and not greasy. It was easy to apply moisturizer following the serum.

author: Pali123
header: This is a very nice light serum.

author: Chrysti198

author: JasmineB50
header: Clinique hits it out of the park!

On a few of them I do see a tiny bit but It doesnâ€™t last long term or it just stops working. This one is very different. Itâ€™s like a dry skin drink, it absorbed well, and I wasnâ€™t struggling to melt into my skin. There was something different to this, a glow from within, over time deep lines lessened & my makeup went on better. It exceeded my expectations! Clinique has many awesome products, but dare I say it, this is one of the â€œbest of the bestsâ€. After 3 days the skin started to have a nice hydrated feeling. It was glowing. After 5 days my crows feet was less visible. After 7 days the texture in my skin approved. After 8 - 10 days the compliments started. After 14 days OMG my deep lines looked a lot less. It just gets better every week! I will pick be up more! I can see it as my skincare staple! No regrets only compliments here!

Although I didn't see much reduction in the deeper forehead wrinkles, my skin DID feel smoother and slightly more plumped, again, especially around the outer eye area. I would have liked a larger sample size in order to test the product for at least a month as I felt it was more difficult to ascertain change in such a small amount of time. Overall, I'd say the biggest impact was how smooth it made my skin feel, which in turn made my make up application appear flawless.

author: cha23
body: This formula is made with hyaluronic acid, which plumps skin and thereby reduces signs of aging. After using this serum, my skin looks and feels instantly hydrated, After a week ir so, my skin looks healthier. I would strongly recommend Clinique's Repair Wrinkly Correcting Serum.

body: This is one of the first wrinkle correcting serums I have ever tried and I believe it is beginning to make a difference. I am wrinkled somewhat around the mouth. Clinique is a reliable product. A member of my family uses it regularly for her sensitive skin. I will continue on using this product and I am very excited to see what a difference it will make in longer usage.

author: Rayea
body: I've tried this serum for 2 weeks and used it twice a day. While I didn't notice any major improvement of fine lines on my forehead, my skin overall does feel more hydrated. We've just transitioned to colder weather and this serum has definitely helped my skin retain moisture. I have combination skin and my cheeks were feeling a bit tight prior to using this product. Despite having retinoid, this serum was very gentle and didn't require any easing it into my routine. I definitely recommend this serum to everyone, for any type of prevention or skin repair.

author: Barbie
body: Serum felt very refreshing when applied to face, after using for the past 21/2 weeks, i noticed a visible diffrence in the fine lines around forehead and face. Serum was used twice a day in the morning and at night

author: Mary
header: Bring back the original Custom Smart Serum
body: The original smart serum was wonderful and improved color and texture of my skin. This new formula makes my skin too blotchy and doesn't help texture.

author: Ulya A
body: Love my new Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting. Soft, feels light on the skin, visible reduced wrinkle even from first use

author: BB170
body: It was ok. Not better nor worse than any others I have tried.

author: Sue62
body: Trying Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting was a pleasure. I loved the way it left your skin feeling and absorbed really well. Didnâ€™t leave a â€œfilmâ€ feel on your skin. Also liked the fact that itâ€™s in a tube rather than a eye dropper to use. Much easier to use. Noticed a difference & wrinkles donâ€™t seem as pronounced. Would use it again just wish the price point was lower.

author: Emmaa
body: Loved the feel and application of this serum. It left my skin feeling great. It was light and non oily. Took a while to see any results from the serum.

author: Smiles3434
header: I see some changes but hard to say
body: I like this serum. Iâ€™ve used a lot of different ones over the years and if I were to try this over several weeks Iâ€™m sure Iâ€™d be seeing a bigger difference than just over two weeks. I have noticed a brighter smoother complexion but of course no major difference in my wrinkles as a two week sample wonâ€™t show that.

author: JulieLa
body: I love that this product has basically no scent. It had a very nice texture and did not leave my face feeling sticky. With it being a sample size it was hard to tell if it made much improvement to my skin. I can say I did not have any negative reactions and my skin does feel nice

author: Mom of 5
body: I really liked the way it made my skin feel. With 5 kids I donâ€™t have time for a complex skin care routine do this did the trick.

author: PUMPKIN9211
header: It makes a difference but is it enough?
body: Does my skin look better? The answer is yes. Do my wrinkles look any less? The answer is not to me. Maybe a slight improvement on the tiny fine lines but absolutely no change in "real" wrinkles.

author: SueSueSixty
header: Light and smooth. Absorbed very quickly.
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair was very light and went on smoothly. It absorbed very quickly, almost too quick to spread though. I would purchase again.

author: Ravenhawk39
body: As with all of Clinique products, my skin absorbs it quickly. Makes my forehead which is especially dry feel much softer and smoother. I recommend this product especially for dry skin.

author: Princessjen
body: The serum went on really nice and smooth on my skin. There was no srong scent, which was nice. It also was not sticky or greasy after I applied it. The lines around my mouth are still there, but I will keep using it until the sample is done to see if it helps.

author: Kitty
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum left my skin feeling very smooth and soft. My face appeared to have fewer wrinkles and the serum didn't leave my face feeling greasy. It made foundation application more smooth and supple. It's a quality serum that improves skin as you use it.

author: Lisacamo
body: started to noticed a bit of a difference within 5 days. Easy to apply and does not feel greasy or anything. I will buy it for sure.

author: Janoo
body: From the first day I tried Clinique Wrinkle Correcting Serum, my skin felt soft and loved the fact the it was light and didn't feel heavy on my skin. As well when I try new creams/serums my face breaks out in blemishes, it did not, I will definitely be purchasing this product

author: Ulya A
body: Love my new Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting. Soft, feels light on the skin, visible reduced wrinkle even from first use

author: BB170
body: It was ok. Not better nor worse than any others I have tried.

author: Sue62
body: Trying Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting was a pleasure. I loved the way it left your skin feeling and absorbed really well. Didnâ€™t leave a â€œfilmâ€ feel on your skin. Also liked the fact that itâ€™s in a tube rather than a eye dropper to use. Much easier to use. Noticed a difference & wrinkles donâ€™t seem as pronounced. Would use it again just wish the price point was lower.

author: Chrissy
body: I received this as a tester and the container that I was given was pretty small so it didn't go very far. I can't comment on any long term effects, but it was a night texture, not sticky at all, and the smell was very faint, but pleasant. I liked how it made my skin feel, but it's a bit pricey.

author: mischief2
body: I love the feel of this serum! It goes on very smoothly, it is not greasy or sticky and absorbs quickly. I have been applying this at bedtime three times a week for the past couple of weeks. While it is not enough time to see long-term results yet, I can say that my skin has remained clear, with no breakouts from using this product. My skin is brighter and feels softer.

author: Nanounanou1978
header: Makes my skin feels smooth and soft
body: I tried it every day since I received it. It makes my skin feel smoother and softer but it did not repair any of the wrinkles I have.

author: Sheris14
body: I am very pleased with the serum. I used a pea sized amount and it went a long way. Been using it everyday and have notice a significant change in the way my skin feels and looks. I am amazed at how light the serum feels on my skin. I am definitely hooked.

author: Kerrie11
body: I really liked this product and will definitely buy it. It went on smooth and my skin felt hydrated and wrinkles were diminishing

author: EastCoaster
body: This is a great product, no fragrance went on smoothly with no greasiness or oily feeling . I applied this first then used my reg moisturizer over it after it was absorbed . I saw a noticeable difference after a few days of use . I found I looked less tired-looking and refreshed. I would recommend this product.

author: Joannev
body: The cream was good and does remove wrinkles but seems a bit exspensive for me to use regularly. If it was a bit more affordable I would consider using daily.

author: Kdanielle
header: A nice serum but not my favourite
body: This was nice but thicker than most serums. Its like a gel/cream and absords quickly. The sample size was small so it's hard to assess how my skin would react with longer use. nice as a sample but I don't think I'd buy it.

author: Tangrl
body: This product provides a nice light feeling. Not too heavy like some retinol

author: Britt01
header: Feels nice, unsure about lasting results
body: I received a small tester of the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum that I've used over the last 2 weeks. I would usually trial a product for a longer period of time to be able to speak to long term results, however, I can only speak to the short term. The serum has a silky texture that feels nice and hydrating on my skin prior to applying a moisturizer. I didn't have any sensitivity to it (I regularly use retinol products). I haven't seen a change in my fine lines or dark spots yet and am unsure if I would purchase in the future at such a high price point.

author: Up in the air
body: Na havenâ€™t noticed and change yet will keep putting on

author: Kim10
body: This serum has a pretty iridescent sheen to it and a nice texture. I found it a bit thicker than other serums and it absorbed quite quickly into my dry skin so I may have been using more than necessary. That being said it has been doing its work! I have noticed an improvement in the overall quality of my skin and it appears brighter and fuller. The serum helps moisturizer absorb better and has even left my face feeling softer. I would recommend this product for aging skin!

author: Dctrian
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum Worked great! I used it morning and night and my skin improvement was easy to see. The lines under my eyes were not as noticeable and my forehead lines were not noticeable at all. My skin feels great!

author: JoJo Pilate
header: A good change a smother in my face
body: Very good product not sticky I am using all the time

author: Sassy
header: I didnâ€™t notice any difference/ changes
body: I did not notice and changes to my skin, however this could possibly be due to the very small sample size and short amount of time to trial it

author: Jackie27
body: I really enjoyed the product. I liked that there wasn't any strong fragrance. It felt great going on my skin. Made my skin feel soft.

author: Dancersmom
body: I have added Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum to my morning and evening skincare regimen. A small amount goes a long way. It is non-greasy, smooth and light. I will continue to apply the serum twice daily and monitor my results.

author: Rowszee
body: I have been using this product for about two weeks. It have really improved the fine lines and wrinkles around my mouth and plumped up the skin in those areas. I didnâ€™t find that it had any scent and it spread on very easily and a tiny bit went a long way. I would certainly buy this and I highly recommend it.

author: LoriB87
body: This product goes on smoothly and the scent is very nice and fresh. I'm unsure it is making any difference to any noticeable wrinkles though.

author: Guccis_mommie
body: I received this for free review and OMG I absolutely love it! I just turned 52 and have been focusing more on my skin and taking care of it so when I received this I was super excited to try it. It left my skin feeling so much more smooth and hydrated than it has been in a long time. It also made my fine lines and wrinkles less obvious which is amazing! Even my husband noticed how great my skin looks and said I even look younger. Now if that isn't a great testimonial then I don't know what is!!! Now that I have tried it I will definitely continue to use it!

author: MorganP89
body: I found after 2 weeks I did notice a difference in my skin. It is brighter and more healthy looking. Although I did not notice a big difference in my fine lines. The product itself was a good consistency and absorbed quickly.

author: TERRY
header: It really works great, easy to use,
body: This product really works well, the lines on my face is hardly noticeable,

author: Lil50
body: Smoothness My skin became very smooth or the use of this serum. I used the serum for 7 days, morning and night.

author: AniD100
header: Itâ€™s a nice light serum; works great!
body: Very nice light serum. Works great under skin cream. Not greasy or heavy. Absorbs quickly. I would definitely purchase this serum in the store. Helped firmed my skin.

author: Mickey_23
body: I love the product as it seems really working. I will buy the regular size of it and can't wsot for the result.

author: Kitty
body: I love the opportunity to sample new products. While I have never purchased Clinique products in the past, this is definitely a superior product to others I have tried in the past. I love the fresh scent as I don't care for any added fragrance in any of my skin care products. I love the appearance and feel of my skin and would consider purchasing this product in future.

author: Crees
body: Smooth application and even smoother skin after a few days. Nice light scent and non greasy serum is a must have.

author: Tarra
body: The serum was nice to the touch and went on the skin smoothly. It smelled nice and it didn't leave a heavy feeling. I did not see a noticeable change in the fine lines around my eyes, forhead, or mouth. But it was a pretty small sample and I assume it would take a few more times to make a big change .

author: Laura
body: I've used this for 2 weeks and I really don't see any changes. The product does go on nice, but doesn't seem to be anything special, or different from other, regular moisturizers.

author: Maverick
body: The serum was hydrating, lightly scented, and absorbed easily. My skin felt smooth and hydrated after use.

author: Chrissymc
body: My overall opinion of the Wrinkle Serum is that it is fantastic. I used the Serum for a week and noticed a significant difference in my face. I would recommend this product to all my friends and family.

author: FarrahnsMom
body: Upon putting the serum on my face for the first time I noticed the serum didn't have a strong fragrance which I liked very much. Soon after that it absorbed very fast in to my skin and left it feeling very smooth and silky. I found my fine lines and wrinkles were less noticeable after finishing the tester.

author: ChrissyAnn123
body: I faithfully used this serum for two weeks. I found it absorbed nicely and felt comfortable to wear. It seemed to target small lines and wrinkles giving my face a more youthful glowing appearance. My skin felt more softer, but also plumper. I like that I could use morning and night which is a plus so I do not need to buy two different serums. I would highly recommend and continue to add New Clinique Smart Repair Serum to my skincare regimen.

author: alycats65
body: This is classic Clinique. It's a wonderful product that has made a noticeable difference on the frown lines between my eyes. I use it in the morning and at night before bed. It isn't greasy and absorbs quickly.

author: LoloNoir
body: I was pleasantly surprised by this serum. I noticed right away that it sank into my skin effortlessly and filled in fine lines. After about two weeks, I noticed that some of my crows feet had left my face!

body: Amazing product. Makes my skin feel so bright and even. It is quickly and easily absorbed into my skin

author: Francine64
body: We're to start. This product extended all my expectations It goes on smooth and leaves your face silky I was amazed of getting results after only 6 days My deep wrinkles were noticeably reduced I'm now a clinical client

author: Calli
body: Wonderful product!! It made my skin look and feel fantastic. I do not have a lot of wrinkles, but for deep furrow lines and it definitely soften the look of them and gave my skin an overall healthier and smoother look and feel. I would definitely recommend this product and I will be making this part of my daily skin care routine.

author: Nursegrad
body: I used this product twice a day for 2 weeks. Here are my pros and cons. The repair serum absorbed well and didn't leave my skin sticky at all. A very small amount was all it took to cover my skin. There isn't any scent. The con was it didn't do anything to help with my wrinkles at all. Must say that I am very disappointed in this product, as I do like the Clinique brand.

author: aej2021
body: I found Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum to be a welcome addition to my skincare routine. I used this over the course of two weeks before bed and for me it mainly resulted in brightening and smoothing of my skin. I think that it also helped with fine lines - I am excited to keep using it and see the progress. I didn't find this product to be very hydrating, but it did sink in to my skin very quickly, so was easy to top with moisturizer. Overall, very light and went on smoothly. I would definitely continue using this product. Also loved that it's scent free.

author: Patches
header: Clinique Clinical Repair Serum Does Work
body: I received a free sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I have used Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum for over 2 weeks, applying it every morning and before bed every night. It's very easy to use, just put a bit on a clean finger and massage into your wrinkles. My skin feels moist but not greasy afterwards and I've have no issues with rashes or breakouts from the Serum. I have deep forehead wrinkles, smile lines (crows feet) and wrinkles around my mouth. I noticed my smile lines seemed to diminish first, not a huge difference just subtle changes, my forehead wrinkles seem less deep and a wee bit shorter. Around my mouth doesn't seem to have much change. I will continue to use Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum until my sample is finished and then decide if I will purchase it.

author: melzed5
body: I liked it. It left my skin very soft. It is not greasy or sticky which is nice. It blended well under makeup. It has next to no scent which is something I really love. I did not notice a huge difference in my lines/wrinkles though. Maybe they were softer. I only used a sample for a few weeks . Maybe I would see a big difference if I used it for a few months. It is a wonderful moisturiser!

author: Justrose
body: It goes on smoothly, and feels nice on my skin. Makes my face look smoother but did not really notice a change. Maybe it would but the sample doesnt appear to be enough to use longer and then possibly see a difference.

author: banditkjay68
body: I have noticed that the skin/fine lines and puffiness under my eyes and around my mouth have improved. I am pleased with the difference. Applying this serum makes me more aware and pay more attention to my trouble spots. I think I might buy and use it in the future.

author: Amor Propio
body: The serum is okay but doesn't moisturize is as I was expecting. This is probably more suitable for oily skin rather than mine, which is more on the dry side. The scent is neutral, but the consistency is watery than I prefer.

author: Rinkel41
body: Love this product!!! Ease of application. No irritation. Softens the appearance of wrinkles. All you expect and more from a Wrinkle Correcting Serum. This product delivers!!! Nothing worse than looking in the mirror and seeing a wrinkled face staring back at you. My face is soft and smooth to the touch. No tackiness or shine after application. Already planning on the purchase of the full sized product. Thank you Clinique Smart Clinical Repair!!!

author: lovin clinique
body: i was so skeptical about seeing any difference in my crows feet with the small size sample i got .but im surprised .in just 2 weeks they are not as noticeable .im doing my happy dance .thank you for the opportunity to try this .it is on my shopping list

author: Zelle
body: I was a bit sceptical when I started this trial, but I saw results almost immediately. The fine lines and wrinkles on my cheeks are almost invisible, and the deeper wrinkles on my forehead are fading fast. It is a quick addition to my daily routine, so I will be keeping this product on hand permanently.

author: HappyGlowLucky
body: I really liked the scent, and the fact that it was light. It's a bit difficult to say, after only 2 weeks, what the effects are, but I have to say that my skin does look better - it looks smoother, and more even. I would definetly consider purchasing this in the future, because if it can make my skin smoother in only 2 weeks, I would think that using it for a longer time would create very good resaults.

author: grateful
body: Provides me with the appearance of soft and clean skin

author: andrea34
body: The texture was nice. But the size of the sample was not enough to give a complete review.

author: SMLT69
body: Was a good trial size item, no smell. Found it to be a little runny as a serum.

author: atirf07
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repairâ„¢ Wrinkle Correcting Serum,,is very a good product,,,my skin is better on my face,,,i loved it,,,

author: AlanaA
body: I received this product as part of a trial and was really hopeful that it would address some signs of aging. In the end, the product was OK, but didn't have a noticeable or lasting effect. When I first applied it, it was fairly moisturizing and not greasy, which I appreciated, but it didn't actually reduce the signs of wrinkles and the moisturizing properties didn't last long. It certainly didn't leave the glow I was expecting after I had washed it off. It was OK at keeping my skin looking OK for a while, but I wish it worked longer-term to correct signs of aging.

author: Alicia88
body: I am 33 years old and I don't have deep wrinkles. My skin is combo. I found the texture to be nice- not greasy - absorbed quickly. I found it mildly moisturizing. What I did not enjoy about this serum was that I found that it broke me out. Maybe I used it too often? I am not sure, but I will be decreasing it's use to see if that clears my skin again.

author: Country Girl
body: Was very impressed with Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum. Right from the first use my skin felt smooth and soft. After 3 days I could already see a difference in the wrinkles on my forehead and around the mouth area. After using this product for almost three weeks some of the finer wrinkles have completely disappeared. I would definitely recommend this product and will be buying it.

author: amz31
header: Love it! Great texture and feel on skin!
body: I love the texture, absorbtion, if feels smooth and comfortable. no burning or stinging. I haven't used it long enough to see drastic differences but I really enjoy it as a serum and would love to keep using it to see how it helps my skin. I am used to using retinoid products and RetinA so it's nice to have a more mild option. Doesn't cause skincare or makeup to pill on top, which is sometimes a thing with products like this. I would recommend for sure. No scent or aversive qualities.

author: shanta
body: It is a good product. My complexion is more uniform. My skin smoother than before using this product. So I like the product, but don't like the idea to check for other retinol when using it. You also have to be more careful for the sun.

author: tlynn99
body: I found it did not absorb as I expected from this brand name and after a short period, it doesn't seem like I even applied anything to my face. It felt really nice applying but the outcome was somewhat disappointing.

author: cindylee137
body: this Clinique wrinkle correcting serum is not for me, my skin did not like it. I tried it twice about 5 days apart and each time I kinda broke out, I am 55 and I got about 5 pimples when I use it. I guess it just did not agree with my skin

author: ash12
body: Really love this Clinique Wrinkle correcting serum. Non-greasy, absorbs quickly and goes on smoothly! Great for fine wrinkles. Would definitely buy this product!

author: iroh1
header: Worth a try at any age
body: I enjoyed using this serum. It's lightweight and absorbs easily, which makes layering possible as well. I have used some serums that feel too tacky on the skin that it's too uncomfortable to layer on any other moisturizer. I am usually skeptical of products that have the word "smart" in it, but this one works through the blend of three powerful anti-aging ingredients. I think it's a good product overall.

author: Mom2teenboyz
header: Didnâ€™t see results but nice moisturizer
body: I tried it twice a day for several weeks and didnâ€™t notice any change in my skin other than it wasnâ€™t dry. This time of year I suffer from really dry skin and anything I can use to help is a bonus. If it does have anti aging or wrinkle reducing components is a bonus. I like using moisturizer in the winter along with my regular skin care routine.

author: Naaz311
body: Applying first time I felt lots of difference on my skin..this product is amazing..

author: Marga
body: Its my first time using clinique serum and i find it very smooth on the skin. I like how it is quickly absorbed without the feeling if stickyness. Overall i love it. I noticed aside from reducing my fine lines, my skin was also glowing and smooth.

author: Patty77
body: It is light weight absorbs quickly my face appeared plumper looked hydrated I can feel my face tingling tightening after I apply the serum!

author: tampa
body: It was great! Felt nice on my skin and helped to remove wrinkles.

author: LC420
body: Best quality is it is not oily at all on my face or hands. Wish the sample was a bit bigger to get a real idea of of it works

author: Proudmama

author: Simiiii

author: SLS85

There also isn't much of a scent to begin with so that's a plus. But yeah, I didn't see a change at all, mostly because I didn't receive enough of a sample or offer to test it out properly.

author: SharingisCaring
body: I received a 10ml sample size of the Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum courtesy of the Home Tester Club in exchange for my honest and unbiased review #freeproduct. You will need to use a sunscreen and limit sun exposure during the week and week after usage. The consistency of the serum has a silky consistency. The serum applied and absorbed into my skin readily. It did not feel sticky or greasy. I applied the serum on my skin morning and night for a week. I didn't notice much difference except my skin felt a lot smoother after application. My skin also felt hydrated throughout the day. I believe I would need a longer period of usage to see results.

I applied this morning and night. This is all I could comment on with my sample I received. Hopefully while using this product longer, you will start to notice the fine lines fade more, that is what I was beginning to see. However the product does seem to work. Recommend

I have purchased a bottle of my own to continue using faithfully. Firm over and under eyeâ€¦ â€œfine linesâ€ and wrinkles and â€œbagsâ€ under eyes and even â€œtired eyesâ€ are completely gone. header: another serum that makes me break out
body: this is the 2nd serum i've tried and again, i was so hopeful that this one would work.  I finally cleared up my skin to start fresh.  After using this, i broke out again in the same spot.  Above my left eyebrow at the end.  And it takes forever to clear up after i stop using the product.  Definitely made my skin soft but there's something in the serums that do not like my skin. author: Abby
body: I received a sample of the Chinese Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum as a BzzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. Dark circles, big pores...I could go on all night. But this stuff has made a huge difference in the feel and look of my skin. Age spots are slowly but surely fading. I have even noticed a little improvement in my dark circles. I plan on continuing using this product and it has even inspired me to incorporate a little more self care when it comes to my skin. Added bonus..it doesn't stress out my generally super sensitive skin.

author: LG6750
body: I tried this serum 3 times, and each time I had a bad breakout, red bumps that will take awhile to go away.  Skin peeling, maybe that is from the Retinol.  If you have very sensitive and dry skin, this serum is not for you.  I do like that it is thick and hoped it would hydrate my dry skin but just did not work for me.  Clinique says they try their products on a lot of people before the product is sold.  I cannot imagine this passed the test for a person with very sensitive skin.  I will be returning this.
