body: I use this only at night as I have another Clinique serum for the day. Actually,the salesperson at the counter suggested using it at night because of the retinol. If I rub my face in the morning, I can actually feel some exfoliating. I have very sensitive skin and have had no issues with this product. I previously used the Old version and loved how smooth it made my skin feel. This newer version does not disappoint!

author: Nicolletiti
body: I received a deluxe sample size of this and really like it. Not sure if it helps with wrinkles but my skin looked really dewy and glowy after using this. So much so I don't need to use highlighter with this.

author: ziyi
body: It is amazing!!

author: KMc123
body: Definitely felt my skin was improved from using this. Doesn't feel as aggressive as retinols can feel sometimes.

author: Reb
body: this is SO different from the smart serum. It's too heavy for mid to late 30's skin. I don't think this should have replaced smart serum :( I'm so bummed. It's expensive and I would only buy if I had +50 skin.

author: Mrs. Fitz
body:
This product was a bit of a surprise.  I will say 8t is creamy and smooth  I am not a huge fan of the fragrance. It did give me a bit of a headache.  This kept me from using it daily.  I did try it specifically on my crows feet. I think I started to see a softening of them but as I said incould no use it religiously due to the fragrance inducted headaches.  
I want to say it would work but I can't sat with 100% certainty. I do encourage you to give it a try.. it definitely worth the try.

author: Shelley
body: I received a free sample in the mail and was blown away but the results!!! I am not a Clinique user.  I have deep creases in my cheeks from too much sun when I was a teenager. I COUID NOT believe what I was seeing. My skin after only 1 application was less creased. I have been using the product for over a week now (had to buy it!!!) and know that I will use this product fir the rest of my days unless they gone up with something even better. Do yourself a favor and buy this product. I LOVE IT! Thank you Clinique

author: Nicki602
body: I was excited when I found out I was going to get to test Clinique's Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I liked the gel consistency, it absorbed well and left my skin soft. The texture improved over the 2 weeks I used it and that was a nice feeling.

author: Carol
header: Good product. Makes my skin soft
body: I really love this product. I started noticing a change within a week of using it.  I definitely see a reduction in my fine lines. It also leaves my skin so soft. I will be buying this soon.

author: Crazyairbrush
body: This was my first time using a product like this. I didn't notice if it was working or not because I don't have many wrinkles but you can feel the skin tighter.

author: vivian
body: i want buy Again，i like it

author: Leslynn
body: I really enjoyed Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum. It was a little heavier than other serums and seemed more oil based. But did not bother me. At the end of the week my skin was smoother and had less fine lines and wrinkles

author: Dee76
body: Tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair, Wrinkle Correcting Serum.   And so far, I have really enjoyed it.  Doesn't have a strong smell, goes on really smoothly, and didn't leave me feeling greasy.  Helps slightly plump up a few fine lines I have, but from that alone,  I'm anxious to try it over a longer period of time. Really like how it makes my skin feel as well, smooth!!

author: Anthony C.
header: Clinique creates completely capable correcting serum
body: I have to start this review with a reveal.  The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a solid product and certainly better than most of its competitors.  Believe me, I have tried them all.  What's ironic is that, by coincidence, I was asked to review another wrinkle repair serum that came in a white box and a white plastic tube.  I was not impressed by this other product and was totally put off by its packaging.  The box in which it was sold was over an inch taller than the actual tube of the serum inside.  That product immediately misled me by falsely stating that there was more in the tube than there was in reality.  Clinique does nothing of the sort, as they are confident in the quality of their product.  Even at the same amount (or weight/size/volume) as its competitors, the customer is still getting more for their money.  You know the old adage, "size doesn't matter" is true when it comes to facial care products.  The most important characteristic of the product is that it truly works.  Clinique does work quite successfully.  Another wise statement is:  "the best things come in small packages."   Clinique is clearly among the best in the facial care product category.

author: Crazymama63
body: Nice to put on the skin. Absolutely a fine serum, absorbs quick and leaves sin Spf and supple

author: vix328
body: I received a sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum from BzzAgent. It goes on with a silky smooth feel with no oily residue on my face. I didn't get to wear it every day because it says to limit sun exposure while wearing it and we did go on vacation but I did feel like it made my skin feel smoother, more hydrated, and softer. I think it'll definitely show more results as I continue to use it.

author: TMoran79
body: I haven't used this long enough to support the anti-aging claims, but I can attest that this product absorbs well into the skin without being oily or heavy and does not irritate my very sensitive skin.

author: sbwalker40
body: I am 43 years old and I have a few wrinkles especially around my eye area. That's where it bothers me the most. So I was excited to try Clinique's  repair Wrinkle  Serum. Within a week I was already taken notice on the improvement of my skin. I fell in love with it. So thank you for helping me Clinique

author: Jules79
header: Clinique just dosen't work for me
body:
I want to love Clinique. I keep trying. I've buying their products since I was a teen. For whatever reason, their products just do not work with my skin. I don't know why. So yeah, I really wanted to love this product, and hoped to see great results , but nothing. 

So I guess if you're like me, and your skin rejects  Clinique like mine, skip this. Otherwise, I'd say try this!

author: Purple
body: This product did a tremendous job reducing the visibility of fine lines and wrinkles

author: Kenzie724
body: Great product to reduce the fine lines and wrinkles on the face and neck.

author: Angie
body: Made skin feel fuller and soft on the second day, didn't break out my skin. I use other Clinique products and love them all

author: Jaws
body: I have used this product now for about a month. My skin feels silky & smooth every time I use it.

author: Yessirhedid
body: I really enjoyed testing this repair wrinkle serum from clinique. Applying was easy and it wasnt thick heavy or sticky. After using i felt my face tightening a little bit after a few weeks of using i could see a difference in the appearance in my skin. I would recommend anyone who has wrinkle issues to give it a try

author: Susie
body: I love this stuff it made my face feel so soft and I can tell the biggest difference in my skin

author: Alicia
body: This is a great product. I've already purchased more. This made my skin feel smooth and not greasy. After about 2 weeks I could tell a difference around my eyes. This is definitely going to be part of my beauty routine.

author: Angie
body:
I was so excited to get this product. When I received it I started using right away. I saw a reduction in my fine lines. After a week of using this produce my family and friends could also see a difference in my face. I also saw a glow in my skin. I have really enjoyed using this product.
I am hooked and will keep buying this.
Ty

author: nkyjenn
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum Review
body: I tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for free and I love it. I will be buying this item regularly. I have eczema and dermatitis, so my skin is dry and red. After I began using this serum, my face began looking better than it has in years. I highly recommend this serum.

author: barblyn188
body: This product gives a burning feeling on my face.  I used it for 2 days and my skin had turned pinkish. Found this out from the samples, after I purchased it.

author: Leila
body: I like it very much

author: give-to-me
body: I've ever purchased any cosmetics for wrinkles because I was careless,,,. I don't believe that any anti ageing cream won't work as much as advertisements shows pictures before and after. Since I started using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, my skin gets smooth. I guess it's working.

author: A man's concern
body: As a male, I am still concerned about my aging skin. I have heavy wrinkles around the middle of my brows. Using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum has softened those lines by hydrating my skin and plumping them up with collagen. The Smart Clinique Repair Serum made my skin feel soft and refined my pores. I can only imagine if I used this product longer. The results would be incredible.

author: TwinMommy
body: I recently had the opportunity to try a sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair serum.  Clinique has managed to create another excellent product thats smoothes out the fine wrinkles around my eyes! The serum left my face smooth and moisterized all day!

author: Angel
body: The skin becomes better after trial.

author: Babymamabelle1611
body: I really liked it and it started doing what it says it does just the sample isn't really enough and I need to get the actual size. But I definitely recommend it. I plan on buying it soon to keep using it.

author: Dayanna
header: Makes my Skin Clear and smooth
body: I loved using the old grey bottle (for those who have been with clinique for a while it was the original serum) but this serum hits different and works wonders :)

author: CN
body: I love this serum, my skin has never felt so good.  I have sensitive and dry skin so I use a couple pumps of this with a fine layer of the Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator, at night and it does wonders for my skin.

author: Aleana
body: I'm loving this Clinique Serum! It's nice and thick and creamy. No greasy feeling at all. I put it on at night after I wash my face. I. The morning I'll add a little with my moisturizer before applying my makeup. The results aren't dramatic but I am seeing a difference.

author: Young at heart
body: This serum has a light, very silky feel on the skin. Any fragrance is very light to non existent.  Definitely not oily or unpleasant to use, and it does seem to plump up the wrinkles.  I haven't been able to use it for long enough to give an assessment of its long-term effects.

author: Megawoman
body: PLEASE bring back the original Smart Correcting Serum. It was perfect! This new stuff just makes my face feel oily and dirty and so far, I don't see any improvements to my skin at all.

author: Kat
header: Makes skin feel and look radiant
body: I am just starting to get the fine lines that everyone dreads as they get older, and I've tried a couple of products that seemed to have little to no results.  But this product is way different than any other I have tried in the past. I can actually see the results and others can too. I've had several compliments from people I know asking me what I've done because they can tell the difference. My fine lines have all but disappeared and my face feels silky smooth and is radiant. I definitely recommend this product to any woman who is trying to find ways to get rid of those dreaded fine lines and wrinkles. You won't regret it.

author: Teesh
body: I decided to use this only around my eyes so I could really see if there was any change. I used it in the morning and evening. In the mornings I would apply it after washing my face and then add other serums and moisturizer and let them all absorb before putting on my makeup.  I didn't see a huge change in the lines around my eyes but it did slightly plump the area so my under eyes looked less tired. Overall that was the biggest benefit,  wich to me was a good one.

author: Melsubo
body: I used this everyday for over a week and didn't see any difference. I kept checking daily for any signs of change to around my eye and harassed my husband to see if he did, he did not! It even occasionally felt a little burning.

author: Heathermobetta
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a very good product. I wish the sample would have been a little bigger so that I could test it's full potential.

author: Brandih1121
header: It's works as good as you'd expect
body: Clinique has good products, and this does not disappoint! I did receive a small amount and I Assume if I was able to use it longer I would've seen better results.

author: Ljp004j
body: I received a sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair from Bzzagent. It goes on smoothly and has a pleasant fragrance. It appears to have diminished the lines and wrinkles from around my eyes and mouth. I will continue to use this serum and hope to have even greater results.

author: SteveOs
body: This serum does a great job at hydrating the skin where applied. I did not really notice any difference in my wrinkles, maybe a couple of weeks isn't long enough. I did notice an improvement in the texture of my skin where the dark and light spots look blended. I like that its scent free and not greasy and that it does not cause me to breakout. I may buy a full size bottle, which will give me more to to re-evaluate the wrinkles.

author: mchick80
body: This correcting serum is great for the lines under and around my eyes now that I've turned 40 . The serum is lightweight and I put it on after washing my face. It definitely helps smooths my wrinkles.

author: Timmy
body: Noticed some plumping of the fine lines, haven't used it long enough to tell the long last effects, but it's something I'll definitely keep using

author: Stacey In Pa
body: I am a huge fan of Clinique and I recently tried their smart clinical repair wrinkle cream. Within two weeks I have noticed a huge difference of my skins elasticity and glow. This serum is exactly what my face needed at the age of 40 to look younger again. I have since then ordered this product and I'm excited to receive it and share it with my mom. My mother is looking forward to also trying this. I use this in the morning and at night. You will notice a huge difference within a week but I noticed an even bigger difference in the two weeks that I have been using it. Clinique does not let down!!!

author: Rapha76
body: I did not get good results from this serum. It made my skin feel bumpy and I started breaking out more than usual after a few days of use. I had to discontinue using it.

author: SunnyDaysInEden
header: This one is for your long game
body:
I've always loved Clinique and have used different products for many years. I have tried this serum a few times in the past couple weeks. First, I'd like to say that it is lightweight, is not greasy, and there is absolutely no scent. These three things makes my skin very happy. However, I don't see any short term results from the product yet. I have not been good about wearing it each day because it is Summer and the usage instructions say to limit exposure to the sun while using the product. So I don't use it if we are going to be outdoors for the day. With regular use, it may provide better results. 

I received this serum from BzzAgent and Clinique in return for an honest review.

author: Ljstolp
body: This serum goes on very smooth! Its smell is not bad which I love and you feel almost like a tightness when it dries! I think its great for problem areas like between the eyes and smile lines but I also applied it to my neck as well!

author: TawnyPurrrzz
body: Love, love, love this serum! It feels so smooth and silky upon application and within one week, I saw visible differences in the depth of my wrinkles. With the small sample, I was able to treat my young, recently emerging laugh lines & they have drastically diminished already. This trial experience leaves me wanting more, and wishing that I could afford to purchase it right away! I will definitely do so when able!

author: Michelle
body: I have used a competitive brand for over 30 years and I'm so happy I decided to try clinique. The texture is fluid, smooth and non greasy. Absorbing rapidly to your skin. Also very small amount is needed, making the product last longer. I received compliment about how I looked in my early 30s.... I am 41!

author: Ginerz1
body: I have been using Clinique's Gel Moisturizer, and their repair products on and off for the past 10 years, and have never been led astray. This smart clinical repair serum does exactly what it claims to do, and then some. I have oily skin, and most other serums I've tried leave me feeling greasy and shiny, I didn't have that problem using this, and I noticed that my skin felt and looked smoother in the days that I used this product. Would definitely recommend this Clinique Smart Clinical Repair to anyone, and especially those with oily skin.

author: Juliea66
body: I tried the Clinique zcorrecting Sernum that was sent to me 2 times a day and I have to say so many people commented on my "bewness" of my face. When I looked in the mirror I could see the difference and years gone bye. I will definitely continue to buy this product.

author: Kristie
body: I love it. It was wonderful and it was great on my face.

author: Redhead
body: Instantly my skin felt hydrated throughout the day. I have been using this product for about 10 days and have noticed improvement of my dry sensitive skin. My face feels smoother. In fact, I think my old age wrinkles look less noticable. Great product and will continue to use this serum.

author: firerobin
body: I liked how this made my skin feel, however, I don't know if I really saw any results with just using the sample.  I did purchase the product and will be using it to see if it really works.

author: Hippyleslie
body: This cream is weightless. Smooth to the touch and Soft. I can see the lines going away in less than 2 days.

author: Caroline
body: So far I'm happy with the sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum I received. I was curious to try it especially for my fine lines (crow's feet!) & few dark spots I have. Thus far I've noticed an ever so slight improvement, which I'm happy with as I know retinoids can take time to work. So time will tell whether I see further improvement. I also like the light but hydrating texture. I would definitely recommend! (Just wish it was not so expensive.)

author: zebralines
body:
I am reviewing a wrinkle reducing and skin enhancing serum. The full name of the product is
"Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum" and the brand is Clinique. In a nutshell, "It worked. It enhanced my facial skin SOFTNESS and created a very SMOOTH skin texture and reduced to some degree the lines that I had between my eyebrows".
  In more detail, when I first applied it, I felt an immediate pleasurable reaction on my skin that was like ""scrubbing bubbles" for lack of a better term. I was quite impressed. I kept applying it over the next few days and noticed a marked softness and smoothness to my facial skin(cheeks, forehead, etc.) that made me want to touch my own face over and over as it felt so good. 
    The substance is a liquid SERUM and it is very concentrated so that a small amount goes a long way.
    In terms of wrinkles, I do not have any fine lines but have three vertical creases on my forehead in the area between my eyebrows. The serum caused this area to mildly plump up and thus noticeably reduced these creases, but did not remove them completely after about 10 days of use. The insert from the box says that after 16 weeks of use there is a 32% reduction in stubborn lines. 
    On a critical level it seemed to leave a fine residue on my skin that rubbed off as time went on. It is VERY concentrated, though, so use small amounts first to see what works for you.
    In summary, the product worked well and I
would recommend it. I have never used any skin products like this before so I can not cross-compare it.

author: DeRay
body: I noticed very little difference.  I expected better results. However,  i think over longer terms I could receive better and would keep using.

author: Kellkell76
body: I really like this face serum, after using it it made my face feel very smooth, it did not leave my face feeling sticky or oily. I noticed a small bit of a difference, but I did only use it for two and a half weeks so far, I will buy a full size bottle and continue to use it to get the full effect. What I can see so far, is that I'm liking the results and I would recommend it to anyone.

author: Rebec39
body: I was pretty impressed with Clinique's Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum.  Despite the overly long name, I don't think Clinique was trying to override the few benefits of this serum by giving it a name with seven words!  Haha!  This is a smooth, clear serum that absorbs well, but it does take a little bit longer than most serums to finally become ungreasy to the touch as it sinks into your skin.  But sink in it does!  Even if all the collagen-boosting claims fall through, this serum does a couple of things very well.  One is that it absorbs very well.  Two is that it is a fantastic moisturizer in itself, and I never felt the need for additional moisturizing on top of this serum.  It is so great at moisturizing that it does make your skin appear smoother by sincerely plumping your skin enough that one application got rid of my very fine crow's feet just by plumping them out!  I did not have enough time to see if there are longterm benefits of this serum, but I do like it so far!

author: Anthony
header: What a difference in a short period of time!!
body: Clinique Smart Clincial Repair Winkle Correcting Serum really works!! After 2 weeks of using this amazing product, you actually see the difference. At first use, it absorbs into the skin fairly quick. After a few day you can feel it working literally as the areS it was used for, in this case for crows feet. The affected area felt a little irritated and tender but not that seemed like an adverse reaction. As the days progressed, the affected area seemed plumper and more rejuvenated. I will let you be the judge with the pictures provided. I will definitely keep using this product and I will definitely recommend this product to my family and friends!!

author: Chilly
body: It leaves you skin smooth. I highly recommended it!!! It clears wrinkles.

author: Don
header: It works as long as you keep using it
body:
After 2 or 3 days the very smallest of the scowl-line wrinkles had disappeared, and a few more days later larger had filled in somewhat if you were looking closely in a mirror. A day or 2 after stopping, they were visible again. 
This serum met my expectations and worked as well as other competitors in its price range. However, one of the competitors is certified organic and specifically notes being gmo-free, while the Clinique version does not.

author: Dawn
body: I loved this product.

author: IdahoHayHauler
body: I was so glad to sample Cliniques Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. It goes on smooth, absorbs perfectly and leaves my skin looking better than ever! After using it for a couple of days, I can go without wearing make up. My skin looks THAT good!

author: Boo
body: My skin felt nice and soft but some days I went to the greasy side. This would be great for skin that is a little drier. Overall, it was decent.

author: Kathy
body: I wasn't sure how well it would work because there was only enough for five or six days. I was pleasantly surprised on about the fourth day I could see some changes in my skin. It seemed smooth, but also a little tighter. It was like hiding the small lines around my eyes and my mouth. I am definitely going to buy a big size. Thanks for the sample.

author: Mariamaria
body: I really like this serum. It has nice light texture that glides on smoothly. It isn't greasy and doesn't leave any stickiness behind. Works well under makeup as well. This is also a great serum for those who are sensitive to strong fragrances as it is unscented. I definitely recommend this serum.

author: Yvonne
body: I have used this for a week now have not seen any changes yet ! I will do another review if I do see results !  I'm hoping I do 😊 I will have to say it's non greasy goes on smooth makes your skin feel soft and my makeup goes on very nicely . With that being said I would recommend my friends family and others to try this product

author: StaciJ
header: Repair review - Clinique is great quality as always
body:
I got a free sample of the Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum.  I used it for 2 weeks - morning and night - and here are my thoughts! 

At 45 I'm pretty lucky to not really have a huge problem with wrinkles so I tried it on my forehead.  I have noticed how much smoother my forehead looks after using this for two weeks.    It wasn't a huge difference - but I can tell (see pic) which is awesome.  

The bigger thing for me personally is that I did not have an allergic reaction to this product.  I have super sensitive skin and am allergic to SO MANY things, but this actually seemed to help clear up some spots instead of creating new problems like other products I have tried in the past.  (not Clinique, but other name brands I won't mention) 

I would recommend trying this to anyone looking to try to minimize signs of aging.  Even if you are nervous about ingredients and reactions - I think you will be happy if you give it a shot!

author: Neeni1
body: I used my sample of this product and I was happy with my results. I used it under my eyes and in the corners where I have lines forming and I have noticed they have faded some and my under eye puffiness has gone down as well.

author: Barbara
body: This stuff is a God send. It smoothed out my wrinkles like magic. I definitely reccomend

author: Jamie
body: I have been using this product for at least 2 weeks consistently now and I have seen a nice improvement. My lines and wrinkles look less defined and my skin seems to glow more. I would recommend this to anyone looking for an alternative to botex and just looking for a cream to help slow the process of aging

author: Engiel04
body: This corrector has by far exceeded my expectations. It has helped correct the fine lines around my eyes and on my forehead. I also tried it on my deep eleven lines and actually got a small result! I expected the cream to cause a tightening feeling but that did not happen. There is no bad odor as with some other products as well as no greasy residue. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to erase small lines from their skin.

author: Lilarae77
body:
I have used many many serums and have finally found a miracle one. Clinique has been in my routine for a while but never the serum. But this product is a miracle worker. My skin feels silky and not heavy residue no sticky feeling and not greasy. I definitely will recommend this to my friends and family to get this product a try and it will be the last serum they will need to buy. I'm on a budget, but I try to get it for my face regimen. 

👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

author: Melodypitts
body: I received the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for free for testing and submitting a review. I really enjoyed this product. It is really easy to apply this product. It fully absorbed into my skin without leaving behind a sticky residue. I noticed my fine lines around my eyes and lips were minimized. It did not irritate my skin at all.

author: Boston Guy
body: My wife used and and said it did as described and would use it again.

author: Lauriefnh
body: Left a sticky feeling

author: 414Blondie
body: I really liked this cream. Helped not only moisturize but it really worked on those fine lines. I noticed a difference after a week of using this product. I did receive it as a sample and will definitely purchase this once my samplea ran out.

author: Lisbeth
body: Is amazing product, I'm using for 1 week, and I see the results right away.

author: M3dusa503
body: I tried out the Clinique Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum and I have two of those forehead wrinkles that are quite wide. I used the serum on them. They didn't quite disappear, but i did notice a difference. The ridges smoothed a little. So my angry little forehead wrinkle lines were not as noticeable. They didn't go away completely after using this daily. But there definitely was some improvement.

author: Daizy7155
body: It's fwir to say my skin felt fantastic after use, much moreso than many other products (serums, oils, moisturizers) that I've used at this price point. I cannot stand a sticky feeling and there's none of that. Given the sample size I was asked to try, and just starting peri menopause, I feel like I needed to use the product for longer to give me the full benefit.

author: Bcasey25
body: I really like the Clinique smart clinical repair serum. I've been using it for lines on my forehead. I have seen a noticeable change in their appearance. The product has a pleasant smell. It's not too thick or greasy. If you're looking for a high quality wrinkle serum then this is the one for you.

author: Pammy313
body: I really liked it

author: Dawn
header: Great Product!! Clinique Smart Clinical Repair
body: My skin feels smoother since starting this product. I'm starting to see fine lines disappear. It absorbs very nicely and doesn't leave the skin feeling greasy. I have to be careful of using new skin products due to breakouts. This product didn't cause any breakouts for me. Great product

author: Nickypoo
body: The sample I tried went on smoothly and did not irritate my sensitive skin.  It absorbed well and I think I did notice some improvement in the texture of my skin.

author: Memmom
body: I have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum as part of a campaign. It is lightweight and absorbs quickly. I see a slight difference in my forehead wrinkles and the bags under my eyes. It is fragrance free and great for my skin. I had no redness, burning or irritation like with other products. I recommend Clinique Serum.

author: Laura
body: I received a sample and have used a small amount daily for the last 2 weeks. I'm starting to see results but will purchase and continue using for longer period. Definitely worth a shot.

author: Michele
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum made my skin smooth. The serum was easy to apply and did not make my skin feel weighed down. I did feel that the few wrinkles I have were less noticeable however if I continue to use this product I believe they would be barely visible.

author: Magpie
body: I have tried allot of serums on my skin and just haven't been able to find the right one until I tried this serum.

author: Slove
body: I have been using this free sample of the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum and I must say,I'm impressed. After 10 days , the lines on my forehead are less noticeable.I use this serum in tandum with Clinique anti wrinkle eye cream.

author: MGR1008
body: I have been using this serum for a couple of weeks. At the beginning I felt a little twinkle in my eyes, I guess that while I was getting used to the product, but I continued to used on my skincare regimen. The skin around my eyes started to be more fresh and my eyes started to look less tired overall, I will continue to use this correcting serum without hesitation!

author: Momma4life
body: This Clinique smart repair correcting serum is great for anti aging I love using this before my moisturizer it's very hydrating . I love and highly recommend it!

author: Jan
header: It did not deliver what it said it would
body: It did not deliver what it said it would. Barely made a change in my skin so I was disappointed

author: HeatherM
body: This is gentle and effective on my face.  I definitely recommend it to others.

author: CRitter
body: Wrinkle correcting serum has greatly improved my skin tone and elasticity. Fine lines and wrinkles are fading. I love this product!

author: Happydaisey
body: I have never used a serum before, so I was really unsure what to expect. I didn't have high hopes, as I have not found a product yet that works well and doesn't irritate my skin. I used it first just at night, and after a week I thought maybe it was working. The second week I tried it morning and evening. By the fourth day, my skin was not tolerating it well, so I cut back to once daily again. After a couple more days, my skin had settled back down, and it was working. My fine lines were much less noticeable around my eyes. I'm happy with the results so far. I would recommend it to anyone.

author: oreo
body: made my face look brand new lost all  my wrinkles face is nice and firm and glows i look like a model now

author: cmjohns912
body: I have been using this for about two weeks now. My skin feels and looks firmer in such a short time. My fine lines are less noticeable since I started using this. This is a definite must try for those dealing with sins of aging.

author: Kraftykate28
body: Unfortunately due to the amount of time in the sun i spend I was not fully able to assess the product as it advises against using during times of excess sun.  I used it for several days and enjoy the smoothing effect it gave on my forehead and around my eyes.  It did not have a terrible smell and was easy to wash off my hands after applying.  I plan to give it more use as the summer comes to an end and I spend more time back inside.

author: Alejandra
body: This product is amazing! After using for a week I noticed an improvement in my skin tone . This product nourishes the skin and improves appearance of wrinkles .

author: Onehappylady
body: Just after the first my first use my wrinkles look smoother and smaller and after a week of using them they were almost completely gone I'd recommend this product to anyone

author: MelBelle
body: I was hoping for miracles. While I didn't get miracle results, I can definitely see improvements with the fine wrinkles. I'm happy with anything I can get!

author: PinkMink
header: It seemed like a good cream..
body: Unfortunately it made my skin break out something fierce so I discontinued using it.  What I can comment on, it smelled nice and made my skin very soft. If it hadn't made my skin break out I likely would have purchased it to continue using!

author: Jkcanterbury
header: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: This serum is amazing.  It definetly helped my eye wrinkles and bags.  Even jus the small sample showed results.

author: Opa
body: This product seemed to help with my dad's wrinkles. They are less noticeable and it feels smoother. It would've been nice to have a little bigger portion. The smell was nice which is good. I think with continued use you'd barely notice his wrinkles.

author: Nelson1709
body: I just loved the Clinic Smart Clinical Repair Correcting Serum. My skin felt hydrated, smooth,  and moistured. I notice a big change on small wrinkles.  Love this product.  Will definitely buy it from now on..

author: J.J.
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I have found it works a little faster than the other products with the same type of repair serum I have tried. Unlike the other products this one does not break my skin out plus my skin looks really great after using it. Also it doesn't leave your skin oily like the other products I have tried. I definitely recommend buying this product if you have fine lines and wrinkles. I have recommended this product to my friends and family because of the benefits I have received from using this product. I have sensitive skin and I have had no problems with it. Works great. I am very satisfied with the results of this product.

author: AmyG
body: After using a sample size, I have definitely noticed smoother skin already. My forehead wrinkles haven't changed much, but I'm sure with continued use, this would improve. I love the consistency and that there is no harsh smell.

author: Poppy
body: Unless Clinique is claiming that their Smart Clinical Repair serum produces instant, noticeable results, its my opinion that this trial was inadequate. The amount of product to be tested , barely lasted a week when used twice daily, Its quite possible that the serum, simply put, just doesn't work. However, my experience using Clinique products throughout my lifetime, leads me to believe that it probably would work if used for a more substantial amount of time. The few conclusions I could come to were limited to the basic, initial observations made at first inspections. The odor was subtle enough to not be  bothersome. The serum has a light and smooth texture that absorbs immediately into the skin, without leaving an oily or sticky residue. The only change in my skin when using this product was a small breakout around and on my nose. I cannot say the serum caused this, as we had a nightmarish heat wave during this time and the havoc that 110°+ temps wreaks on one's skin needs no explanation.  I'm only disappointed with the anticlimactic conclusion of this experiment.  I'll keep my hopes up and my fingers crossed that the next time will be different. My suggestion to Clinique is to allow for testers to try the products for a longer period of time. My request is to develop an effective product line to treat, prevent, and conceal Melasma hyperpigmentation. It's capacity to diminish quality of life is difficult to deal with and there is little available that helps.

author: TD
body: I love how this serum feels on my face and am amazed at how well it started correcting my fine lines.

author: Amanda Kaye
body: I was excited to receive this serum to review. I'm older and have dry skin. I am also in need of something for my fine lines and wrinkles. This serum is silky smooth and absorbs quickly. My skin looks hydrated and plump. Its a lightweight serum. I use this in my daily rountine. It doesn't leave a sticky or oily residue. I have seen slight improvements in my forehead. I haven't been using this long enough to see a major difference. I will continue to use this serum. I highly recommend this.

author: Violetstorm_78
body: I have been using Smart Clinical Repair wrinkle correcting serum for 10 days mainly during my night routine and its a gel like consistency that absorbs quickly on the skin. It doesn't feel tacky nor sticky. My skin feels so silky soft after application. I noticed my skin texture more plump and smooth. Now as for wrinkles I did not see a huge difference and to fully see a good result I would probably need to use the product for 30 or more days. What was provided is such a small amount. I had no allergic reactions or breakouts. It does specify if using in A.m to use sunscreen 15 minutes b4 sun exposure.

author: Jen P
body: I have been using Clinque Smart Clinical Repair for several weeks now and am blown away with the results! I definitely notice a difference in my fine line areas especially my eye area. My skin is also very soft and hydrated in the areas I use the serum on. Other products I have used, do not deliver the same results as this serum. I will definitely continue to use and look forward to seeing the results. Highly recommended!

author: Aaron
body: I used for a couple of weeks and definitely saw a difference in my tone! I was told by a couple of people that my face looked less greasy and I could see a small reduction in wrinkles

author: Yoly
body: I used the Clinique smart repair for 3 weeks. I have a very dry skin and during the passed weeks  I had noticed that my skin get smoother and more moisturize.  For the fine lines I did not see to much of a change. Is a great product if you are looking to smooth your skin.

author: MZ
body: Clinique never disappoints. This is a great way to improve skin tone at home. The formula has a pearly gel-like consistency and has no fragrance which is a must for me. If you have sensitive skin I highly recommend Clinique. I love the innovation and ease of use with all of their products which I began purchasing as a teen. Great job!

author: chatch16
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair is a very good serum.  I works well wilth my sensitive skin.  So far no breakouts or issues with my Rosacea.  #tredr #sponsored

author: Lady O
body: I used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for about a month and saw a slight difference in my fine lines and skin texture. The serum is on the thinner side with a opaque color and no scent thaf I can smell. I have deep smile lines and lines at the beginning of my eyebrows. The serum workers better on the lines near my brows which aren't as pronounced. I also saw an improvement in the overall texture of my skin. My pores actually are smaller which is a great result.

author: MissKokoa
body:
I'm 45, but I've yet to have fine lines and wrinkles. I can't tell if it's working or not, what I can tell you is that it's very light without being greasy and it leaves my face feeling hydrated. Since I have dry skin that's a plus. 
I can see myself recommending this product to my mother and aunts, but for me I think I have a couple years until I'll really need it.

author: Daniel V
body:
Clinique has always been a go-to skincare brand for me. Years ago when there were few options for skincare products that don't contain a lot of fragrance and dyes, Clinique was a reliable source for great products. They still are. Though there are many newer brands that can claim to be dye and fragrance-free, Clinique has the track record to back up their claims.
 
Concerning this specific product, it is a serum meant to counteract the signs of aging on the skin. That means it will attempt to smooth lines, wrinkles, and rough patches while also minimizing the appearance of darker spots. I used this product on my face after a regime of cleansing but before I applied face lotion with SPF. It's important to use an SPF containing lotion when using serum as serum rapidly causes skin to "refresh" which often leaves it vulnerable to sun damage.

I found this serum to be moderate. Not too harsh, so as not to completely wreck those first few layers of skin, but also not too subtle, where you have to use the serum for months to see any benefit. The skin texture seems to even out a little, and darker spots seem to blend better, and the appearance of lines shrink. 

All in all, I recommend this serum if you are looking to counteract the effects of time and age. Though if you are young now I encourage you to skip needing serum and protecting your skin with a SPF lotion so you can hold out on needing serum as long as possible!

author: Faith
body: I received a sample size of the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Repair Serum as a gift from Buzzagent in exchange for an honest review of the product. It is a very nice consistency that makes my face feel extremely hydrated. It has a light, wonderful scent. I usually prefer unscented but this is so softly scented and is really lovely. I love the way my face feels when I apply it. It's as if my face drinks it in. It absorbs so quickly and doesn't feel oily! The hydrated feeling lasts until the next day. I only received a small sample so don't believe I have used it long enough to see results like a big difference in wrinkles. I do think I notice slightly less noticeable wrinkles, not as deep making them appear less. The huge thing I love is how hydrated and moisturized my face feels using this product. I would recommend to my family and friends. I would purchase this in the future but probably only a small bottle as it is alittle more expensive then I would like to pay. I have tried many other kinds of products such as these including Estee Lauder, 111 Skin, Sunday Riley, Verb, and Murad but really enjoyed this product. I wish the bottle had been larger so I could have gotten a longer experience using it to really see if it made a huge difference. I believe it takes at least 2-3 months to tell if it makes a dramatic difference but in the short time I have been able to try this I do believe it works, especially for moisturizing and it's great under makeup. Thank you for the opportunity to try this product!

author: Mel
body: Loved this product so much it was great for my dark circles under my eyes. Will recommend to family and friends.

author: queensgirl
body: I recently rec'd the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I've used this product for about two weeks.  So far, I see a little improvement in smoothness on my skin.  I think it would take longer to see any improvements for wrinkles.  I would recommend this product.

author: Candace
header: Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum
body: I really like the way it felt. But, honestly the bottle is to small for me to tell if it works.

author: Jen
body:
I like the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Serum. It instantly brightened my skin and made little lines around my eyes appear smaller. After a few days I noticed a difference in the feel of my skin and the small lines around my eyes were gone just after a few days. I like it better than some products I have used in the past. I think I will continue using this as it's made a huge difference in my appearance. This 
As sun is hard on skin and this has definitely helped heal.

author: Leah

Definitely a product that I would purchase and continue to purchase.  The best serum I have used by far.

It is a very light formula and I didnt detect any type of scent which is nice! I used it mostly at night after my shower along with toner and moisturizer and they all complimented eachother well! author: Krys
body: My skin feels smoother and I'm starting to see small fine lines disappear. Love this product. A new addition to my night time routine.

author: CLGB
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: A YES from me! While I am still using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for the first time, I have already seen results in the appearance, or smoothness of my skin.  It FEELS great, the texture is non-greasy and has not clogged my pores or caused any breakouts.  The appearance of fine lines has not changed, as of yet, but my complexation appears more even-toned and somehow brighter.  I will continue using this product, adding to my skin care routine for continual use.

author: Cywhitworth
body: This product actually works and I really like it! I can see a difference already. The texture is nice it is not too thick or too oily. I would definitely recommend this product.

author: Amy
body: I was very excited to receive this product to review as I am at that age where I need a little anti aging help! This is a smooth, non greasy, easily absorbed serum. I tried it for a couple of weeks to ensure I'd see something one way or another, and I could see a difference in my lines between my eyebrows and on my forehead. I'll be curious to see if the results improve with continued use but I'm already pleasantly surprised! I would purchase and recommend this!!

author: Kristin
body: Very effective serum. It has a nice moisturizing consistency and I could see and feel a difference in my skin texture immediately. It smoothes out fine lines and feels nice on the skin. Not sure of long term benefits, as I only had a sample, but I would definitely purchase in the future.

author: ElizabethAnne02
header: A Little Goes A Little Way
body: This product was very nice,   The thing is they sent like 3 days worth of it.  I took pictures, and the information card that was provided with the sample was an index card talking about the changes in 18 Weeks--18 Weeks?  They sample provided was about the size of a thimble.  I liked the texture, it absorbed into my skin, but I don't think I can really report on results or benefits from my experience with it.  I wish they had been a little more generous.  It went on smooth and absorbed well.  Beyond that, I don't think I would purchase again unless it was on sale.

author: DebyDebs
header: I didn't see a noticeable difference
body: I used the 7 day sample size that was sent to me. I'm not sure if this formula needs more time than 1 week to work but I did not see a noticeable difference in my skin texture or wrinkles. The formula pilled on my skin when it was used with certain other skin care products.

author: mrslovelyann
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I'm so glad I was able to try the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. It helped smooth my wrinkles on my forehead and my skin feels softer. I loved it so much that I bought more Clinique Smart Clinical creams to go with it.

author: Chely
body: I love this serum!! Does not leave my skin oily and it penetrates right into my skin!!! It feels so smooth, I might have to go buy the bigger bottle

author: Kris

author: jennyy80
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

Also, it left no greasy residue, and dried nicely. I really liked using this serum twice a day. It gave me great results in a small amount of time.

I like the way it feels and I use less moisturizer now that I had to before. I would definitely recommend trying this product and look forward to seeing how well it continues to work.

author: Connie M
header: A serum that I would recommend
body: I consider Clinique to be a high end brand so I was glad I got the opportunity to try the serum. I liked the product. Since it was a serum there was no stretching or pulling  of the skin under the eye when applying like with a lotion or cream. I liked that it did not have a noticeable fragrance and did not leave an oily appearance but hydrated my skin. On the downside it did take 2 weeks to see a difference in the puffiness under my eyes but it did work. I was reviewing another product which I used under my other eye and this was the better of the two,

author: Lfrankov
body: I really like this serum! I wish there was more in the sample. It smells nice and sinks into the skin quickly. It's a bit too early to tell if it will work.

author: Musick
body: I can definitely tell a difference in the lines under my eyes since using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

author: cvbrown06

author: LauraR
body: This serum has a wonderful texture! It's hydrating (but not overly so) and smoothing. It works well under makeup, too. I would recommend it as a great first step after cleansing.

author: Jess

I have very sensitive skin, but I have absolutely no adverse reactions to this serum. I have been using it often, but I have not used it long enough yet to see a reduction in fine lines. I look forward to seeing how well it addresses my skin concerns with long-term use.

author: Jenni
body: I have used lots of different serums, this one was great. I applied it every day after washing my face and before putting on my moisturizer. It made my face feel nice and smooth and fresh.

author: Crystal
body: Not sure if the sample was just not big enough or if it just don't work. I seen no difference

author: Jackie
body: I have a few wrinkles on my forehead and my smile line. Using this product has aliviated my wrinkles. It did take a more than two weeks but results will be seen. I am sure that using this product for longer time, I will get my results. Highly recomend it👍🏼👍🏼

author: TC
body:
I have used other clinique products for years off and on,  so trying this product was an easy choice. I am at the cusp of aging wherein fine likes starts show up around eyes and forehead. It may seem miniscule in the picture but someone who see everyday can notice the difference. 
The serum is easy to apply and doesn't feel heavy, smells nice too without any hard fragrance.

author: karynsart
body: Love this serum.  My skin looks younger already. I notice less wrinkles especially around eyes and mouth. A little goes a long way. Skin looks radiant.

author: Kim
body: I saw a noticable difference after just a few applications.  Definitely helped diminish my crows feet and under eye wrinkles.

author: ButterflyBlue
body: Clinque Smart Wrinkle Repair is a wonderful product.  Not greasy, easy to apply.  I was able to see a different within a few days of using the product.  My lines around my eyes decreased a lot.

author: Melmarie79
body: I am so impressed with the results of this product. It feels so nice applying it to my face. Its not at all sticky and dont leave a residue on my face. Its got a slight smell to it but its a very refreshing smell. My fine lines had noticeable reduction after using this for about two weeks. Definitely recommend this product

author: Lori
body: I love how the Clinique smart clinical repair works. I skin feels amazing and looks amazing also. It's very light weight feeling and you only need a small pea sized amount to cover your whole face.

author: Tip
body: The serum goes on smoothly and blends in well with the skin. I am using this as a preventative to keep the wrinkles from taking over as I age.

author: Pookie65
body: I haven't seen a big difference.  I do think it works but I dont believe I've had enough time to use it in order to make a 100% decision.  I'm going to keep using it and see what happens.

author: Jessica C
body: I have dry sensitive skin and have a hard time with retinol. I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion so I decided to give it a try. This surprised me so much. It is so hydrating and just feels so good on my skin. My skin drank it up. I've only used it for 2 weeks so I haven't noticed a change in my fine lines but I will def be buying full size when I'm done with this. I highly recommend this for dry sensitive and mature skin.

author: Leslie
body: It was moisturizing, but, it wasn't a big game-changer. I'm sure it helps a lot if you don't usually have a good skin routine.

author: MadFinMama
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a very lightweight and non-greasy moisturizer. The serum is not sticky at all. A little bit goes a long way. After using this product for 3 weeks, I do feel like the lines on my forehead have minimized, and my skin is more resilient.  I used the serum both in the morning and at night and felt like I had nothing on. I recommend this product for those with fine lines or who need a very lightweight and fresh feeling moisturizer.

author: Deborah
header: Great first step in an anti-aging regimen
body: I've been a skincare junkie my entire life, and I started my first serious (read: expensive, when you're a teenager!) skincare excursion with Clinique. I've come and gone through many brands, from drugstore to high end, and Clinique always stays in my rotation. Having said that, the Smart Clinical Repair Correcting Serum is nice, particularly if you're a newb to more serious skincare. It sinks nicely into the skin. The scent is so light as to be non offensive to the vast majority of people. The serum is nicely ladeled with peptides and that old standby, hyaluronic acid, all of which does a yeoman's job of lifting an introductory regiment to the next level. I used a small container over a two-week period, and I have to say, my extremely hearty, combo skin definitely looked the better for the effort. Would I repurchase? Probably not, but not because it's not a good product, and certainly not because it's expensive (it's not for the result.) I simply have so many skincare products to try out, and one does have to do these things in a timely fashion, since all such things have a shelf life. What I would do, though, is definitely recommend this serum to friends who haven't been as fanatical as I've been about skincare. For a 'pro' like me, it's nice, but doesn't set the fireworks ablaze, but for someone who has never really invested in serious skincare, it would be a very pleasant and fruitful surprise.

author: Cusick
body: Love this product. It melts into your skins for it's a good consistency. I love they way my skin felt during application and after.

author: RaeRae3
body: This Clinical smart serum toner has reduced the lines in my forehead and at my crows feet in just the matter of a few weeks of using. I was so surprised when I started seeing the changes in my skin. I know that I will be continuing using this as part of my skin  routine.

author: denisetuck35
body: This stuff is amazing. You can feel it working and leaves my face soft and smooth. I love it and look forward to continue use of this product! Most definitely worth the price for the amazing product that it is!

author: Jill R
body: I love how it felt on my skin. It went on smoothly and left my skin feeling smooth and not sticky like creams sometimes can.

author: Sandy
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I've never used  a wrinkle correction serum before but I would recommend Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum because it was very easy to use I put it on in the morning  and before bed and I have seen  the crows feet around my eyes seem to be diminished they are fine lines right now. I will keep using to see if there is further improvement but even if this is as good as it gets I love it.

author: Ranapatrice
body: The product is lightweight, not greasy and has a pleasant scent which is great! The areas where I applied it felt brighter and refreshed after a couple weeks of use. However, I have very minimal wrinkles so I am unsure whether this product was of benefit to me, especially because I received only a sample size for free in exchange for an honest review. Maybe with use over a longer time one can see more benefits. But the price is a little steep in my opinion.

author: tderby
body: I used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a week and did notice a difference in my complexion.  My skin is not any smoother than it was before.

author: Ibetoph
body: Been using this for a few weeks now. Very lightweight and no strong odor. Have seen some improvement in lighter wrinkles. I would recommend this.

author: Tara
body: I love how this product feels. It's interesting, it goes on light yet it seems substantial. It is certainly the quality I would expect from Clinique. However, I haven't noticed much of a difference in my fine lines, but it is possible that I need to use it longer to see results. Either way, I love how it makes my skin feel.

author: Bill
body: This review is based off a trial size amount. But while it's not a full size I could see my fine lines and crows feet starting to disappear. It's not greasy at all. I am going to buy a full size serum most definitely. Highly recommended.

author: Me
body: I really like the texture of this, its very smooth and soothing. It makes my skin feel very soft, but I haven't seen any actual results from it. Since I only had a couple of weeks to try it. Most products take at least a month to see a difference.

author: Mikey
body: I like this serum! I like that it is non-greasy, odorless and very light. It's refreshing. I haven't noticed any major results so far but I'll continue using it. I'll recommend this product.

author: Fan_S
body: I have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Wrinkle Correcting Serum for two weeks before leaving this review. So far, I don't see dramatic change in my skin except my skin feels smoother and more glowing. I like the texture of this serum. It spreads easily and evenly on my skin. Will continue using this serum to see if my wrinkles will be reduced. I received this serum as sample in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

author: Smile24119
body: I received this item tdoo try. At first I read all it claimed to do and was skeptical since so many other items made same claims and have disappointed me. But I am loyal to the name Clinic so I went in with high hopes. The directions clearly state that over time you will see a difference. It made no quick claim which I appreciated. I used the serum twice a day on my beginning crows feet. At first I saw no change but over time I did notice the lines getting softer! I can't wait to continue this product to see how much more it can do for my lines and wrinkles!

author: Nick
body:
From the day it arrived, I started using it so that I can determine if this actually works. And guess what, I can see visible differences ie good ones! Certainly crows feet and other wrinkles around my eyes had started to fade making me look fresher and younger. 
I feel I should use this product at least for another 6 months to establish the real benefits of it.

author: SASPURS
body: My review for Clinique repair wrinkle correction serum. This serum works great. It's easy to apply, without a mess. It makes my skin feel smooth and hydrate. I would definitely recommend this product.

author: Mommak1977

author: Marbar327

author: Lda

author: Lam
body: I have tried this serum for a week or so, I love the feel of it. I can't wait to see if it helps with wrinkles and skin balancing!

author: jmackinnon5

I have been using this Clinique Smart Clinical Repair serum for two weeks. I received this sample from BzzAgent to review. 
While using this Clinique serum I have noticed a difference in my skin tone and my wrinkles seem to be less noticeable. I love how light this serum is and how gentle it feels on my skin.

author: LovelyB79
body: Absolutely love Clinique Smart Clenical Repair Serum. It has worked miracles on my fine lines and wrinkles as they are barely noticeable. I highly recommend this Clinique Serum.

author: Mariew
body: This stuff seems to work great.  My Crows feet are diminishing.  Can't wait for pay day to buy a full bottle

author: Xmill31
body: I've been using this sample for I received for free in exchange for my review for about 3 weeks now. I don't see any difference in the lines on my forehead but I like how the serum feels when I apply it. I'll continue using it to see if there's any noticeable difference.

author: DarkeSkye
body: This is my first time trying a product of this type. I suppose it's because I'm sceptical that they really work. I do have to say I was pleasantly surprised. My main concern was two noticeable frown lines. I've used this product over several weeks and I have seen a difference. They have become softer and less harsh. I will continue to use the product with hopes for continued results.

author: cajunmom1976
body: Very nice moisturizing serum that leaves my skin silky and smooth after using it. I have really dry skin on my face and this has really helped in the way it looks and feels. I've noticed a subtle change over the last few weeks with diminished forehead lines. I would definitely purchase in the future and I have already recommended to friends and family.

author: Dolly
body:
I have been only using Clinique Smart Serum for a couple weeks now, but I must say it really is fantastic! I'm
Not sure about long term results yet but I am excited with the texture and usability of this serum. Some serums are sticky and tacky, they feel like they are clogging my pores. But this serum does NOT feel anything but great! My skin feels smooth and my moisturizer over the top doesn't create any thick weirdness when I apply my makeup. Loving this !

author: Allison Lynn
body:
I'm so glad that I got a free sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I seen results the same day I used it. My face felt smoother and looked so much better. I have tried other face serums but this is the best serum I have ever used.  For now on I'm buying Clinique Smart face serum only. I recommend everyone buy this product cause it really works. After a week my face looks brighter and I see less wrinkles. I absolutely love it! 
Thank you #BzzAgent and #Clinique
#tredr #sponsored

author: Nan
body: This wrinkle serum goes on super smooth and makes my skin feel great.  The clear product glides right onto the skin and doesn't leave it feeling sticky.  I would recommend this product.

author: Ali
body: This product works better than I thought it would. Simple to use, with great directions on the package. It didn't smell too chemical either. It was light going on and left my face looking younger IMO.

author: Jen McG
header: Great all in one Face Serum
body: Fabulous product. From The trusted brand Clinique, lightweight formula serum offers complete coverage. Smoother results around eyes fine lines and wrinkles all the way down to the neck smoothed out within a week of using the product. Perfect under makeup works amazing on throat and neck area. Tightening skin smoothing skin and softening wrinkles. Love it!

author: CMac
body: I've been using the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for about 10 days now. I normally do wash my face twice a day using quality products but the Serum gave me smoother skin instantly. I will continue to use it - the smoother skin is amazing!

author: Luana112
body:
This serum definitely surprised me. I used this serum for 12 days and I already see results. My dry skin feels hydrated and smooth. Unlike other serums it is lightweight and non greasy and easily absorbed in the skin. I am often  bothered by the smell of some serums and creams but I had no issue with this one .
The only thing I did not like was the recommendation to avoid sub exposure. It made it difficult to use it in the morning especially now in the summer.
Overall I highly recommend this product and I would definitely buy the full size ,

author: Mila
body: Used the product for 2 weeks. Did notice some minor improvement in my skin quality. Skin was a little smoother and wrinkles were a bit faded. Probably regular constant use is needed for better results.

author: Candice
body: I already use and like Clinique products so I was excited to try this. It was a very tiny sample so it's difficult to give an honest review on long term use. It feels nice on the skin, moisturizes well and isn't sticky at all which is a plus! I wasn't able to use it long enough to review the wrinkle issues.

author: Krissy
header: Not sure i noticed much difference
body: Received this product as part of #bzzagent! To be honest the sample was small, maybe too small to use to make enough difference. Maybe it takes longer than half a month. Its pretty much like any other serum in consistency, I'm not sure I'd pay the full price for this.

author: Tara
body: I have used Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for almost two weeks and I notice such an amazing difference. My wrinkles and fine lines are disappearing before my eyes. My husband even asked if I have been doing something different lately because I look younger and my skin looks amazing. I will definitely keep this in my skincare routine.

author: Jb75
body: I used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for at least two weeks. I did not notice any difference in appearance of my fine lines. It did help the moisture in the areas that it was applied though. I think it helped the appearance of my skin, but not necessarily the wrinkles.

author: gblass
body: This serum was easy to apply and had a pleasant simple scent.  I saw a difference using this serum after 5 days

author: Mandy
body: I really thought that this product was going to help me. Im only 45 with fine lines and color spots but they are still as prominent as day one. I do like the feel on my skin and thesmell

author: Martha D
body: I was impressed. I had fewer wrinkles

author: Lilred2007
body: Love the texture of this serum! Soaks in quickly and goes to work. Used for about three weeks and could clearly tell a difference, skin around my eyes look less tired and pinched,creped. No harsh smell and quick to apply only took half a drop and your good to go.

author: Sr
body: I really like how easily this went on my skin and it seemed to firm it up.  I will continue to use it and purchase it!

author: Deb
body: I have only been using this at night.  I do see a different in my skin tone as well as toning.  I do not care for the slight greasy feeling on my face after applying.

author: Paul
body:
I am 43 and I have some fine lines. I have been using this for a few weeks and I am starting to see a difference in the reduction of fine lines and a general uniform appearance of my skin.  I like how my face feels after I put it on.  I've been using it consistently since receiving it as a sample.  I am also staying out of the sun as it directs, which is not hard since i do not go out much with Covid still being an issue.

Overall, I do see the improvements I mentioned above, and I will continue to use it and see which other benefits present themselves.  I would recommend it!

author: taurusgirl79
body: This serum really does a great job. It really helps with my wrinkles & it is visible. I will be buying the full product soon.

author: Angwith4
body: I lovr how light this serum felt. It absorbed quickly. Within a few days of use I started noticing smoother skin. I've always been a fan of Clinique for many years. This was just snother great product.

author: MickG
body: I received Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum as a free trial for my opinion and my opinions are 100% my own. If you are looking to find lines and wrinkles quickest anti-wrinkle serum. I am 44 years old and I am trying to prevent my fines becoming deeper. Clinique Smart Repair did just that in 7 days!

author: Nik
body: I have used numerous repair creams and this is by far my favorite. I only have had 7 days of using it I can tell a huge difference.  I can only imagine the results after 30 to 90 days.

author: Lisa's Reviews
body:
I was very excited to try this new product! I used it religiously twice a day for a little less than 2 weeks. I would like to try it longer to give a more accurate review, but I was requested to write a review now. So, here it is. 

I feel like it does hydrate my skin. The instructions stated "immediately". I don't know their definition of immediately; but for me, it took a few days before I really saw any hydration.

As for minimizing fine wrinkles, I didn't notice much of a difference. The instructions stated it would take about 10 days. Maybe I didn't give it enough time. 

As for minimizing deep wrinkles, there was not an opportunity to see the results for that since I had to write this review before Clinique's estimated time to see the effects of this serum.  

Unfortunately, this is the best review I can give. I will continue to use this serum and update my review if there is any change. The free sample is very small so hopefully it will last me until the 16 weeks that is stated in their clinical studies to see noticeable results.

author: Mamaof5
body: I got this and I really love how I does have my skin feeling.  My  skin does feel so soft and it minimize the wrinkles in my face which I really love.  I will definitely recommend this to everyone that I know.  I am planning on getting more of this

author: Csu215
body: I received this product in exchange for my review. It's a great product. I used it mostly at night. It didn't weigh on my skin. Made me feel silky soft. It really worked good. Helped me lift my skin in those saggy areas.

author: Sally
body: It was very good for my skin. I would tell friends and family about it. I would buy it in the store . And use more of  it.

author: Bree
body: I used this product for two weeks applying twice daily as suggested and did not see a visible difference in my wrinkles.

author: Momandrea
body: I used the serum twice a week for 3 weeks. I didn't notice much change. It did give me added moisture but I didn't notice a change in my forehead lines

author: Wen B.
body: I have used Clinique antiwrinkle creams and serums for years and this serum exceeded my expectation. I saw a noticeable difference in the appearance of my crows feet in less than a month. This serum is not greasy and my skin soaked it up .  I would  definitely recommend this product.

author: Grannyof2
body: My review for Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum.  I really like this.  My skin feels firmer and smoother. My skin looks more youthful.  I have used for 3 weeks

author: Momof3
body: I would recommend this Clinique Wrinkle Correcting Serum to any person! I love the feel of the cream, it did not feel oily. I have been using it for two weeks and not sure I am seeing wrinkles disappear, but my face does feel hydrated and has a little glow it it

author: Sunny
body: I love it. I noticed a difference a week after using the product.  I highly recommend it

author: Hotnurse27
body:
First I love Clinique products.
My face was a little rough prior to using this product. After the fourth day using it my face looked a little more refined.
As I continued using my face felt more firm and smooth. By the 2nd week of use the crease around my outer eye area, almost disappeared. 
Thank you Bzz Agent

author: Fredo
header: Serum feels like its in there, under skin
body: I feel like the serum not only moisturized the skin but got under the skin and helped with how the skin felt and looked right from the get go.

author: Chelle
header: Am I Getting Younger or Is It Working?
body: I truly thought this would never work but it has been pretty awesome! Feels great and not greasy or heavy! And it is helping to reduce my laugh lines, which makes me so happy! Clinique for the WIN!

author: RB
header: Just another scam in my opinion.
body: I tried using this product and realized that either I'm not as old and wrinkly as I thought or it just doesn't work as it says. All I got from it was skin tightening for a short period then back to normal in no time.

author: Mrs G
body: I've been using the product for about 3 weeks. Previously I did not use retinol so when starting this serum I started with every other day and then built up from there. I did not experience any negative side effects by doing so. In 3 weeks I've noticed a slight change in my complexion. My skin feels more firm/ tighter. I did not have visible wrinkles prior but some fine lines. I'm not noticing a difference in those just yet. The serum itself doesn't feel heavy or leave my skin oily. It also doesn't have a strong or bad smell, very neutral. I would need to use it more to determine its effectiveness on fine lines.

author: Tina
body: I was very pleased with the serum.  I noticed diminished fine lines around my eye area.

author: smooth face
body: I use this as a booster underneath my normal moisturizer (after toner and serum, before moisturizer and spf) and it is amazing. Noticeably plumps your skin, soothes irritation, and all around feels great on the skin.

author: Allie406
body: I have been using this for the past two weeks. I have very sensitive skin and this did not aggravate it at all. It's not sticky or thick. I feel over two weeks the lines in my forehead have reduced and I'm excited to see what the next few months looks like.

author: Bpt
header: Made my face feel so good
body: This serum was wonderful. Did not have an overwhelming smell which I hate in some products. It made my face feel so good and made my eyes feel amazing.

author: Ash
body: This was a very nice product. Really light on the skin and I did notice skin improvement of my fine lines with in days.

author: Mandy
body: Leaves my face feeling very smooth and soft. I couldn't tell a huge difference in reduction of wrinkles but I did like the feel of my face after using the product.

author: Jendex79
body: This serum is so much more smoothing and hydrating than any serum I've tried.  It's a pretty iridescent product that goes on easily and feels great on your face.  My skin feels smoother and more hydrated after just one use!!

author: Helen
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body:
The product  helped in supporting a natural skin look and lessen the look of wrinkles. 
The serum texture was light weight.

author: DawnG68
body: I have tried SEVERAL serums, with disappointing results (NO RESULTS) BUT this serum Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting REALLY GIVES RESULTS! Y'all, my deepest wrinkle (my forehead) looks less wrinkled, my skin glows, and it feels smoother and I look younger than before. I loved my free sample from #BzzAgent!

author: Jenn
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Cream
body: This wrinkle cream is a game changer. As I have gotten older I have noticed some small lines that have made me more self conscious than ever. In just the short time I have been using this cream it is for sure making a difference.  Will be using this as a staple to my daily routine.

author: Mommy2the3pookies
body:
I received a small sample size.  I'm 44 and my main concerns are crows feet.  I applied this 1x a day to begin with (I have finicky skin) and after a couple of days went to 2x a day. Product is creamy, a very little goes along way.  First thing I noticed is how silky my skin felt.  Almost instantly my skin looked more plump, my crows feet were less defined.   After a week, my crows feet were half way gone!  It's incredible!   
You do need to wear sunscreen when using this product (you should be wearing it anyway). This does make your skin a bit more sun sensitive.

author: Aimlynn28
body: This repair serum works wonderfully on my skin. It smooths my skin and has a pleasant smell. This is a must especially for aging. I highly recommend!

author: Joy
body: Goes on smooth. Doesn't get greasy or caked through out the day or night. I have not noticed a difference but it is a good product.

author: Cmjjclm
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, is a okay product, it didn't deliver the results it says it would.

author: Terra
body: I am very happy with how much smoother this made my wrinkles seem.

author: muffin45245
body: After using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum I didn't really see a difference in my skin.

author: JenY718
header: Great big product in a little bottle
body: This definitely made a difference in my face over the past week.  I see less wrinkles and smoother skin already! I will continue to use this product to fight the signs of aging.

author: SleepyMom39
body: It smooths lines and wrinkle away over time. I love the way it feels and doesn't leave a grease texture behind. I have been using it twice a day for two weeks and can see a different.

author: Amy
body: This Clinique smart repair serum goes on smooth and is easy to apply. It didn't make my face feel tight or sticky. I did notice a slight improvement with my fine lines and wrinkles. I think with more time I would see a bigger improvement. I would continue to buy this and use it as part of my skin care routine.

author: NinaRDH
body: I've tried many wrinkle serums in the past and this one tops my list! After using for about 2 weeks, my skin felt softer, smoother and healthier. I have a few deeper wrinkles on my forehead, which really had no improvement, but some fine wrinkles by my eyes did seems noticeably smoother after the 2 weeks. I'm planning on purchasing the full size product to see how it performs after a longer period of time. I would definitely recommend this serum!

author: 4Ella
