body: I used this serum for couple of weeks now and I'm super happy with it. It's very lightweight and goes very smoothly on the face. My face feels more moisturized, just love it.

author: Penny
body: I have tried a few other serums before trying Clinique, and I have to say, this is definitely a winner when it comes to smoothing things out. Although I did not notice a reduction in wrinkles, it definitely brightened and smoothed out  my skin; a most definite improvement overall. I will definitely continue using this product for as long as they make it.

author: Icesugar
body: I was very excited to try and see a great result on me but NO… I try for couples of days since result sometimes doesn't show right away,but didn't  work on me, no different on my wrinkles only thing I noticed is a felt my skin soft.

author: Chelle
body:
Clinique smart clinical repair serum not only met my needs but drastically exceeded my expectations. I have always loved Clinique products and this one is no exception. It made my eye wrinkles almost non existent.
Not only that but my skin felt super smooth and hydrated after using this product! I absolutely cannot tell you enough how much I enjoyed testing this product!

author: My73
body:
This product has a nice feel and texture to it. A little bit good a long ways. I've been using it around my eyes and find it to be gentle on such delicate skin.  
I use Exlinea and find your product very comperable. I'm noticing a nice plumping on my crowsfeet. 
Clinique is a tried and true brand and though a lux product the price point that is very doable.

author: hoopie1975
body: I normally use Clinique but this wasn't in my normal routine. It will be now. It has my skin glowing and I thought it was already looking good for 46. It helped with texture. It will now be added to the Clinique I already use.

author: oldnavygirl2u
body: I recently received a free sample of Clinique's Smart Clinical Repair. This sample of serum comes in a .34 FL oz squeeze bottle with screw on lid. The serum has a thin consistency with a slight white cloudy appearance. During application to my skin the skin looks wet. The serum is quickly absorbed  into my skin with no sticky residue left behind. There is a slight moisturizing effect after the skin absorbs the serum. The serum has little to no fragrance. I look forward to seeing the long term effects of this serum and how it will benefit my skin.

author: Shelleyw326
body: I received this as a sample from Bzzagent for free for my honest review. I really like this serum. There is no perfumey smell. The texture/consistency is more like a water gel lotion, thicker than most other serums. I expected it to be clear not white. My skin soaked it right up. It feels super soft. No oiliness, no breakouts and no irritation. I've seen very minimal results in my lines after a week  but I'm sure with continuous use the results will be more visible.

author: Kizmit
header: Not a miracle, but really good
body: I did not see a lot of results related to aging, but this is likely related to the relatively short period of time I used the sample. I did feel my skin was better moisturized and fresher after using. It felt light, and not at all oily, which is a definite plus. It didn't irritate my skin, it didn't make it feel greasy. I am confident it will help with the fine lines around my eyes, and I plan to continue to use it.

author: Keri
body: I have noticed no difference using this! Was very disappointed!!

author: Iroday80
body: I used this serum for 10 days and in love with it. It makes my skin smooth and glow. Light texture of cream is good for summer. Some deep wrinkles on my forehead become less visible.

author: Leezle42
header: Who isn't looking for the fountain of youth?
body: I was very excited to get to try this clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum for free from Bzzagent because I'm definitely getting older and noticing tiny lines and wrinkles forming on my face as the days go by. Who of us isn't looking for a miracle fix or at least something that appears to help us stay looking younger. I am definitely always looking for something to help with this issue and having been trying this out for about 2 weeks have definitely noticed that my skin where applied in my forehead and around the mouth feel smooth and my forehead definitely has less pronounced lines. This is a game changer for me and I highly recommend anyone who is worried about the signs of aging give it try.  What do you have to lose?

author: Rox
body:
Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is smooth and creamy without being greasy. It fills in fine lines and plumps skin recreating an appearance of youthful skin. 

You can really see where it made a difference around my eyes. That is where I have the most problems with fine lines and puffiness. The serum has taken those lines away and the puffiness is gone. I am amazed.

Loving this stuff. I'm going to need a gallon of it. LOL

author: Angel
body: I LOVE this product. It made my skin feel so fresh and so young. I could tell the difference after I used it a couple times that I didn't see as many wrinkles. Clinique is AMAZING!!

author: Carrie M.
body: I like the ease of use to actually get results. It smoothes eadily upon application and reduces the appearance of fine lines well.

author: Maryna
body: Uses it together with the new Clinic cream.  The skin color has improved, it even seems to have tightened.  I don't know if the cream or serum works, but the result is there!  I recommend!

author: isishannaisi
body: Overall this would be a good product for most people. Instantly after using it your skin feels tighter and seems more plump. I have not noticed any visible changes to fine lines or wrinkles but I did notice my skin felt smoother. One major downside to this product is it clearly states to limit sun exposure while using the product and for a week after... extremely hard to do in the middle of summer in Arizona making this a product I would not personally purchase.

author: blcoleman
body:
I really like how easily a little bit of this product goes a long way. 
 I didn't have time,  I don't think,  so see if it ACTUALLY works,  but so far,  no.  I see no difference in my skin.  Actually,  I think the newest picture looks like it should've been the first one.  Idk, maybe if I give it more time? I received this product for free for my review. However,  I don't think we're given enough time to fully try the product.  But,  it does apply nicely.

author: lisablah
body: I have been using Clinique's Smart Clinical Repair Serum for about a week now, and I have mixed emotions about it.  I have been using the serum morning and night, with very little change with my skin. My skin seems a little softer but I don't notice any changes with my fine lines. It is odor free and does absorb well. I will continue to use to see if any changes will happen.

author: mary
body: very light not oily even coverage and worked as product claimed.

author: Whisper
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum works well.  It makes my skin feel tighter. My wrinkles are less noticeable.

author: Barbie J
body: I've been using the clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum for a week and I'm loving everything about it! The formula is so soft and absorbs into the skin quickly leaving soft, firm skin. It's not sticky or greasy and there is almost no scent at all. I have noticed a small decrease in some wrinkles around my eyes and I'm hoping it just keeps working this well!

author: Taz4908
body: I love this product! I've already seen some improvement on a few of my wrinkles. I'm not sure how it works, but my skin is really soft now too.

author: Sarah88
body: I have been using Clinque smart clinical repair serum for over a week now. I recieved it as a free sample to try and review. I have notice the little dark spots that I have hated for years starting to fade. Lines around my eyes in the crow feet area have softened. Its given me back my glow I used to just have naturally. The feel of it is silky and feels so lovely on my skin. It's not heavy feeling a lot of serums and creams leave on your skin. You rub it in it absorbs but leave such a soft feeling on my face. There isnt a horrible over powering scent so I love that. Very difficult to sleep with heavily scented products on your face. Ive already told my older sister about this one and shes already went to buy a bottle. I would recommend this product highly I will be adding this to my daily routine from now on. Im really enjoying having a softer look to my skin again. I have tried so many different products from on the cheaper side to very exspensive and this one is working so very nicely for me. Really looking forward to see how my skin looks with continued use over the next 16 weeks.

author: Becca
header: Smart Serum that knows how to correct
body:
Clinique's smart wrinkle repair serum worked for me.
I would use it at night before bed and the next day my skin would be soft and plump.
It made my skin more smooth than other products.

author: Elle
body: Loved using this sample. It was a classic Clinique product that works well, feels good on the skin, and is effective. I love that it went on smoothly, left my skin feeling healthy, and it went straight to work. I feel like fine lines are smoother, more hydrated. A great product, thanks!!!!

author: Kbtinker78
body: Ok so I gave this a shot and really didn't notice and difference in my appearance at all! Maybe this product just works differently for everyone?

author: Mel D
header: Slight difference in very little time
body: I have used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for just over a week & it appears to be making some slight corrections to fine lines around my eyes, mouth & forehead. I look forward to using longer & seeing additional results.

author: Sheikh
body: This is wonderful amazing product. Made my skin look and feel beautiful.!! The results were noticeable quicker than any other product l have used and left my skin feeling silky soft. I was very impressed and will definitely continue using this..!!

author: TL
body: I love how this product is soothing & light. Definitely gives my skin a boost.

author: Brandiwyne13
body: I really like this serum. Although I didn't see much change in my dark spots, I feel if I used it for a longer period of time I would. I love the way it made my skin feel!

author: Subritzer
body: Works great so far, doesn't leave greasy residue, will definitely be purchasing.

author: Cynthiar
body: I was skeptical at first because it says it takes up to 16 weeks to see a difference. I actually used this for two weeks before doing my review. For one you don't have to use much it spreads nicely. Upon first use your skin looks very moisturized. After about 8 days I could actually see a difference in the fine line and wrinkles I have on my forehead and around my mouth seem to be faded. My skin looks so healthy it really glows I don't have any before photos of me before I started using it but I am 42 a smoker and I am telling you about 2 weeks ago you could see the lines and wrinkles I spoke of. I will be purchasing this product. I have used Olay products for the same thing for quite some time and some even claim to have retinol in them and I could never tell any difference. I would definitely recommend this product.

author: OutdoorsyGal
body: I love how light this serum is. It glides on to my skin and leaves my skin smooth, hydrated and glowing. It's not sticky and doesn't leave me oily. Just beautiful plump skin. I use at night. I apply on dry, clean skin and follow it with my nighttime moisturizer.

author: Erin
body: I love this product. It goes on smooth and makes my skin feel smoother. It gives my skin a glow and doesn't feel like I put anything on. I would definitely use this again.

author: Ang1964
body: I was very pleased with the Clinique/Clinique smart clinical repair wrinle correcting serum. It goes on smooth and dries quickly. After just one application the crows feet around my eyes seemed to look less noticable.After a week of use my overall complexion looked different,more even toned and smooth. I have tried many anti aging products but have never seen results this quick. Im hooked. Thanks for the great product.

author: Jenaluv
body: My skin looks smoother and clearer over all. I also think my forehead lines look reduced.   I am very excited about this product and plan to continue to use it.

author: Pipes
body: Tried for a week and you can see my wrinkles slowly fading away. I like seeing myself without the crow's feet.

author: HeatherJNC
body: I really liked my sample of Clinique Smart Correcting Serum. Easy to apply and I love how to wasn't greasy feeling afterwards. Scent was good. I noticed a difference in my fine lines and wrinkles on my face within using this product a week. I definitely would recommend this.

author: Donna5
body: When I first put it on it burned a little. It seams to tighten the face up. It did make my face feel firm and glowy. I thought it was pretty good.

author: Emilee
body: I have so enjoyed using the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum!! I have seen a noticeable difference in my skins texture! It is great, highly recommend. I have already purchased and recommended to some friends.

author: Robin
body: I received this product for free in return for an honest review. I love the way it makes my skin feel. It is light and not greasy. It is a little pricey but I would buy it for continued use. I have not noticed a difference in lines or wrinkles yet but I have  only been using it for a few weeks.

author: Mimi
body: I love the cool touch and how refreshed my face feels not sure it does what it says but it felt good putting it on

author: dawny624
body: Cliniques smart clinical repair serum feels light and weightless when applied to the skin. There is not harsh smell and it absorbed pretty quickly. I have only been using this for a little over a week and have not seen any major improvements in my skin. Hoping to see some after prolonged use. It does make my skin feel soft after apply my face lotion on top it. I received this sample from Bzzagent in return for my honest review.

author: Anjel1
body: I have been using my new Clinique Smart Clinical repair Wrinkle correcting serum . I have used the product as directed for three weeks and I'm a pleasantly surprised. This correcting serum is very light and easy to apply No bad chemical smells. Hydrates therefore correcting fine wrinkles and helps to smooth around eye area . When I use first time I feel little bit itching specially on my forehead but 2nd time didn't feel itching. Morning time when I wash my face little bit skin peel off but again apply this serum skin feel so good .definitely I will continue this serum for more results.

author: Anjel1
body: I have been using my new Clinique Smart Clinical repair Wrinkle correcting serum . I have used the product as directed for three weeks and I'm a pleasantly surprised. This correcting serum is very light and easy to apply No bad chemical smells. Hydrates therefore correcting fine wrinkles and helps to smooth around eye area . When I use first time I feel little bit itching specially on my forehead but 2nd time didn't feel itching. Morning time when I wash my face little bit skin peel off but again apply this serum skin feel so good .definitely I will continue this serum for more results.

author: MzBanani
header: Saw a difference the first week
body: I really love this Clinique serum! It has a light and smooth texture that glides on and absorbs quickly. I like that it's not sticky or tacky after applying it like other wrinkle serums I've tried before. I do wish it were a little more moisturizing, however my regular moisturizer worked well with it without pilling. After 6 days of using both in the morning and at bedtime, I noticed that the slight lines around my eyes had started to plump and fill in! I've also been applying it to my forehead, but those lines have been there since right after high school, so I'm thinking it will take some serious intervention before those disappear. Overall, I'm very happy with this serum and plan to purchase a full-sized tube.

author: Misty
body: This product is amazing. It reduces the visabimity of my fine lines and made my skin feel top notch.

author: ace2jay
header: Clinique Smart Repair to the Rescue
body: I gave this to my wife to try and she absolutely loved it.  Has already placed an order for more.  The hydration of fine wrinkles was perfect for her complexion.  I Highly recommend!!

author: Mommabear05
body:
I've just about resigned myself to having "those" wrinkles. You know the ones you get a you get older. 

I've tried other masks, and ones with hyaluronic acid did seem to help but never last. I don't like lotions because they tend to clog pores and feel heavy on my face. 

But when I tried this one, as a sample, I fell in love. It was light and worked quick. I noticed my skin looked better. Lines were less noticeable and those pesky deep forehead ones were smoother.

I've since purchased more and will continue to use the wrinkle correcting serum. I've recommended it to a few friends who have also become believers.

author: VenusG
body: This correcting serum is Amazing! Not only did it reduce the signs of wrinkles it tightened the skin around my face. 45  never looked so good!

author: Angel G
header: A mild, odorless wrinkle correcting serum.
body: I recently got to try this sample size of smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum by Clinique, for free through BzzAgent, and I am very happy with the results so far.  I have been using the serum after cleansing my face and I can already see an improvement in my wrinkles.  The serum is mild, odorless, and thin, and it does not feel heavy, sticky, or greasy on my skin.  I like it a lot, and would recommend getting it.

author: Marlie
body: I got a sample size which is only good for so many uses.  I did like how it felt on my skin. I haven't noticed any major difference in my skin yet because I have just started using this. I'm over 50 and I'm starting to experience fine lines. Need more of this to know if it changes.

author: Shellyb0614
body: Hi sweeties! Ok! Where to start. First off I want to say I have sensitive skin and had no bad reaction at all! No redness, irritation at all! Next, absorbs nicely! Not greasy. Doesn't leave skin feeling tacky! Ok, last but not least, this stuff works! Helping my skins elasticity! Skins firmer! Those pesky fine lines, laugh lines, crows feet are diminishing! And people are noticing! Definitely recommend for your skincare routine!

author: Char
body: This product makes your skin so soft and supple. It truly changes the texture of your skin. I actually love it.

author: Rox80
body: It's lightweight and absorbs evenly into your skin. I've seen results since using, I highly recommend.

author: Jessica B
body: When I received this sample product I expected that it would be a bigger sample. The sample size was only .34fl.oz. so it was difficult to determine if the product did indeed repair wrinkles as the sample was not big enough to get the full results. From what I did notice it made my skin soft and smooth. It did not leave an oily residue. I would be willing to purchase a full size to try and obtain the full results!

author: karebear30
header: hydrating and won't irritate sensitive skin
body: I received a sample of this product in exchange for my honest review. I have been using this serum for 9 days now and I have not yet noticed a difference in my fine lines. I feel that given more time I may see an improvement given the ingredients that are prove to reduce wrinkles and the amazing job this product does of hydrating your skin. It goes on very light and doesn't smell like anything, which is such a bonus. This doesn't irritate my sensitive skin either, which is hard to find! A little bit goes a long way because it really spreads out on your skin and I've been able to use just a few small dabs for most of my face. I think this is a good addition to any skin care regimen for aging skin like mine (I'm 43 with fine lines on my forehead and next to my eyes).

author: HippieWitch
body:
Clinique | Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, Really Works. I've been using Clinique | Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, for 4 days, morning/night and not only can I tell a difference, but Ppl I don't even know are asking me about my skin. 
Wasn't prepared for all this attention.

author: Allynbelle
body: I've been using this sample for a little over a week now. I like that the serum is filled with peptides, hyaluronic acid and retinol and I haven't noticed any dryness or irritation like I sometimes do with retinol products. There's no noticeable scent to the serum and it blends into skin smoothly. I didn't notice any stickiness left behind after application but it does feel pretty "silicone-y" to me. It also does not provide enough moisture on its own and must be topped with an additional moisturizer. My skin looks plump and moisturized but I would have to use it longer to speak about wrinkle reducing benefits.

author: JenH
body: Received this as a sample. Love the light formula. Does not feel like I am wearing anything at all. Do not like that you need to be cautious of sun exposure.

author: Nan
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I really loved the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum that I received to sample from BzzAgent. The serum made my face so soft and smooth and I would recommend it to everyone that needs help with their wrinkles.

author: AnnieB
body: I was super excited about this product. I love everything Clinique and feel like this brand always works so well with my skin. However this totally left my skin greasy and acne prone. I noticed it after my first use and unfortunately continued it for two more days. My skin did not become accustomed to the product and unfortunately it was not a hit for me

author: LisaOp
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: This product made my skin feel smooth and soft. I didn't notice any breakouts either. I think it's still too early to say if it's helping my fine lines. I would have to use it for a longer time. Overall this product made my skin look and feel great.

author: MzSouthwest
body: I absolutely LOVE Clinique Smart Clinical Repair. I noticed a difference within a week around my eyes. I am excited to see what happens with continued use. If you're looking for something to make your skin feel smother and iron out the lines near your eyes, this should be your first choice!  I highly recommend it!

author: Meika1978
body: I was excited to try this product hoping it would do something more than what I am already using. It's texture is smooth and applies nicely, I just didn't see any more results than what I'm seeing in what I was already using.b

author: Michelle
body: This is just what I was looking for!!!

author: SilvitaB
header: Firm and soft? I want it!
body: My 42nd birthday is around the corner so I started taking seriously the skin care routine adding an anti-wrinkle serum. I have beed a big fan of Clinique for many years since my dermatologist recommended Clinique due to my sensitive skin. I have been using the serum for over a week now and maybe I don't see a remarkable difference, but I feel the texture of my skin around the eyes is definitely getting softer and firmer. The serum spreads evenly with just a dab, so a bottle will last a good amount of time. I have always recommended Clinique, fantastic results and a brand I can trust.

author: Gwen
body: This wrinkle serum is great. Its nice and light. No perfume odor or feeling of a burn. I noticed a difference after a week of using this. I would recommend this product.

author: Jess
body: I haven't noticed a difference in wrinkles, but it does moisturize my face really well. I'll continue using it longer to see if I can see any changes in my skin.

author: Jess5593
body: This is a very light serum that feels so good on your face. It absorbs quickly and doesn't have an overwhelming smell. I haven't noticed a huge change in my skin, but I feel like over time this product would be beneficial. The amount provided to try the product really isn't enough to give an accurate review. The actual full size product from Clinique says to use 2 pumps of the serum. I've used products from Clinique  that come in the same type of bottle as this serum and the amount provided for the trial wasn't enough to use the amount recommended by Clinique over an ideal period of time to see noticeable results.

author: thatcher611
header: Works well with my sensitive skin!
body: i have been using the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a couple weeks now and I have already noticed a change in the smoothness of my skin! Definitely make sure you wear sunscreen after using this product. I made the mistake of not wearing it and had sunburn.

author: Patty13
body: Thanks to this product, my skin has improved the expression lines, they do not look so marked and even my skin tone has evened out, I highly recommend it by the way, its texture is very pleasant, not sticky at all and with little product you cover the face

author: skincarelove
body: very noticeable skin improvement which made my skin overall look more fresh and smooth.

author: Sara32
body: I received a sample of Clinique  Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, but the opinions are entirely my own. I have forehead lines as well as the two lines between my eyes that annoy me. I used this sample approximately twice a day for 10 days so far. It is much more moisturizing than other serums I have tried. On a hot day, I might use this alone instead of layering a moisturizer on top. It has not irritated my skin at all. My skin has been silky soft and there may be a slight difference in both my forehead lines and the lines between my eyes, but I will continue using the sample to see if there are more noticeable effects.

author: KJM
body: I've been using this for a couple weeks now and I feel like I can see a difference in my smile lines and crows feet. My skin feels smoother and about a week into using it I noticed my make up didn't crease as much as it was before I started using it. I would definitely recommend this for someone who is trying to plump up areas on their face that tends to crease throughout the day!

author: Beckie
body: This formula was so light I never felt it on my face. I noticed wrinkles softening within a week. My confidence soared and I felt better almost immediately.

author: Tired Mama
body: I tried only a sample of this product for 10 days. I was excited to try a serum that had Retinoid, Hyaluronic Acid & Peptides. It promises several results from the studies done in a short amount of time. In the time that I used the product, I saw moisturizing & some plumping. I'm interested in using the product longer to see if it continues to come through on the fine lines and wrinkles. I like Clinique products & will be considering a purchase of the Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum.

author: Cyndi
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is absolutely amazing! I have tried several high end creams and this one is by the best! The appearance of wrinkles was softening within a week. Definitely try! You won't be disappointed!

author: AniJoe
header: I would buy it to see results in long terms
body: I really like that it doesn't give you that oily look on your face and it's not messy. I did see a small difference in my wrinkles, my face feels smoother and tight, Love the idea of it being oil & fragrance free.

author: saxy169
body: After all the sun and summer my skin has had it! This seem to give my skin a new feel and it looked soooo much better!!! I will buying this from now one!!!

author: Debbie S.
body: Every product says it will help wrinkles look better. This one actually does it. I noticed a difference after two uses, the skin under my eyes is firmer, smoother, and looks better. I was honestly shocked! This is a great product and I would buy it in a second.

author: Atka
body: I have tried the serum but it has not worked for me. It makes my skin tight and uncomfortable. I've used it for a week hoping it was just a temporary feeling, but it happened everytime I put it on. I 've been using Estee Lauder brand for years, and I think I'm gonna stick to it, it works better for me. I'm sure it provides great benefits for some other people, cause not everyone is created equal.

author: Love
body: This serum really does a good job at helping with wrinkles. I am amazed. I still have wrinkles but they are not as bad. I'm going to buy a bottle as soon as I finish this one.

author: queen de
body: This product seemed to be extremely effective at helping with wrinkles. I plan to buy some in the near future.

author: Quiltmawmaw
body: It feels good when you put it on and it seems to have a visible affect after a few days.

author: Punky
body: I wasn't absolutely sure how many stars to rate Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum because I didn't dislike it but I also did not like it enough to want to buy it. I only got to try on the product a handful of times before this review and maybe if I had used the product for a longer period of time it might be a little different. I might have seen more results but I didn't notice any changes.   First time using the product it has no smell which is nice, other products I've used have odd smells and this was event free and you could not tell it was on your face after applying. It didn't have a weird texture or feel cakey at all, very light. I didn't notice any fine lines get any better or disappear but again I did not use the product long enough to notice the long term results.  I did not like that you shouldn't go in the direct sun after applying, it's Summer and who's not going to go out in the sun during the day so that was also a negative to me.  I really like products that have some SPF in them because I'm older (early 40's) and I'm trying to now protect my skin vs. when I was younger and did not think of wrinkles and could care how long I tanned for.  I did not dislike the product I just wouldn't buy it personally and am glad I got to try it to determine that before I spent the money to buy.  I'm going to continue using the the remaining product I received and if I notice any changes I'll share my results if anything has changed.  I've tried a few products because I'm having issues with keeping my skin hydrated and I've got a few wrinkles and who wants to grow old and look it! I guess the question is would I buy this product and the answer is yes I probably would have to try it but would I recommend after using?!? No, I would not recommend. I say that because it didn't work for me. I didn't notice any changes, and I don't like that you should avoid sunlight after applying. But we all don't have the same skin types either and what didn't work for me might work for you.

author: Bpgill8
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is a game changer. I saw results immediately and it keeps getting better. My fine lines are smoother. Overall my face feels and looks great!

author: Jo
body: I used this for two weeks, every day, morning and night. I do not see any difference in the wrinkles around my eyes or lips, but my skin is definitely softer. I like that there is no Oder when I use this product. I think the package is very hard to read, very tiny writing. I am hoping to see improvement of the wrinkles within the next few weeks.

author: Missy
body: I love the way it makes my skin look and feel.  I could start to see a difference.  I would definitely recommend it to family and friends.

author: Me
body: The products seems to be working so far.

author: Carmelpug
body: I love this Serum because it works. After using it for a week I definitely saw a difference with my forehead lines. It also helped with my marionette lines. This is a winning serum!

author: Adk
body:
It seems to work..smooth not greasy.
Lines seem to be fading..i wish i was given a bigger sample to see if it works better and better.

author: Natasha0408
body: I am in love with my new Clinique repaired wrinkles serum! It is better than any other products I ve tried. And I have tried a lot! This one is very lightweight, quickly absorbed to skin, leave skin so smooth and feel like porcelain. It's really good!

author: Theresa
body: I'm still using the Clinique smart clinical repair. I love the feel of my face after using it. My fine lines are less visible.

author: KelseyS
body: This has made my skin really smooth and moisturized.  I haven't noticed any improvement in fine lines yet but I've only been using it for 2  weeks.

author: Chrissy
body: I have fallen in love with this serum...its so smooth and makes my skin radiant and beautiful....no residue and completely showed my lines improved in one week.

author: SavvySaverMomma
body: I received a free sample as part of a promotion. And I haven't used it long enough to be able to say if it works or not. What I can say is that it doesn't make my oily skin feel oily at all. Absorbs easily and has no scent.

author: Calm mom
body: I like this serum! I like that it is non-greasy, odorless and very light. It's refreshing. I haven't noticed any major results so far but I'll continue using it. I'll recommend this product.

author: Litta3
body:
I've been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for 8 days. I had wrinkle/crease on my forehead that has almost fully disappeared after a week. I forgot to apply one night and the crease seemed to start to sneak up on me again. I have not used the serum long enough to know if it keeps the wrinkles away but I will continue to use it since I see a difference when I apply it. 
I Started to use on my smile/frown wrinkles & hope it works as well as it did on my forehead. 

The product feels light & absorbs into skin quickly without the greasy look. My skin has not broken out since using the product which is an added bonus.

author: CinB
body: Very good product, very good quality! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

author: Ang
body: From the minute I began using this product I was impressed! It's very light + airy, not at all greasy and goes on smoothly. It dries within seconds and feels very light on my skin. Within a week or so I could feel a difference in my skin and I look brighter and more refreshed.

author: Ananu
body: This Clinique Serum feels like silk. I love the way my skin feels after using this product. After getting the sample I purchased a bottle and I'm already seeing a difference around my eyes. The lines are not as noticable.

author: Kimarino
body: I really like this new serum.  It's creamy and you can feel it coat your skin.  You still need moisturizer.  When first using it I noticed areas where it was making my skin dry, but the more you use, it it stops doing that.  Makes me feel like I'm taking care of my skin.

author: Lyn
body: I really liked this serum.it was very easy to use and I do see my wrinkles a little diminished

author: Jungle Barbie
body: This serum provided my skin with moisture but I was looking for more. I have combination skin but a lot of m face is dryer. I would recommend the product  for my skin, I like more moisture.

author: Arron_U
body: With only using this product for about a week so far, I can already see and feel results. I have experienced notable smoothing and plumping of the skin around my eyes and can't wait to see what it does long term.  It's definitely shown more results in this short time than other products have produced in weeks.  The texture is great, it feels luxurious as you apply it,  and you can almost feel it refreshing and replenishing your skin.  I would certainly recommend this to anyone looking for wrinkle reducing product.

author: TRose
body: I was excited to try this as I've never tried a wrinkle serum before. I think I'm in denial about wrinkles. I have some anger wrinkles. I love how easy it absorbed and didn't feel greasy. I feel it made my forehead appear smoother. I feel it has also helped with the texture of my skin. I'm excited to continue to use.

author: jenn4joy
body: I've been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair for two week and I can't believe the difference! The fine lines under and around my eyes look significantly smoother. I've also been seeing a difference between my eyes and the corners of my mouth. Many coworkers and friends have even noticed!

author: Annieb435
body: I have enjoyed trying out the sample! I have found this product to be moisturizing yet not greasy at all. There's no overpowering scent which is also a plus. My skin is not irritated and looks hydrated and soft.

author: Haplass
body: The cream is smooth to the touch and helps reduce lines.

author: Ajerrick
body: I received a sample of the Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum and used it for 5 days so far and it helped my skin to look smoother and soft, it have an instant radiance, it helped to soften my lines underneath my eyes I have to continue the use of this product to make my lines disappear.overall great product.

author: Nale
body: I have used Clinique products for years. I use a daily moisturizer from Clinique but had never used wrinkle correcting serum. I was excited to try this serum because as I get older I notice fine wrinkles and "flaws" that I used not to have. I've used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a few weeks now and so far I'm really impressed with it. It goes on silky smooth, absorbs nicely and isn't greasy. My skin feels softer and I've noticed a slight improvement in those fine lines. I'm sure once I use it longer I'll notice more benefits from it. It's a product I can definitely see myself continuing using on a daily basis.

author: Snobear916
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body:
Clinique is a very trusted brand that I use daily since 2013, I wanted to see about if this would make my facial skin a little smoother and healthier.  It has been about a little over a week now of twice a day, and I am not noticing any difference as of yet. I will continue to use for a full month and then see if there is any difference.

The good points that I have noticed was my face is a bit cleaner looking, smaller pores and less oily, but only by a tiny bit.

As far as any cons, I have none as of yet, but I believe that things takes time to notice and its not a instant magic potion.

author: Alice8615
header: Great product at a great price!
body:
Scent is faint, keeps my skin feeling so supple, firm, moisturized and smooth. Big part of my nightly and day skincare routine. Have seen amazing results.

definately going to be buying more. My skin feels  looks brighter. Love it.

author: NeeTeen
body: Amaing performance by this product, loved the way it helped clear the lines & wrinkles starting with the 1st application itself. no side effects and smooths skin so well.

author: Bradlow
header: Love how it makes my skin feel
body: I just added this to my routine and I noticed a difference in my skin hydration immediately. Feels wonderful on my skin. Absorbs quickly. Leaves me with a nice glow.

author: Tina
body: loved this product. the disappearance of wrinkles was noticed immediately. has a great feel and no smell.has a smoothly glide than similar products. I would recommend to friends and family.

author: Bonbon
body: I've only been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a couple weeks but I do notice a difference in my fine lines.  There hasn't been much change in the deeper lines but that is to be expected. The consistency is nice, it blends in well and absorbs nicely. I would definitely continue using this.

author: Laurel
body: I love the feel and how it's working amazing on my skin

author: Wildi42
body: Best thing ever for the skin. I completely see the difference on my face, love it. Leave my face soft , smooth, fresh, a see the difference on my wrinkles. Definitely recommend it to anyone, I will buy for my skin routine.

author: Lambee76
body: I absolutely love this stuff. I noticed a huge improvement in the texture of my akin within a week. It goes on super smooth with no horrible smell. Sinks into my skin effortlessly and you dont need alot of product so a little goes along way. Excited to see how my skin will be a month from now. Will be added to my daily beauty routine

author: linanunez
body: The clinique smart clinical serum, is great i have been using the serum and i feel my skin softer and looking better in general

author: BLC
body: Easy to use and not greasy. I can already see a difference around my eyes where the serum has hydrated and reduced wrinkles

author: Murvemom
body: This product is amazing! I've been using this on my face for over a week & I already notice less wrinkles. My son feels great after I use it. It's light weight and non greasy.

author: Shanburn
body: I absolutely love this Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum. It definitely leaves my skin soft and rejuvenated and it comes from a quality company.

author: Baseball mom
header: Light weight but does heavy lifting
body: This serum goes on light and smooth. It doesn't feel greasy yet leaves my skin feel moisturized.  It soakes in quickly so I can use and immediately move into my makeup routine. Within just a few days I could see a difference in how my skin looks.  I spend a lot of time in the sun at my son's baseball games and a good serum is key in my skincare routine.

author: Crystal
body: I absolutely love this Clinique line. I have tried other products before and haven't seen favorable results like I have with this one. After one week of use I noticed decrease in wrinkles around my eyes and the 11 wrinkle between my eyebrows. I have already had people comment on my skin! I would highly recommend this to anyone.

author: Meryl
body:
Received a sample to test. 
Goes on smoothly - isn't heavy at all. I noticed some smoothing of fine lines with consistent use.

author: Jennym
body: So glad I got to try this serum.  In just a few days my skin looked great and was much smoother.  I will definitely be purchasing this serum again and recommending to friends!

author: Crafty Mom
body: I was really suprised how my skin felt soft and not greasy in the areas I used the product. And after a couple of week of using on my crow and forhead wrinkles were consideredably less visible. I will continue to use this product in the future.

author: donnajoe29
body: Clinique is an amazing brand and this wrinkle serum far exceeded my expectations. I noticed a remarkable difference in my skin tone within days of trying this serum.

author: Gric81
body: I used this product and recommend it because it goes on light and absorbs quickly into the skin.

author: SharBear
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I loved this helped with lines and wrinkles visible in a week also have damaged skin and it even helped out with that,

author: Shay
body: I absolutely LOVE this stuff! I use it every morning when I wake up and every night before going to sleep. It makes my face so much smoother and easier to put my make-up on. It's like magic!

author: Tf
body: I was not 100% sure that this product would work and that you would actually see results. I gave Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle serum a try and boy I am happy that I did.  I am happy with the results. My wrinkles are less noticable and my face looks younger. I am very happy with this product and the results. I would recommend that you give it and see for your self.

author: Goomdawg
body: I love this product! Keeps my skin moisturized and makes my skin visibly smooth. Great addition to my skin care routine in my 40s.

author: Jodie
body: My skin felt fantastic with this. Although i haven't used it very long I like the results so far.

author: Lana
header: Didn't see any of the promised improvements
body: The description sounded very promising. I used it for over 10 days, morning and night, as instructed, and didn't see any difference. The sample was also very tiny, much smaller than others I've gotten through this program so maybe with a full-size bottle, it would have been different. The skin does feel good after application though

author: Chrissy P
body: I was pretty excited to try this product from Clinique! Did not really notice much of a difference even using 2x a day as directed. Super bummed.

author: Jkcdeals
body: Amazing it really works instant firmness and results !!

author: Rdw68
body: Oh my goodness, I can definitely tell a difference!  I received this as a free sample from bzzagent and I just love the way it feels on my skin and the results I am seeing!

author: Sassyasiwannab
body: My skin feels much smoother since using this product. I think I actually look a few years younger as well. Plus my skin feels super hydrated. Thank you

author: Budo
body: This serum is truly silky smooth. Not only did it not feel greasy, it didn't make my face shiny like other face products can. I'm sure with more time there would be even more if an improvement in my wrinkles, but my skin does feel much smoother.

author: emar1980
body: I tired this as a sample because I have wrinkles that I want to remove/hide.  And after trying this for about a week I noticed my wrinkles on my forehead are not as visible this seems to work and I say give it a shot.

author: Wifey
header: Clinique never fails to amaze me.
body: My Husband asked me why I looked different. He said I looked younger and seemed happier. I showed him the wrinkle correcting serum sample and he told me he will pick some up after work. The way he looks at me now has really brought us closer together. Thank you Clinique!

author: Blueberry
body: I like this repair wrinke correcting serum. It does help with my skin complexion and brights my skin

author: Larry
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: It was the best product I have ever used.  I noticed a visible difference after the third day I used Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

author: Dréa
body: I really like this product! It does exactly what it says- reduces and repairs fine wrinkles. I used it for about 2 weeks & definitely saw a difference in my crows feet and tiny lines around my mouth! 10/10 would recommend!

author: Superchoon
body: Reduced puffy under eye skin

author: Kelly
header: A serum that does it all!
body: As a busy mom of 5, I don't have the time to layer my serums, moisturizers and primers. (Or the money!).  First time I used this product I was absolutely satisfied with the results. It did it all!  Moisturized, smoothed out wrinkles and primed my skin!  No foundation needed!  Yay!!  Great product.

author: KIM
body: Absorbs nicely and doesn't just sit on top of the skin. Seems to work as intended.

author: Shana
header: Clinque Smart Clinical Repair is Sensational!
body: This Serum goes on smoothly, smells nice, soaks into your skin well & leaves you will a silky smoothy feel to your face. I will definitely use it again!!!

author: Ivey G
body: Okay so I love skincare and anything that helps my fine lines is a must in my skincare routine. I love the Clinique Clinical Repair Serum because it moisturizes and hydrates my under eye area. I haven't notice a huge difference in fine lines but if I had a larger size product I could definitely use more to see a difference. Overall my skin is soft and under eye area is hydrated.

author: AudTX79
body: This serum was great! It felt so nice going on my face and I could see the results. The sample size only allowed a small amount of uses, but I really enjoyed it!

author: Ally
body: This was really nice. It was well absorbed by my skin, didn't feel sticky, and was fine layered with other products. It made my skin look brighter and more even-toned.

author: Kristina
body: I have been using this product for a while now and am extremely satisfied. This is the best product I've used in a while. I saw results with in a few days of using. By owning the product I am able to use it every day like I do now. I would definitely own and am going to recommend this to my family and friends. Thank you for the opportunity to test it out.

author: Wquinn
body: Great product with light to no scent. I could feel an amazing softeners and smoothness in my skin in a matter of a couple days.

author: starjessica04
body: Received this sample in  the mail. I wanted to use this product for at least a week before giving a review.  After I first used this product I was so happy with how lightweight it was and didn't feel heavy on my skin at all. I did notice a slight difference on the lines around my eyes after using it for about 1 week. They appeared to be slightly faded.  I also noticed the fine lines around my mouth had faded considerably. The slight scent was not overpowering and didn't last. The product dried fast and left my skin so soft and smooth.  LOVE LOVE LOVE! Highly recommend.

author: Elli722
body: Great Clinique product. This serum corrects wrinkle appearance.

author: mish
body: While I do not exclusively use Clinique products, Clinique is one of my favorite brands. I absolutely love this product. It has no scent, glides on smoothly and absorbs instantly. Most importantly, the results are instant. Every time I apply it, I am like a child watching intently for the magic to happen. My fine lines shrink and become almost invisible and my While, my nasolabial folds are not well defined, they get smoothed out by this serum as well.

author: maneo33
body: I used the wrinkle serum for about a week and I can totally see results.   I apply nightly before bed and I wake up in the morning refreshed and feeling like a new person.   I can't recommend this product enough!!

author: Stacie
body: This product is great!! I love how it smooths my skin and makes it feel baby soft!! I live the clean feeling it has. I would def buy this product again and I would highly recommend it

author: Lacey
body: I think the Clinique smart clinical repair serum. I just love this serum. Right away I noticed my skin was hydrated and super soft. Toward the end of this 7 day trial I noticed that my skin looked brighter and felt soft and  smoother. I will be buying this product my next shopping trip. I love this serum, compared to my other cream you can tell this on is superior. There's no doubt in my mind. THANKS Bzz agent!!!

author: Whizper
header: Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum
body: I used this product twice and had an allergic reaction so i discontinued use of the product.

author: Cathymdl
body: This is a definite keeper in my face regime! I love how smooth it goes on and a little goes along way. I love the way it makes my skin feel and I have even  begun to notice a difference in my skin after just using this wonderful product for 1 week! I can't wait to see the results over time!

author: SeattleMom
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum has a light, pleasant scent. The serum isn't greasy at all and is easily absorbed into my skin. I did feel that my skin was a bit more hydrated, but I didn't see any changes in my forehead wrinkles after using the product for a while. I would buy it and try it again for a bit longer to see if I see any positive changes there. Overall, I liked the product and feel there was some benefit to my skin after using it.

author: Jen
body: In love with this Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum. This diminished the appearance of my wrinkles. My fairly rejuvenated and pump. This is definitely magic in a bottle. You will love this. I highly recommend it.

author: SYRbabe
body: I love Clinique products, they are a quality brand that bring noticeable results and this wrinkle correcting serum is a great product. I don't suffer from wrinkles so I used this serum on my forehead on my expression lines. After a good wash and toner I applied this serum. It's unscented and a little goes a long way. Right off the bat I noticed the lines filling out and know with time and consistent use those lines will get better. I recommend this serum.

author: Mike76
body: The Clinique smart clinical reaper serum is very nice. It targets your wrinkles. It hydrates your fine lines and wrinkles. It helps to support your collagen as well in the face. This product definitely made a good difference in my face wrinkles. I would highly recommend giving this product a try!

author: charchar30
header: Promising but too soon to tell
body: I really love serums and have quite a few that I integrate into my skincare routine, so I was quite excited to try this one! The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum feels wonderful when I apply it to my skin and it seems to absorb quite well and evenly. I did receive a sample size to test from Influenster and for what I've been able to see so far with the small amount I have to try has been promising. I haven't seen a huge transformation by any means, but my skin does feel softer and smoother and seems like the overall texture has improved some as well.

author: Krista
body: I tend to enjoy all Clinique products and this Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum didn't let me down. My eyes look bright and fresh. No more old lady wrinkles!

author: DanielleB
body: This is a wonderful product! My skin looks so wonderful! I like the way it makes my skin feel !

author: Roxybe
body: This product helped me reduce wrinkles to the point where they are nowhere to be seen. For small problem areas this is great! I love it.

author: Tonilynn
body: I was lucky enough to try Cliniques Smart clinical repair serum and so far I like the results. After using for 2 weeks now I noticed how well my skin is hydrated and fine lines are filling in.I love how the consistency is light and semi thick so it stays on my finger till application. There is no scent to this serum and wish I could use it longer as the results after 4 weeks seem amazing.

author: Terri
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is amazing. I couldn't believe that after a week I could tell such a difference. My fine lines and wrinkles have improved so much. My face feels and looks smoother than it has in years.

author: KKWong
body: Tried this product thinking wow another cream. It's soft and smooth on my skin. I used it for a week and my skin is definitely softer.

author: Rene
body: I was very impressed with Clinique Smart wrinkle serum. I started using this product 10 days ago and have already ordered a larger size. The serum is very light weight and it made my fine lines smaller. I didn't notice it at first but within 5 days I could tell it started to make some of the wrinkles appear smaller and the smallest ones go away. I am impressed.

author: Rhonda
body: I have only used it a couple of times so far but my face feels so soft and hydrated afterwards.

author: Marissa
body: This serum made my skin feel and look so soft and gave me a youthful glow. I haven't noticed much difference in my fine lines or wrinkles but I'm sure with longer time of use it would help. Would definitely recommend.

author: TinaBell1976
header: I love this wrinkle correcting serum
body: I am in love with this clinic smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum. I think it's one of the best wrinkle correcting serums I've ever used I like how it makes your wrinkles go away and it takes the black under your eyes away I love how it is just a very wonderful product and I'm loving how my 10 days looks

author: HypnoBill
body: I have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for just over a week. In just one week, I have noticed my crows' feet are less conspicuous. In addition, it does not burn my skin or cause any reddening. I have used similar products, but none worked within a week. I will definitely purchase more Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I have already recommended Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum to several friends and family.

author: Kristymichelle1
body: I have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum nightly for two weeks.  I have several areas of concern regarding my facial wrinkles.  Mainly crows feet,  under my eyes and around my lips. The serum is a nice nongreasy light consistency with no smell, which I prefer for my face products since I have very sensetive skin. The product soaks in quickly but leaves my skin feeling nice and moisturized. Now let's get to the radio issue here.  My wrinkles! I have a very deep one in my upper lip that has reduced by about 50% in the past two weeks after starting to use this product! Ah-Mazing! I can't wait to see what continued long term use of this product will do to me,  but I am excited to find out! Cheers to Clinique for coming out with a product that really does help combat the signs of aging!

author: Kathy
body: I was impressed with this product. I noticed difference right away all the fine lines around my eyes and forehead were not visible at all.

author: Beachlove
header: Clinique Age Rewind in a Bottle
body: I have been using this product for a week now and I can already a difference in the texture of my skin. My wrinkles are still there but the Clinique Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is helping to reduce the appearance. I apply this twice a day and it doesn't dry my skin. After using this product a few times my makeup looks so much better.  I would definitely buy this product again. I will be recommending this product to anyone I know that wants to reduce the look of wrinkles.

author: AprilT
body: It came In a small tube so I only got maybe two applications in. Left my skin super soft. Wish I would of gotten a bigger tube so I could try it for longer.

author: Jenk73005
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum works very well.  I was having a hard time finding a new wrinkle correcting cream. I finally found it.

author: varrington35
body: I have always been a fan of Clinique and their product lines, and Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is no exception. It lives up to its predecessors and perhaps even exceeds them in many ways. One thing I love about  Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is that unlike many other serums, it doesn't leave the skin feeling sticky after application. It absorbs and disappears into the skin. I also like that a little goes a long way. So I feel like I am getting the luxury feel at an affordable price, another thing I love about Clinique. After my first use I woke and my skin felt soft and supple, which was fabulous. After a week of use I noticed when I applied makeup it didn't seem to settle into my fine lines and make my skin look as crepey as it had before. I also love that it doesn't have a strong smell and it feels light after application.  I will continue to use Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum and would recommend it to anyone looking to defy the effects time that inevitably show themselves in our skin. Clinique continues to knock it out of the park with Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. Give it a try. You won't be disappointed.

author: AMY
body: I absolutely fell in the with this product. I love the texture because it was creamy, and when applied to my face it didn't leave a sticky or tacky feeling. It absorbed into the skin pretty quickly. The only thing for me was that I don't wrinkles but i do have fine lines. I can tell the difference. will definitely purchase this.

author: anne
body: I just have to be honest that this is the best serum that I ever used. Athough you just gave a very small tube but I can see the results after using it for 1 week. I wish to buy this for myself in the future but unfortunately I cannot afford it. I am very grateful for the opportunity. I will definitely recommend this to my friends. Thanks.

author: Jamie41
body: It's been only 1 week since I started using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum and my skin is more smooth already. It actually stays hydrated ALL day as it softens and smooths out dry lines. I definitely recommend this product ! it's worth giving it a try. you can't go wrong

author: caseyh41
body: It's been only 1 week since I started using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum and my skin is more hydrated and smoother already. It stays hydrated ALL day as it softens dry lines. I definitely recommend this product ! it's worth giving it a try. you can't go wrong

author: Resa101
body: I definitely recommend this to everyone. This product work great and I got lots of compliments. This reduced my wrinkles and my skin looks younger that I could imagine!!

author: Tammy
body:
I tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I used it in the morning and before bed. I could see the change in my face the first time . My skin looked brighter, smoother, more hydrated. 
Then after a few days I saw the fine lines disappear.  I have never ever had such fast results. This is a MUST have!

author: Meranda M
body: I love the texture and consistency of this serum. It blends instantly into my skin and doesn't leave a sticky tight feeling behind. I'm loving it so far!

author: Kuianm
body: I have alot of fine lines and crows feet. This made them less noticable. I just ran out and got more... love this stuff

author: Christyb523
body: I've been using day and night before Clinique moisturizer and I can definitely tell a difference in the areas that wrinkle! Definitely a reduction in fine lines and wrinkles. Yes I would recommend

author: Pam
body: I notice immediately the fine lines on my upper lip and around my eyes looked diminished. This goes on nice and smooth and leaves nothing behind. I use under my moisturizer day and night.

author: xshason
body: The Clinique smart clinical repair, goes on very easily. It does not have any fragrance which makes it good for sensitive skin end it has been allergy , Dermatologist tested.It works I think it would work better for an extended length of time. It hydrates my skin and pumps out the fine lines end it helps with a collagen .

author: Will
body: I have been using this serum for about a week now. It feels light on your skin and does not feel oily. I have noticed results around my eyes and mostly under my eyes. It has helped reduce some of the bagginess I have accumulated over the years. I will continue to use this serum for sure as I have already seen great results after just one week!

author: Drew
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum is MAGIC!!!
body: I have tried many products in an attempt to correct under-eye bagginess and smile lines beside the eyes.  Yes, aging affects men's skin too... believe it or not!  This serum ACTUALLY works!  I couldn't believe it!!!  I tried it with hopes of a good benefit but after trying so many other products that simply didn't give the desired results, I was shocked to realize this product actually worked!  And, without drying out my skin and without causing overly oily skin as a result!  This product is worth trying if nothing else works or you are even looking for more positive results than you are already experiencing.  I give this product a 12 on a 1-10 scale!  I would DEFINITELY buy this product and HAVE recommended it to family, friends, and the world!  When all else fails, this product steps up and does EXACTLY what it is supposed to do!!!  #sponsored #MIRCALEproduct #itACTUALLYworks

author: Jen C
body: I really like this product! It is very hydrating and feels refreshing on my skin. I saw a difference in my skin after using this product - it feels younger and rejuvenated.

author: Raven0320
body: Great product to get rid of fine lines, I don't have wrinkles just yet so can't speak on that.  I used consistently and noticed a decrease in the lines around my mouth area.

author: Leah
body: I really like the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum.  I love the soft feel that it has as I apply it to my face.  It is not heavy at all and it also doesn't make my skin feel greasy.

author: Dayna
body: I loved the sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum.  My face felt great upon application, very smooth and refreshed.  I felt the small lines we significantly reduced by using this product.  I would recommend this product to others and plan to get myself a full size bottle as well.

author: Baby1976
body: I have been using this product for 2 weeks. My skin is softer and smooth. Product goes on smoothly and does not leave a residue

author: Maluna
body: I got this Clinique sample to try out.  I love the Clinique brand.  This one feels nice on the skin and absorbs quickly.  It makes my lines look less visible.   I'll keep using.

author: Shibahill
header: Smoothed my wrinkles in no time!
body: I was hesitant at first because it came in such a small size. But once I started using it, I was very happy with it! It spread evenly, dried quickly and soon people were asking what I did to look so good! Everyone thinks I am a lot younger than 62. I told them it was this new Clinique product, which I plan on purchasing when I am done with the sample I was sent!

author: Limarie
body: I have only been using for about a week and already seeing them fade. I am looking forward to seeing more improvement

author: Nc2bkneaded
body: This really works! I used it around my eyes and on my fine lines around my lips and it seemed to really soften the lines well! I would definitely purchase this and highly recommend it!

author: Suzyq1978
body: I loved that the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum did not feeling sticky or greasy and that it did not level and odor but, this product did not help reduce my wrinkles on my forehead like I expected it to.

author: Dneill
body: I have very dry skin and use moisturizers that are very hydrating. I used the serum under my moisturizer and after about a week of using it morning and night, my skin became dry and rough-feeling. I didn't notice any difference in wrinkles. The serum is very thin, so when I put it on my finger, it slid off by the time my finger got to my face. I had to be quick. I would not recommend this product.

author: Kristen H
body: I really enjoyed trying the clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum! It was easy to apply and had a smooth finish. It didn't leave a sticky feeling like other brands I've tried. I will definitely purchase this product to add to my current skin care routine. I've already recommended it to several friends and family members!

author: JoJo
body: I have deep wrinkles on my forehead, comes from raising my eyebrows a lot. I tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum every morning and every evening. My wrinkles are not as deep as before and I love how easy it is to put the serum on. It is not goopy or thin. It has a perfect balance that makes it easy to put on and rub over my forehead.

author: Rhea
body: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is an innovative formula that helps repair lines and wrinkles in three ways: hydrating to plump up fine lines, resurfaces to help minimize the appearance of wrinkles, and helps support natural collagen in the skin, easy to apply as it is a Gel that makes the skin feel hydrated, supple and plump and is for all skin types from the appearance of the first signs of aging.

author: MelanieC
body: Been using the product for 7 days and have noticed an increase in overall moisture/hydration and more supple.

author: Mar
body: No what I exactly hope for

author: Fabo
body: Love that I can finally use something that doesn't break me out! Sensitive enough to not irritate my skin, but powerful enough to show results!

author: Susan
body: Been using for a few days now and can see a difference in my wrinkle areas. Very gentle and not a hard product.

author: Christina
body: I liked the consistency and fragrance of this serum. It feels good in the skin, not too thick of a feeling. I would recommend this but would have to try it on a longer basis to determine long term positivity.

author: Yhw
body: I love this product when I applied it to my face these past weeks so much! It's soft and so smooth plus I feel the changes on my face and I will continue applying it hoping that this will remain as good as I feel it is now.

author: ShannaJayne
body: I received a of Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum to try in exchange for my honest review.  I've been using the product for about a week.  My first impression of this serum is that it has no fragrance, which is great for people who have fragrance sensitivities.  I like that it is very lightweight, with it being summer that is nice.  Other than that, unfortunately, I can't say I've noticed any changes in my skin since I started using it.  Granted, it has only been a week, but so far no visible changes.

author: Crucan can
body: I loved the smart clinical repair, it leaves my skin soft and smooth, my wrinkles are less visible, I immediately felt the difference. I have bought other products and they do not work in the same way, I will definitely buy it and highly recommend it, I loved it from the beginning

author: MarciV
body: I have been using my new Clinique Smart Clinical repair Wrinkle correcting serum for few weeks and I'm a pleasantly surprised. This correcting serum is very light and easy to apply- no smell. My forehead lines looks much smoother and visible. I have been watching my sun spots, getting lighter. I will definitely recommend to everyone. I can't wait to see more results.

author: Renee
body: Smoothing for even fine and thick lines alike this product gets the job done. Not a harsh product and as labeled Smart handles moisture issues too

author: Dede
body: So I got a sample size which is only good for so many uses. However I did like how it felt on my skin. It wasn't in my opinion super hydrating but it did hydrate my dry skin! I haven't noticed any difference on my skin yet just because I haven't used it long enough! It felt similar to other serums I have tried however once it dries on the skin it does feel a bit tacky but once you put a moisturizer over top it feels really nice. I'm glad to have it and I think it's nice. I'm over 40 and I'm starting to experience fine lines. Need more of this  to know if it changes!

author: BamaMom
body: I received Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum as a trial sample free from BzzAgent. I have used the product as directed for five morning and four evening applications. The product suggests using for a month for better conclusive results but due to review urgency I will give my opinion. The serum i actually working. Does not feel too heavy or oily. No bad chemical smells. Hydrates therefore correcting fine wrinkles and helps to smooth around eye area. I will continue using the product given and will be referring it to others while doing so.

author: Robin
header: Wow, perfect wrinkle serum I can use everyday!
body: Finally, I have found a wrinkle serum that I can use every day that won't dry out my skin and leave it red.  I have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for abut 2 weeks and I can already see the difference in my skin's health.  I've used this twice a day and I could tell from the get-go that this was a great product because my skin felt moisturized and calm instead of red and dry like with other wrinkle serums.  I have noticed some subtle differences in the fine lines around my eyes and mouth with just 2 weeks of use. I can't wait to see how my skin will look after continued use.  Also, I want to note this is truly a fragrance-free product. No smell whatsoever!!  I was lucky enough to receive this product as a free sample to try out.

author: ron
body: i never tried this product before now for about a week i 've been applying this serum and honestly i some improvements some winkles seem to disappear probably need to use longer

author: Sonya
body: After only 4 days of use, I feel that my eyes are refreshed.

author: Lindsay
body: I love this!!! I saw results from day one!

author: Wormstiz
body:
I Really like this product! What I like about this serum is that I have very large pores & this truly does minimize them plus it also feels so good on my face. Effective, lightweight enough to use under makeup! 
it's a miracle product

author: Kristin
body: I have a few wrinkle lines on my forehead. After using this product for a week I have seen a slight improvement. The lines have smoothed out a little bit,  just enough to where I can notice. The serum is easy to apply, doesn't irritate my skin and has no unpleasant scent. I will keep using this product in the hopes of seeing the wrinkles on my forehead smooth out completely.

author: Tiffanyx4
body: I'm 44 years old and have been using this for a week and I love it! I pat it on before bed and I can already see a difference!

author: Aidelyn
body: This serum applies smoothly on your skin, without making your skin flaky.  My biggest issues with other serums is that after they dry it feels globby or flaky on the skin.  The Clinique wrinkle correcting serum goes on smooth without leave any residue behind.  I have a favorite new product.

author: Brandy
body: Such a great product I've since bought the full size very moisturizing feels great on the skin

author: Atrimper
body:
Received a sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum in exchange for a honest review. Really enjoyed using this sample as I'm searching for a new 'age-defying' product. Didn't notice results right away but after using for 10 days I have noticed a difference. My teeny lines above my lips were less noticeable. My pores got smaller & I noticed my skin tone looking healthier. Another benefit I was very glad for, it kept my face matte~ no shiny spots. That's a big win in my book! Would really like to purchase & continue using in my beauty routine but living month to month as is, blah blah.
Would definitely recommend to others.

author: Loralynn
body: For a few years now I've had fine line and wrinkles and I have used everything but it never helped until I used Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum that repairs, resurfaces and replumps your skin , I just use twice a day morning and evening . Because it boost my natural collagen and smooths with potent retinoid and hydrates with hyaluronic acid it has repaired , resurfaced and replumped my skin making my fine dry lines and wrinkles go away and it's so noticeable that my sister ask me if I had work done on my face . No other product has ever done such a wonderful job I highly recommend.

author: Yvilla363
body: This serum was super hydrating for my skin.  It absorbed quickly, scent was not strong I have yet to see improvement in wrinkles,  yet! I will definitely keep using this serum though!

author: Babs
header: Great product to help with those fine lines.
body: I'm at the age where i notice when things get a little wrinkly and my skin seems to lack elasticity. I tried this product a several  days ago and I was very impressed by the quick results. I did see an improvement in my skin and the fine lines. Another think I really like is that it doesn't seem bad and seems to absorb really well-no  sticky after feeling or like there something on my skin.

author: Missi
body: I love it, I have always loved Clinique products, I used for a few days now and already notice a difference!! #Clinique

author: Torre527
body: This wrinkle cream is fast working and smooth and non greasy. It goes on light and really works quickly and smells great

author: kooltt
body: So far, I've only been using the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a little over a week. I've been using day and night as directed for 9 days, and so far I haven't seen any changes. The fine lines on my forehead are not less visible. My skin is however hydrated. Maybe with more time, I'll start to see notable changes.

author: Teresa C
header: Helped with the wrinkles on my forehead
body: I received my sample and used it for 7 days before submitting my review, and I can say that I was not surprised by how well it worked. I use Clinique products regularly and have enjoyed the majority of the products I've tried. The Smart Clinical Repair wrinkle correcting serum really help to softened the lines on my forehead,  which is my most troubling area. The wrinkles are deeper then I would like to admit, but in the 7 days I've used this product I can tell the difference in the depth and the smoothness of the wrinkles! The few wrinkles that I have around my eyes have also begin to smooth out and my skin looks and feels more hydrated. I will definitely be buying the full size product!!

author: Janene
body: I used my sample several times and noticed that it was pleasant smelling and easy to use. I felt it added moisture to my skin along with plumping the fine lines around my eyes. I would recommend this product and plan to continue using.

author: Ronny
body: Helped my skin look smoother and wrinkle free. Satisfied!

author: vince35805
body: great product for all your wrinkles .young or  old faces

author: icey
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I love this serum. You're face feels smooth, soft, and subtle. You look instantly radiant. Definitely a must have. I will be buying this on a regular.

author: Leannc
body: This stuff works good.non greasy goes on well and moisturizes your face.i noticed a difference like the third day.it helped with my wrinkles under my eyes

author: Amers
body:
I tried the sample sent to me for about 2 weeks, and I did not notice a difference in my skin. I thought maybe it would help my little laugh lines but really didn't do anything. 
The instructions said yo use with Clinique moisturizer, and I did not do that. I used my regular moisturizer, so maybe that is why I did not notice a different. 
The positive is that my skin was very soft and it did jot irritate my skin like some other wrinkle products do.

author: Carli
body: I'm amazed by this product. I was so shocked when I was picked. I hate fine lines and since using this product. I have received compliment after compliment.. thanks.

author: MarkT
body: I tried this on my upper part of my face, attempting to correct some of the wrinkling up there and was surprised how easy my skin absorbed this product. After a couple of days, I noticed less pitting and it seems to have started to work. A little goes a long way in attempting to restore some vitality to the skin, and replump. I'd recommend the smaller size first to see if your skin reacts to it, and you could be in for a surprise at its efficacy!

author: Mommy2theGs
body: I absolutely love this product. The results were noticeable quicker than any other product I've used and left my skin feeling silky soft. I was very impressed and will definitely continue using this!

author: 4flbeachbums
body: I have been using this wrinkle repair cream for several weeks now, and I am starting to see great results. I use it every day  (2X daily)to help improve the discoloration I typically get throughout the summer. I have had consistent results each time when I use it.
