All the sun spot faded and even some old acne scars also faded the first time that I used it. I have fair skin and it works really well. I have some friends who have a more olive complexion who said that it works very well for them, so it may may just work on all skin types. It always left my skin feeling smooth and hydrated. I highly highly recommend this product!

author: raregypsysoul
body: The clinique smart clinical repair does what it says and I saw results much faster than than expected.  My skin is smoother, more radiant & far less visible wrinkles than before I started using it, such a shame the sample is so small.

author: Colbica
body: Clinique has done it again.  Great quality product with real results!

author: Roxy
body: This is very easy to apply and just a dab is all you need. I am starting to see my fine lines fade which is wonderful! I would highly recommend.

author: Heidi
body: I have been using 10 days. I do not see a difference yet, and I don't expect to at this point. The product goes on nicely, absorbs quickly and doesn't feel sticky.  I will continue to use and hope to see some changes.

author: TeeTee44
body: I started getting wrinkles around my eye area and forehead so let's just say the worry set in, I wasn't ready to tackle wrinkles. I didn't know what to buy or what works so I went through a ton of products and when I received the Clinique Smart Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum in the mail, it changed everything. I dumped all my other non working products in the trash and only use this product and brand. Within a week I noticed more than a slight difference between before and after. The lines around my eyes decreased significantly after 2 weeks, the skin seemed to just smooth out these are the kind of results I was needing and wanting. I'm highly recommending this product!!! I already purchased more.

author: PJsmom
body: Product is very lightweight. I started to notice a difference after about a week of using regularly. Looking forward to seeing how well it continues to work

author: Fgoins7360
body: I love this product. I have never used Clinique products before because I thought that it was way too expensive I probably would receive the same results from a cheaper brand. But I was wrong I love the way this serum feels and works. I will be buying this product

author: Jenn
body: I am always skeptical of products like this, but wow! I am loving this. My skin felt so soft from day one and looked smoother after about a week of use. I also noticed mu skin just looked brighter and healthier. I will for sure be continuing to buy this when this runs out.

author: sylsly
body: This product is simply fantastic - I could actually see results within a week of using

author: Katie K
header: Great Results & Skin Feels and Looks Beautiful
body:
First you should know that I have tried SO many serums to help with the aging process and this is honestly one of the best I have tried.  I have noticed my skin looking healthier and feeling amaZing.  My make up goes over it well and some of the fine wrinkles have minimized after about 10 days.  I am excited to keep seeing the results of this product and will definitely keep this as my must have serum!
I have told all my friends and family - this is the anti-aging serum to buy- hands down

author: Bananabakere
body: Clinique wrinkle repair serum Worked wonders for my skin texture and appearance. I believe I need to use this product longer to see the full potential of the wrinkle reducers. However, my skin surface felt refreshed, plump, and beautiful. This product does not have an overbearing texture or smell. It smoothed over my skin evenly.

author: Jodilynn88
body: This is a wonderful product. Made my skin look and feel beautiful. I will buy more of and continue to use it

author: Greeneyedmystry
body: This is something I wouldn't have thought I needed, until I tried it and saw a difference! So thank you for the chance!!

author: Aceey
body: This serum seems like it could have good results although I didn't have enough to use over a long enough period of time to come to a real opinion but it was easy to use and depending on price I would probably buy more.

author: TK
body: Always been a skeptic with wrinkle removers because none of really work. When I got this free sample and applied it around my eyes nightly I started noticing a difference after three days. Don't give up after a day or two of use. Keep it going and you'll see a difference.

author: Shahid09
body: For me personally, this serum works great! I noticed over the past few days of using it, a huge difference in the appearance of my skin. I look more awake, brighter and even toned. It has reduced my fine lines and actually helped with my under eye bags. It is a wonderful product. Does a better job than most higher priced facial serums.

author: Slobbygoo
body: I am obsessed with the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum I received from Bzz Agent to sample and review! It actually really works at making my skin look younger and repairing some of my fine lines! I've only been using it for about 2 weeks now, and already, I have seen results! It can be quite pricey, but for these results, it's well worth it!!

author: Yvonski
body: I received and tried Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum from bzz agent and must say it did reduce the fine lines I had in my forehead.  The product was easy to use, quick drying and did not dry out my skin.  Although it did well on my forehead, the lines under my eyes did not reduce as much, but I am hoping with continued use I will see more reduction there.

author: Bunny41
body: It absorbs well, feels good going on and after, but haven't really noticed any visible changes yet, so waiting it out. And it smells nice

author: Sette
body: I am not seeing changes in my wrinkles, brown spots, large pores, etc. after two weeks of use. The serum is definitely soft and "full-bodied," but I truly can't see the improvements. I remain optimistic though.

author: CarlyM
body:
I have been using Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for approximately one week and I am extremely impressed with the results so far. The serum applies easily ( a little goes a long way) and absorbed extremely well. After application my skin is soft and does not feel greasy (other well known brands have caused me issues with this previously), I  have combination skin and I feel that this serum actually balances my skin, meaning that the dry areas feel well moisturized,, while my oily areas do not feel greasy, just soft and well moisturized. There is no noticeable scent after application (there seems to be a light scent when applying).
Regarding wrinkle treatment, I do not feel that I have used the product long enough to say if it has any long term benefits, but I will say that I have noticed that fine lines that I have, appear softer and the only two deep wrinkles that I have (frown lines on my forehead) seem less noticeable after application. This is a product that I will continue to use as I love the results so far and I truly believe that with continued use, the benefits of use will just get better.
This is definitely a product that i would recommend to others!

author: kmtmbt2005
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is fantastic. I love that it doesn't have a scent, so no need to worry about perfumey scent. I love that it goes on smooth and the skin soaks it up pretty fast. It really seems to hydrate my facial skin and helps with making wrinkles less defining. I just love how it makes my skin seem smoother and younger looking.

author: Rslee1
body: Clinique has always been a company I trust for great skin products, but I hadn't ever tried their serums. I usually use Clinique face washes and makeup. The smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum goes on smoothly and feels light. It doesn't clog pores and has chemical exfoliants that aren't too harsh. It's a product I'll definitely purchase in the future and would recommend it to anyone for fine lines.

author: Tam1112
body: Pro: Soothing going on. Fine lines diminished. Scent is undetectable. Con: To small of a sample.

author: Melissa
body:
I have tried this sample serum for a few days now. The formula is nice and light and feels so soft going on.  I think it's very hydrating and I have dry skin! I am loving it.  I have tried many many serums.  I have decided that once 
my current serum is used up I will be purchasing this product.  Still using this and loving the results!

author: Raj
body:
2 d ago
I have used this product for about 15 days. I have an area on my forehead that I've been watching. It is smoothing it out noticibly. It is also smoothing out some fine lines around my eyes. I can't wait to see what prolonged use will do.

author: Stormz will never last
body: This serum has a great texture. It absorbs in the skin quickly and does not leave the skin feeling sticky. No fragrance and it does not irritate my skin. My skin looks hydrated and supple.

author: Christine Hillhouse
body: I just love this product. I tried it and my skin is soft and brighter and my wrinkles are also lighter to wear they are harder to see

author: Hopefully disappointed
body: I have used the product for a few weeks but have seen no difference in my skin. I love the brand so I am going to try it for a few more weeks.

author: Mom23g
body: From the amount of time i got to test this product i found it to feel refreshing. It had a fresh smell and felt nice on the skin. The label says it takes a few weeks to see results and seeing as i didn't have weeks to try it i can't get a full review as to results. But i will continue to use and see how it goes

author: Rudy
header: Clinique smart clinical wrinkle repair serum
body: I really like it this serum , I will be making a purchase soon ,  and refer it to family and friends ,  Thank you

author: Net
body: Thiught it was a good product but its just not for me. I am glad that i got to try a sample  of it but it juat left my face feeling oily.

author: NubianGoddess
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I have been looking for something that would erase the three bold lines on my forehead. I know that Clinique is a well-known brand that produces quality products, and I was not disappointed with Clinique's Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. I used these two times per day, and I could see a small reduction in my lines. I would definitely buy this product, but I would want a whole kit so that I could get a complete Clinique experience.

author: Dani
body: I've been using this product for about a week and I am in love.  I have always been a fan with Clinique products in general and this is one more to add to the list.  The product went on light and didn't  clog my pores like some other products that I have used in the past.

author: sue
body: this serum is wonderful.  Makes my eye bags dissappear.... so grateful for this serum

author: LisaC
header: Not what I had hoped for…
body:
I had high hopes for this product, as I've been an avid fan of Clinique for many years. The product claims to fight fine lines and wrinkles, but I didn't see any difference after using it for 10 days. It did however seem to diminish sun spots and smooth out the appearance of my skin, so it wasn't a complete fail. On the flip side, I do love the way it feels on my skin. It's not greasy at all, and it leaves my skin smooth. 
I don't think I'd purchase this because it is rather costly to use when it doesn't even stand up to the claims of diminishing fine lines. Sure my skin feels great, but I've used other products that are less expensive and I get the same results.

author: Chelle
body: I started using the wrinkle cream about two weeks ago and I can already see a difference. I know my skin feels softer around my eyes, which is an amazing bonus!  I can't wait to see how much more it smooths out my wrinkles!!

author: 1jodster
header: Easy to use and I see results
body: Clinique | Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum is wonderful. Hydrates my skin and resurfaces to minimize the look of my wrinkles. Not greasy absorbs great into my skin and my skin looks wonderful afterwards. I recommend this for anyone.

author: Workingmomof2
body: I recently received a sample of this product to try about two weeks ago. I was excited to try it because I have wrinkles on my forehead / in between my eyes (otherwise known as the 11s.) I found this product to be very lightweight and non-greasy and it had no scent.  It caused no irritation and I used it both day & night. After only 2 weeks I can start to see my wrinkles not look so deep. I look forward to continuing to use this product to see the long term results!

author: Trish
body:
First-

I'd like to say I love how it goes on smooth. Makes my skin feel silky and tight around the eyes.

Where as other products are watery and done feel as concentrated.

The benefits of owning this product is, a little goes a long way even in my sample bottle. Its long lasting and makes me feel younger and more awake. My skin feels supple too

I definitely intend to purchase this in the future and it shall be my go to. I highly recommend this to friends, family and other acquaintances. A must.

author: Shannon50
body: After using the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum I noticed a difference  in a few days. My skin looks brighter and healthier

author: DMG
body: This cream  is phenomenal!!! Makes my skin feel softer, takes away the small wrinkles I had and feels smooth

author: MissMayhem
body:
I received a sample of the repair serum for review.  The application is easy, glides on the skin, and felt immediate hydration.  It doesn't have a scent, and I have very sensitive skin and did not experience a reaction at all.  I noticed that the redness on my face was reduced with this product.

I used the product for a week, and didn't see noticeable changes but would like to try it for a month or longer to see if my crows feet are reduced.

author: Amyr
body: Very soft, and gentle creamy non greasy, and more importantly works nicely. I have tried Clinique Serum on one side for three days and there is a very distinct difference compared to my other side. Nice to see something that works.

author: Legs1277
body: I received a  sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum from buzz agent and i really liked this serum — it went in easily, had a great light fragrance and my skin looked better (plumper, and clearer) after a few weeks using this at night. I will definitely be purchasing this!

author: cindyrickfan
body: I love this product. I received a free sample from BzzAgent. It is amazing. It doesnt dry out my face like the other wrinkle product I was using. And, the moisture lasts a long time, and my aging skin appreciates that. It feels really smooth and refreshing when I put it on. And I can see that the overall tone of my skin looks better too. I can see me using this long term since I will always have a need to moisturize and this doesnt dry out my skin. And I need it especially under my eyes, I am getting a bunch of fine line wrinkles there. It really made my skin feel healthier. I am converted!

author: Tony
body: Some of the lighter wrinkles are actually gone, as for the bigger or deeper wrinkles didn't seem to do a lot or anything noticeable to those. Maybe using for a longer period of time it might show a difference. I am glad I tried the product.

author: Shruti
body: This is a great product. It repairs fine wrinkles and dullness. I highly recommend this to everyone.

author: QnVi
body: I really like this serum. I've only been using it for a few days, but my skin is much softer in the morning and my fine lines seem to be fading.

author: Sharonmos
body: I love this cream!! I applied it as soon as I received it . After about 4 days I could see a difference !! Fine lines were less noticable ! I highly recommend it !

author: Chris
body: Non greasy. Good feeling

author: Vsilva903
body: Hello everyone, I recently was sent Clinique smart Clinical repair in the mail via BzzAgent to try and review. Well I do have to say I have been using this product for the last 5 days and I can see a significant difference in the texture of my face , it does what it says. Hydrating moistureizing formal tgat significantly reduces wrinkles. My skin is brighter , hydrated and it's definitely reducing those fine lines. I truly recommend you try this product.

author: Sadiemae6
body: I recieved this Complimentary sample for Clinicial smart repair serum, I tried this serum everyday to see if there would be a difference, and to my surprise i started to see signs of aging dimishing lines and even the uneven skin tone which very much excited me, because of the peel extract, mullbury root, rice, and cucumber ect this serum is doing what it was created to do.Turn Back The Clock i  am definitely recommending this 100% , and i am adding this fabulous serum to my daily regimen , and after trying this product so will you.

author: B Renduh
body: I am usually skeptical about products like this but I put in the time to really see if it works and I REALLY notice a difference. I am going to keep using it to see further results. I'm glad I gave it a chance!

author: Ashley
header: A little goes a long way
body: I received this as a sample. I've been looking for a good moisturizer——one that doesn't leave your skin feeling greasy. This is light and has excellent coverage. I might actually purchase the full size.

author: AlaStokes
body: I think it is a good product.  I believe if you use it everyday and keep using it you will definitely reduce wrinkles you get.

author: DizzyD
body: So I've only had a chance to use this free sample for a couple weeks but already am loving it. Typically anything with a retinoid of any type even in its most mildest form will cause some type of reaction for me - be it dryness peeling or red bumps around my chin. This product caused none of that. I used it at night 3-4x/week. I feel it has softened my laugh lines and the subtle lines around my chin/mouth that I've gotten from sleeping on my stomach & age. I will continue to use this and because it's a form of retinol that my skin actually enjoys, I will purchase when this tube runs out.

author: Jenn
body: I love how my skin around my eyes look less creased and smooth

author: DonnaB41553
body: This Clinique wrinkle repair serum is genius!! I have told everyone I know about it because it's a 2onderful product!

author: LMIG
body: This serum went on smooth and light and kept skin feeling fresh and firm all day!

author: Babygurl
body: This product in the short time I have used it has made a big difference in the way my face looks, my face is smoother with less wrinkles and my face feels so soft!

author: Sara
body: I have only been using this product for a few weeks now, but I don't know if my skin has ever been smoother.  I haven't yet noticed a change in the lines around my eyes yet, but I immediately noticed a more even complexion.

author: Nichole G
body: I am so happy with this product. I genuinely feel like it reduced my eye wrinkles. I've been using it every for about a week.

author: SDGal
body: During the timeframe I was given to review this product, I saw absolutely no changes or improvements in my skin. This product has an unpleasant, slimy texture, does not absorb well into the skin, and leaves a greasy layer on the skin that glops up makeup. I would not recommend this product.

author: Happy tester
body: I have been using Clinque smart clinical repair as a free sample i recived from BzzAgent. Is light weight and dont make you fell oily. I have seen a reduction of fine line wrinkles and softer skin. I have notice the dryness aroumd my mouth smother and softer.

author: Toto
body: It works really for firming and moisturizing my skin! I would recommend this product for anyone looking for a wrinkle repair product!

author: FawnH
body: I have dry mature skin, and moisture is the key to a youthful texture and tone to ones skin. I believe in serums as I've used them for years. I highly recommend this serum! Allow the product to be absorbed entirely (even dry) THEN apply a light moisturizer made for your skin type. I would be willing to bet that this serum doesn't work well with SPF, so if you're protecting in the day try using this serum at night under other serums and night creams without SPF. Used correctly you too can get some pretty amazing results!

author: Wrinkle king
body: Using this is was a bit skeptical. But it is amazing. It works as stated and my wife loves this. She will be buying more as it does such an amazing job.

author: Jenny
body: I use this in the morning and the night I was pleasantly surprised Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum worked as well as it did it made my skin so smooth and I would totally buy this on my own thank you so much for the sample

author: Local PTC
body: Product was easy to apply and to use have already purchased additional product

author: Cocoa0004
body: I really like this product. It has a gel like feel to it when applied. I use it a couple times a week at night. It has a little sticky feel to it but it did not leave any stains on my pillow. Noticed a slight difference in my skin after the first use. My skin appeared to be more moisturized and "plumber". I use it as directed, I also used Sunscreen and stayed out of direct sunlight after use and the week following usage. I think this one might be a permanent addition to my skin routine.

author: beautyecologist
body: the texture of this is really creamy and I like how it absorbs into my skin. i have combination skin and this does not leave my skin feeling greasy at all. it does not irritate my skin and leaves my skin feeling smooth and soft.

author: Little LiLi
body: Awesomeness in a little bottle. This is a fabulous job of making your skin feel like it's being improved I wish I had a larger bottle which I may just have to go out and purchase so I could see longer lasting

author: Susan
body: I was surprised with how fast I notice some Changes and I love it .

author: Toris1
body: It was  smooth, non greasy and easy to apply.

author: Mag
body: This product was wonderful it was not greasy and made my face so smooth. I absolutely will be buying this again😍. And will be recommending this product to all my friends and family.

author: Kristy
body: I like this texture.  It's not too thick like some other products I've used.  I don't feel like it's cakey. I'd buy this product!!!

author: kimber0917
body: After using this for a few days, my skin felt very smooth.  The texture seemed to soften up a bit.  I cannot speak for the appearance of wrinkles as it has only been a few days.  They do look less pronounced which I assume is from the Hyaluronic Acid which plumps up the skin nicely.

author: Kakika
body: I only received a very small sample so I could only try this for a few nights but it does seem to have a silky texture and be absorbed well into the skin

author: MP
header: Hard to Tell, but Can't Hurt
body: Wrinkle repair products are always hard to rate since nothing works overnight. If it did, we would all know about it! This product goes on my skin nicely, didn't irritate my skin, is clear, and barely had a smell. These are all factors that I appreciate. I'll continue to use it to hope to see results.

author: Dizzy
body: This product actually works. I had bags under my eyes and after using it for two weeks I noticed there actually getting better.

author: Jessy
body: I had high hopes for the clinique smart clinical repair serum. Especially since the price is a little steep. But sadly I saw no change after using the product for a full week. It did help to moisture the problematic dry patches but did nothing to smooth out wrinkles. I'm really glad I received the free sample because I would have been upset if I paid full price and had no results.

author: Kellie
body: I've tried many serums to try and reduce and limit wrinkles and this product is my favorite,after a week I can see some results and it makes my face so smooth.I received this product to review.

author: Renee
body: This product made my skin look and feel absolutely amazing! It game my skin a youthful glow after only one use!

author: MsJ.
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair - Great Product!
body: I used the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair cream twice a day for 5 days. After the first use I noticed a difference in my skin appearance the next day. My skin felt tighter and the wrinkles seemed to fade. By the end of the 5 days, my skin was more vibrant and toned. Love this product!

author: Ncholder
body: I have used this product for a week, the difference is  slight.  It may work better over a longer time.  My fine lines and wrinkles are still there.

author: Ally
body: I love this serum! I love how light it is. It's refreshing. I noticed results in just a few days!! It's also nice there's no odor, not that I noticed. I would absolutely recommend this for anyone wanting to reverse wrinkles.

author: Ally
body: I love this serum! I love how light it is. It's refreshing. I noticed results in just a few days!! It's also nice there's no odor, not that I noticed. I would absolutely recommend this for anyone wanting to reverse wrinkles.

author: edjona10
body: Very creamy. No scent--which I appreciate. Gorgeous shimmery formula. My skin did glow after the first use (that shimmer I tell ya!). After a few uses my skin does look better. Most skincare products over promise and under perform. But I think Clinique Smart Clinical Repair might just be a keeper!

author: mookie
body: I tried a sample portion of this serum and really like it! The smell is clean and light, it does not leave any greasy feeling, and the ingredients are gentle on my sensitive skin. I noticed some plumping action after several days of use that made some forehead lines less noticeable. I anticipate with continued use it will be even better.

author: Jarka
body: I did used this serum AM and PM on the clean face. I do like that is NOT overly scented, just right amount of very subtle scent. It goes very easily on the skin. The skin feels more hydrated and plump. No really wrinkle eraser but great serum

author: Brand O
body: The Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum has a lightweight texture that absorbs instantly into my skin without leaving a greasy or sticky feel. I been using this serum am and pm for a while now and I have noticed my fine lines to be less visible, and my skin to be hydrated and plump. This serum is a great addition to my skincare routine.

author: Shep626
body: I have used every morning since receiving the product.  I use before applying makeup because it doesn't leave any residue and doesn't affect the makeup.  I have noticed a subtle softening around my eyes.

author: Yoly
body: Enjoyed using this product for almost 2 weeks. The application is smooth and doesn't feel heavy on your face .

author: Teamtims
body: Just tried my free Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum and I must say I was completely surprised. I can slowly see a difference in the skin under and around my eyes.  I tend to have the most noticeable wrinkles in that area so I was pleased to see a change.  I will definitely be purchasing this product.

author: Sarahkay80
header: Nice little Serum to reduce lines
body: I received and used a sample of Clinique smart clinical repair for the past week in order to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Though there hasn't been much of a noticeable difference, I feel with continued use this shows promise. Goes on nicely and doesn't feel tight or greasy. I like it.

author: angy
body: I love this serum. After the first three days, my skin was noticeably smoother and the lines looked less deep. After the first week, people started commenting. It's a silky, non-greasy formula that feels fresh and natural on your skin.

author: Steph
body: This product made my skin so soft. I tanned over the years and this is by far the best product I've used for my face. I have noticed a difference with my fine lines. Great product

author: Carmen
body: excellent product I really liked it you can visibly notice the difference I recommend it

author: Jojo
body: I had the great opportunity to sample Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum. It took my night time face routine to a whole nother level. First off, you only need a nickle sized amount of the serum to achieve full coverage. Basically, a little dab will do you. The serum went on smooth and had a silky texture to it. I noticed after the first use I noticed my face looked more bright and alive. After continued use I noticed that my skin looked tighter and smoother. I can only imagine the results that I would see in the future!  I have used a lot of serums, and this is up there with the best of them. I would highly recommend this product to friends and family.

author: TEEMAMA26
body: This Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum has truly made my skin look and feel so much better I absolutely love this serum.

author: Patty_cakes
body: I received the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum free from bzzz agent in exchange for a review. This product had left my skin feeling very soft, and is super light weight. I really like the way it feels going on my skin. It is not greasy feeling and I love that! I have only been using it about a week, so I have not seen any wrinkle repair but so far I'm loving the smoothness of my face.

author: Saucy28
body: I tried Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, and was pleasantly pleased. I noticed my fine wrinkles were somewhat fading!

author: Lu
body: This serum is fabulous.  Goes on smooth and helps with wrinkles.

author: Kimber
body: The Clinique smart clinical repair makes my skin feel so soft. It makes my skin feel tight. I don't have to use a lot. It

author: Esie
body: First time using repair wrinkle correcting serum & so far it feels great. I have only used it a few days & feel as if it's making a difference in the fine lines around the eyes.

author: Kenya
body: I've been using this everyday for 5 days and I already see a difference. My skin feels smooth. My crows feet are less visible by a lot.

author: Jay
body: Haven't been using it too long but so far love the results!  Feels nice!!

author: Yorleny
body: I love it how I live my face very smooth Berry sauce I put it on nine time it's amazing

author: Allison
body: This is very lightweight and smooth. There is not a greasy feeling at all. A little bit goes a long way. Does not leave a film.

author: Suedee
body: This serum was amazing. Used it before bedtime woke up with my skin so clear and clean. I wish it was more to try for the long run. I will definitely tell my family and friends.

author: Jackie
body: I like the Clinique Serum. It is very smooth going on, yet it is not greasy. I did not really notice any improvement in my wrinkles. However, I am still using the product.

author: ridethewind95
body:
I really love Clinique products and this one made my skin very smooth. It is of better quality than other products of similar nature. I use it before bed and feel the difference in the morning.  
Some benefits are smoother, softer skin around the eyes and cheek bones. And it has a faintly pleasant scent.  I would absolutely buy this product! 
I would recommend this product without a doubt.  It works very well, and with continued use I think it will be even better results. The only one thing that might limit my use (which is not anyone's fault, per se; it's just how things are) is cost. I'm on a pretty tight budget in general which makes me all the more grateful to have received this sample.

author: kabbyb
body: I am fairly new to wrinkle serums and anti-wrinkle products - I had the luxury of not worrying about wrinkles and fine lines throughout my 30s, but as I enter my 40s I noticed a rapid change to the skin on my neck and forehead.  Presented with the opportunity to try this product, it was a good test as I wasn't already using another lotion or serum to combat my issues.  After applying for only a few consecutive days, I immediately noticed the immensely hydrated feeling on my skin.  Close to immediate appearance change on my neck.  This serum is fragrance free and is not greasy at all - keeps a matte finish all day.  Felt very light after applying and experienced no reactions.  Will continue to use!

author: JennJayBee
body:
There are so many serums on the market today, one really needs to bring something special to the game to really stand out. This one is good, and I have no complaints. It's hydrating and contains retinoids (which you'd want in a wrinkle reducing serum). It's lightweight and spreads evenly. A little goes a long way. While I don't currently have any long term results to observe and report, I was able to finish the sample sent to me in a few days and observe the results of using it morning and night. In the short term it did leave my skin smoother and more hydrated, as you'd expect from a serum containing these products. At 42, I wouldn't say I have a ton of wrinkles, but I was able notice the plumping effect. There were no issues with irritation or clogged pores to report.

There are so many other very similar serums on the market to compare it to, though, as hyaluronic acid and retinoids are established ingredients known to work. There's nothing new or groundbreaking going on here, but this should come as close to doing what it says on the tin as is possible for a topical product. There's no wow factor or feeling that I need to rush out and buy it before finishing my current bottle of serum, but for what it is, it's a good product.

author: Bob R
header: Excellent in removing dark circles and fine lines
body: I loved this. It took about a week to see some results. It removed the dark circles and fine lines around my eyes. The It actual made my under eyes more supple and firmer.

author: Josepcan
body: This goes on so nicely. Not thick or sticky at all. I absolutely love the smell, can't wait to put it on. I have only been using a few weeks, and I already see of diminishing a little bit. I can't wait to continue to use it and see what is come.

author: Srobi007
body: I was so excited to try this new serum from Clinique! I'm 40 and luckily don't have any deep wrinkles, but definitely have some fine lines that I'd like to improve. This serum, like all Clinique products, is fragrance free; I also didn't notice any natural (just from ingredients) scent to the serum. I only received a sample so it was not enough to tell actual results. The serum itself is pretty thick, not watery. It goes on very easily, but I noticed later I had some product piling. I may have used a little too much. This morning when I woke up, my skin was super smooth, hydrated but not sticky or greasy at all. I'd definitely keep using this to get the full benefits from the great ingredients!

author: STaylor
body: There isn't enough product in the sample to fully try this thoroughly as they say it takes 16 weeks to see full results. However, I did notice an immediate difference in hydration and in very new lines.

author: tooblue
body: It help to reduce fine lines and winkles

author: Fwittman
body: So I got a sample of this Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum and I have been using it for about a week and so far I love. It goes on very smoothly and makes your face feel really smooth. I have very dry skin and when I put this serum on my face stays hydrated. I can tell a little difference in my wrinkles, I don't have too many or to bad, but I do notice they are less visible, which I am very happy with. I can definitely say this, I will go and purchase this. I would recommend this to everybody. If you have dry skin and wrinkles and want to smooth out those wrinkles, I would definitely recommend you purchase this. You won't regret it.

author: Beccat503
header: Moisturize and attack wrinkles at the same time.
body: I have been using this serum for several days now. So far the difference that I've noticed is a distinct difference in my skin's hydration.  The product is  slightly creamy, not thick like a cream and not runny like some other wrinkle products I've tried.  I've been putting it on my face in the mornings and it works well under foundation as well.  Whether or not the wrinkles begin to fade will remain to be seen, but so far this product seems quite promising.

author: Rudyj
body: This product is very efficient, moisturing. I have very dry skin and I needed something to combat the dryness and patches and this product delivered.It makes my skin feel moisturized, hydrated and clean

author: jmplaster
body: This is a great product. I love how light it feels. It's not greasy and you see results after just one application. Highly recommend this product by Clinique and any of their products

author: Kidsmeems
body: I cant give a full review since you are only given a week to submit but so far this is a great product.  It feels wonderful going on. I can say when I use around my lips I get an instant result on lip lines and that is awesome

author: Sara
body: I recieved this product to try in exchange for my honest review.  Clinique smart clinical repair is a wrinkle correcting serum. I personally really appreciate this serum and how soft it leaves my skin. It also has a three-pronged approach to target lines and wrinkles, my aging face loves that. My skin looks well hydrated and plump. It is a very light serum but you can almost feel it working. Has a wonderful scent. Quickly and easily absorbs into my skin.  I will definitely be purchasing this serum and would highly recommend.

author: PDC
body: This serum absorbs well and is not greasy. After one week of use my skin looks refreshed and feels great. Very happy with this new serum. Plus love the glass packaging instead of plastic.

author: Melissa
body: I received this serum to try as I'm 43. I have pretty decent skin but I can tell it is starting to change a bit. . It's dry in places oily in others. So I truly wasn't sure what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised. Clinique did their research on skin. It comes out a white line liquid but when you rub it on your skin, It goes on like satin and does not leave your face oily. Your face is smooth and baby soft all day. when you put your foundation over it, it glides on and actually covers better. The aroma is very light and smells like a Clinique product. I would absolutely buy again and suggest to a friend.

author: Sheryl
body: Product lightweight and not sticky underneath makeup.  No odor or residue.  Didnt see much result first day or two but after that noticed decrease in crows feet and assisting with deep brow lines. Product states takes up to 3 months to see full results, will definitely continue to use as progress is noticeable in the 1-2 weeks since started to use. I recommend!

author: Bhava
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair works wonders!
body: Absolutely love the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair. I've tried many other repair creams with none working until now. This stuff is like magic in a tube. It definitely smooths your face and fades the wrinkles. Highly recommend this stuff if you want your face to look and feel amazing.

author: Valeria 10
body: I'm in my 41's and it's the first time I've  tried a product from Clinique brand, I'm impressed, this goes on so smooth and light on your skin, I really like the difference it feels on my face and the results I see . I use it once a day and I have seen visible noticeable difference a round my fore ahead and eyes . I already recommended to some friends this amazing product. I really planning to buy a full size of this product.

author: Rae
body: I really liked this product.  I use it after washing day and night.  It left my skin felling refreshed and corrected many small lines within a week.  Strongly recommend this product.

author: PuggleMama
body: Overall good product to alleviate skin dryness. Absorbing into skin leaving a non greasy texture.

author: Lori
body: I'm sorry, but, this is not very different from anything else I've used!  It's basically the same, same ingredients and such.  I also, checked out the price, which I would not pay that, for this product!

author: Nell
body: After using this for four days now, I can clearly see a difference in my skin; it's softer to the touch and not as "dry" looking.  The serum goes on light and smooth, and doesn't leave a film or residue feeling.  I'm thrilled with the results.

author: Mcady
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: I received a sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum from BzzAgent.  After using this serum for a week I quickly noticed that lines around my eyes were softer and the deeper lines on my forehead seemed to be less deep.  I love the fact that it is fragrance free and am very anxious to use this product further.  My skin does not feel greasy and it is softer.  I would highly recommend this product to family and friends.

author: Witch666

author: RMCC
body: I received a sample of this to try and wish it was a full size product because I LOVE IT! It firms my skin and appearance of wrinkles. It doesn't leave my face looking greasy, it feels amazing and you can almost feel it working when you put it on! I love it!

author: Angie
body: My skin just soaks up this serum. Feels silky smooth after it's applied. I've just started using it so I can't tell yet it it helps with fine lines & wrinkles.

author: Shopaholic
body: I was very satisfied with this serum. It absorbs easily into your skin without leaving it sticky or greasy feeling. Although I haven't used it for that long, I haven't seen any change in minimizing wrinkles but my skin is noticeably softer and smoother. This serum works well with my moisturizer & foundation. It's definitely a product that I'd recommend and would purchase again.

author: Jorc125
body: In about a week this has pretty much removed my fine lines on my forehead and crow's feet. I'm definitely impressed and surprised by how well this worked and how quickly it worked. I highly recommend to anyone who's on the fence about trying this just do it.

author: JenjenPa
body: I received a free sample to review for #bzzagemt and #clinique. This serum by Clinique feels amazingly lightweight and abdomens quickly into your skin. I did see results very quickly like fine lines being less noticeable after the first couple of uses. I have already recommended it to friends and family members.

author: LaLa Agent
body: I received my same of the Clinique Smart Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum in the mail. I read the directions to see how the product could help me. It felt nice and silky coming out of the bottle. I used it on the places on my face where there are wrinkles. It made the area soft on my face. I hope to see results soon.

author: Cindy
body: Look like it's working really well. Been using it for about a week. See results.

author: DeannaLC
body: I have been using Clinique smart wrinkle repair correcting serum for about a week now and so far I love it !! It has a faint pleasant smell , goes on smoothly and is not very oily . I have noticed my face feels more smoother and the fine lines around my eyes and mouth are starting to be less noticable . It's definitely worth a try .

author: Tetiana
body: Being in my early fifties, I'm obviously concerned about the affects of aging skin. This product has done a great job. I've noticed my skin is smoother, more elastic, dewy and in general more youthful

author: Magdeline
body: The serum it's not greasy.  The serum is super smooth and hydrating. The serum does not meet my face break out. it helps to minimize my fine lines and small wrinkles. Within a few days, I saw a noticeable difference in the lines on my forehead and around my mouth.   This product is hydrating and feels great on my skin once applied.  I definitely recommend this product!

author: GrammyVal
body: This serum worked really well for me!  I recently moved to Texas where it is so dry and this hydrates my face really well.  I love the anti-aging ingredients and can feel it working on my wrinkles!  My skin looks brighter and feels smoother.  I use it twice a day because it's so gentle!  It works better than what I was using before so I've switched for good!

author: Yuca12
body: I started using and immediately hidrates my skin and gimme the brighter looks, becomes less visible

author: Pinkwitch
body: I noticed a marked difference in how my skin felt and looked from the first time I used Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Serum!  After using it for a week, my husband has even noticed the difference in my skin.

author: stephansi8
header: Clinique is not one of the best for nothing
body: When I received a complimentary tube of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair from Bzzagent to test, I was excited because it's a great brand and it didn't disappoint. This was definitely better than other wrinkle creams out there. Some benefits of owning this product is that it helps with wrinkles and makes your skin feel nice and moisturized. I would not hesitate to buy this product because of its quality. I would and have recommended this to my sister, I told her that it works really well and totally worth it.

author: FrannieJo
body: Been using this product for a week so that's why I gave it 4 stars. I haven't noticed enough improvement in my skin as of this moment, but I'm hopeful.

author: Kelly
body: This is the first day that I've tried this serum. I tried a Little tiny bit on my hand first, to see how it would feel and if it would soak into my skin. In which it did within seconds! So after I washed my face, I put it all over my face. It soaked right into my skin, and then I applied my 24 hour makeup. It smoothed over my skin like nothing I've ever felt. I absolutely love it! And I will be purchasing this product! Thank You for letting me try it and review it! This product does everything it states and more!

author: Mark
body: Very happy to have tried Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle serum.  It is goes on  light but makes my skin feel super moistured.  Clinical is safe and easily accessible brand. Very affordable. Would recommend to anyone that is looking to add anti aging products to their beauty routine.

author: Terri S.
body: Soaks in and softens skin allowing my moisturizer to blend more effectively and evenly. My face feels more evenly hydrated. The best serum and the brand supports the effectiveness of their products. I recommend this and will add it to my 2x daily application routine.

author: Melinalara0215
body: I love this serum my skin is super dry but when I use this serum for first time my skin is super smooth

author: AUilocks
body: I received the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for free from Influenster for my honest review.  I tried the product twice a day for ten days.  I went on easy and had almost no smell.  It didn't feel heavy even after putting my moisturizer/sunscreen on in the morning and my moisturizer on after at night.  It did not sting at all (unlike some others I have tried).  At the end of the 10 days, I saw about a 10% reduction on the wrinkles on my forehead and about the same under my eyes.  I will likely keep using this product.

author: pbaby
body: I really liked the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum, it hydrated my face just the right amount and smoothed out the wrinkles as well. It didn't feel sticky or gooey and had a good consistency to it as well.

author: Yolipop56
body: I loved this product it worked fast and my skin feels great and I feel I look younger . Instant results

author: Sophia
body: Bought it for my mom and works fine. No complaints.

author: towawa2001
body: The product works very well on your skin. It gives you a refreshing feeling and the skin smooth and younger in no time. Highly recommended!!!

author: Zosia
body: Clinique Smart Repair Wrinkle Serum goes on very easy and I can feel a slight tightening of my skin and notice the wrinkles around my lips especially disappear. It is a creamy liquid so you have to be careful not to squirt to hard or fast onto fingertips.

author: Tami
body: I have been using this product for almost a week.  It has left my skin soft, the appearance of my fine lines & wrinkles have diminished. I have deep wrinkles on my forehead & the bridge of my nose. They appear softer looking. Compared to the BioTRUST Ageless Glow that I had been using, I would choose Clinique.  Very nice product!

author: Beauty junkie 77
body: I've been using the Clinique serum for the last three nights, and have noticed my skin has been much more hydrated. I am prone to oily skin but this has also calmed and hydrated my skin, making my skin feel unbelievably soft without the oily effect.  Add Bouns: I would definitely recommend this product. I also used it before my primer which makes my primer go on silky smooth.

author: lorigee
body:
I got a sample of this product from buzz agent to try and its more than i expected from a serum. This serum is not like the clear ones, it is a cloudy serum and does an excellent job of improving my face. It is fragrance free and gentle to use on my skin and it really gets the job done! I use it in the morning under my face cream and in the evening under my night cream.
I would definitely by this and recommended it to family and friends.

author: Luciano
body: After my lovely wife slapped me across the face (only kidding!!) when I handed her this wrinkle repair serum, she actually took the product and used it as part of her daily morning routine. She's an avid Clinique fan for many other beauty products, so the name recognition is a primary reason she was open to using it. Having just returned from a week-long beach vacation, right away she noticed a more hydrating feeling on her face/eye areas where she thought would be some target spots for the serum. A few days later, she could see a reduction in the prominence of some lines/wrinkles, but the stress of two children keep them coming back! 😉 Overall, we'll have to see what the long term results end up being, but so far a very satisfying experience for her and she will be adding this to her permanent morning routine.

author: Bth
body: As a guy, I want products that are simple and easy to use and don't take too much time. I'm starting to see fine lines and wrinkles and would like to prevent more while also treating what I have. This serum is very easy to use. Easy to apply and doesn't have a scent which I appreciate.  It absorbs easily and doesn't add any oiliness to my skin. I can employ a moisturizer on top and or a sunscreen and it doesn't pill up.It helps my skin feel refreshed. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to add a serum to their skin care regimen.

author: CC
body: I was skeptical, after trying so many other brands but I must say I'm am impressed, I could feel the hydration from initial application and it lasts all day! By day 2 there were significant reduction of visibility of my fine lines! I think the key is the consistency of the hydration that made my fine lines and crow feet almost invisible! And I must add the glow of my skin and suppleness is amazing! I would definitely buy this product and I highly recommend it! This my honest review and in my own words!

author: Melwa
body: I received this sample size to try. I noticed that the insert that came with it stated you start seeing results in 14 days yet I don't think my sample was big enough to last me 14 days. And the greatest results would be seen after 30 days. Perhaps they would have but I cannot really comment on that as I wasn't given that sample size. It is pleasant smelling, decently moisturizes and that's just about the extend of the benefits I experienced.

author: Johnny V.
body: If you want to heal your skin, and make your skin feel rejuvenated, then this is the product for you.  The wrinkled skin has life breathed back in to it, and feels incredible.

author: Palmerlady
body: I loved my sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum. It does wonders to my skin. It's so much better than other brands I've used. I will definitely be getting myself more of this.

author: pacbaby
body: This is my favorite new tool in my skin-care routine.  My pores love it, my fine lines love it, and, most importantly, it DOES NOT MAKE ME BREAK OUT.  Yes, I'm one of those fantastically challenged women who have to deal with aging and acne simultaneously.  This serum is magic for me!!

author: sjoyfish
body: I use an overall clinique cleanser and light moisturizer; however I wanted something for my aging skin around my eyes and lips.  This product is wonderful as part of my skin care regimen!

author: Warrior13
body: l started using this in the am & pm under my eyes . Ive noticed that my wrinkles are starting to go away . Love it

author: Belle
body: This product works like this t says and the results are impressive. Used it for a week and noticed thin lines around mouth and eyes reduced. Would definitely recommend and will continue to use

author: Molly R
header: Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
body: Love this product. Leaves the face feeling smoother without drying it out. I noticed a difference after I he first day!!!

author: Grandma T.
body: I tried the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum and I really like how soft and silky my face feels afterwards. This is helping with the fine lines and wrinkles, my skin is looking firmer and the sun spots are getting lighter. I recommend this amazing serum.

author: KatieH
body: So I love clinique I used a few of there products and liked them, and seen results but I don't know about this one, I don't know if the sample size is enough to Really give an accurate review. I haven't noticed any changes to my skin, the texture is nice, it glides on smoothly, works well with other products. Now what I don't like about this product, there are about 40 ingredients in this one bottle, and I haven't seen any changes to my skin. Is it worth the price, I don't know, I don't think a sample size is enough time to see wrinkle results.

author: Elieth2000
body: The clinic smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum is a wonder, i have being using it for about a week and i can already see a difference, it is very light weight and easily absorb by the skin, it is not greasy at all but it is hydrating, i follow it up by a thick face cream since i have very dry skin, it a definite addition to every woman daily routine, since in my opinion you should start before getting the wrinkles to keep them away

author: Lucy41
body: Let's just say that I'm obsessed and in love with this Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum. I started seeing very noticeable results in a few days after using it. And it's really made me look and feel 20 years younger. It has honestly changed my life and boosted my self esteem and confidence dramatically. It's reduced my fine lines and the wrinkles under my eyes big time. I don't even barely have dark circles anymore this serum has faded them and there literally almost completely gone. I say about another three days of using this as recommended that my dark circles will be completely gone. And it also gives you a great vibrant glowing shine that makes you look and feel 20 years younger. Also my face feels so soft and smooth and is very very hydrated and not dull and dried out anymore. I can't even see my fine lines and wrinkles after I put my makeup on like I use to  be able to see them plain as day. I'm so very pleased and great fully happy  with this awesome and amazing product. I highly recommend it.

author: Sunny
body: this worked so easily and quickly at diminishing my fine line wrinkles.  its light weight and non greasy.

author: LuLu
body: There's just no comparison with other brands. Not only do I love their perfume but the ingredients in skincare products has always been a factor. I never have to worry about allergies or skin irritation. It's non greasy moisturizers works wonders with my skin type. It helps me with resolving problems with blemishes and dark spots under the eyes. Clinique is the most trusted, high quality skincare essentials I know.

author: Sara
body: Since using this I haven't noticed any difference in the small wrinkle I have by my right eye. The formula is nice and feels good on my skin.

author: Tdircks
body: This goes on smoothly and absorbs nicely. There is no sticky residue on my face or hands. It did make my face break out though. I let it heal and tried again with the same results.

author: DJ
body: I received this as a free sample. Felt really good on skin. Was not sticky or greasy. Skin felt soft and fresh after use. I used at night before bedtime and also tried in the morning before applying makeup. I prefer using this at night considering I use primer before applying foundation.

author: Lovelavender
body: I like how light it feels on the skin. I've been able to see it softening my fine lines between my eyebrows. I'm hoping with continued use it will keep improving even more.

author: Luny
body: The best serum I have tried, I am fascinated I have less than a month using it and I am considering it as my next supplement for a long time my skin is radiant

author: Brandie
body: 🖤 @Clinique was my gateway brand into skincare, and overall it's a great brand. It has some amazing products, but does get overlooked. It wasn't until I started watching YouTube videos, that I found a whole world out there. But, I still have quite a few Holy Grail products that I still rotate in my routine.⭐️ The Clinique Custom Repair Serum has a very thick consistency, and could also be a moisturizer. I do notice my skin feels more hydrated, plump, and smooth. 🤍The serum has helped with my dark spots and redness. I notice this on my fine lines on my forehead. This luxurious serum is said to visibly improve the signs of aging, such as fine lines and wrinkles.🏆It's a great pick-me-up due to sleepless nights, a crazy job, and two screaming toddlers. 💥I usually plaster this on my face in the dead of winter when my skin feels dry and dehydrated. It does have an impressive list of beneficial ingredients such as Grapefruit, Mulberry, Barley, Cucumber, Algae, Plankton, Grape, St. Paul's Wort, Wheat, Glycerin, Rice, Whey, Sunflower, Soybean, and Squalane.✔️ Although it is thicker than all other serums I have tried, it does glide on the skin with ease, and absorbs quickly.💎The product has lasted me longer than I expected it too. ⚜️This could be considered more than enough hydration for individuals with oily skin. Although I do enjoy this product, the serum was on the more expensive side.🌀 #skincare

author: clean skin
body: Clinique | Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum got all my wrinkles out in a few applications. this is a wonderful product and will recommend this to everyone i know. I feel years younger when i look in the mirror now

author: Kinkin
body: I am not happy with the uneven skin tone on my face. Looking for reliable skin care for a long time. After I tried Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum for a week, I was really satisfied with the improvement of the tone. And seems like the serum refined the skin texture  as well. #tredr #sponsored

author: Lovebugz0410
body: This wrinkle correcting serum is very nice and works very well. I have been using it now for a week and I can already see a difference in the wrinkles around my eyes. They are significantly smaller and less defined! It also makes your skin super soft and glowing.

author: Mimi95133
header: Wonderful serum also for sun screening
body: The UV Index can reach very high to extreme levels in CA. Daily sunscreen is a must in the summer time. From now on, I will put this Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum along on the sun protection product. To limit the sun exposure.

author: ape
body: This is the best cream I have ever tried and I have tried quite a few. It made my face feel so good and clean. It also started to work on my fine lines already. My kids notice the difference and I am very please with the result. I have told my friends and I will be buying this product in the near future.

author: Ynele
body: I've already tested several products and this one is definitely the best

author: Cochina
body: I'm normally a little nervous to try anything new with retinol but I was extremely excited to try this product because I've heard great reviews. I was beyond excited with my results and will continue to use this product. Thank you BzzAgent!

author: Totsie28
body:
This product is simply wonderful on all levels.  The consistency, appearance, and feel of this serum are perfect, and it is a product I actually look forward to working with in my beauty routine.  The "scent" is mastered brilliantly, as you notice a sensual, calming aroma, but not enough to be overwhelming or lingering.  It absorbs quickly, spreads easily, and does not require an excess amount to feel like there is full coverage.  I have only been using this product for a couple of weeks, but the results are already visible.  My skin feels smoother, firmer, hydrated, and there is a renewed radiance in my complexion that has caused me to feel confident enough to skip my makeup routine from time to time when leaving the house... something I have not felt comfortable doing in years.  
This serum embodies everything I have wanted and needed in a product of this type!

author: Jess
body:
I love that this has Retinol and Hyaluronic acid so I don't have to use two separate skincare products. My skin is sensitive and usually doesn't do well with any Retinol products I've used in the past ,but Clinique uses a blend of caffeine and algae extract to help minimize irritation. So if you've been looking for a retinol that doesn't irritate you this may be your answer. 

I received a sample size to review so I wasn't able to use as long as I normally would love to try a product out before forming an opinion on a skincare product, but I still feel this is a great product because it didn't irritate my skin, plus it left my skin feeling so soft and plump after using the 1st day. You use in the AM & PM so it went really fast. I still noticed that my skin was more plump and glowing. I love that it's fragrance free,as much as I love fragrance , it's best not to have fragrance in your skincare. I really wish the sample was bigger to see more results,but I still would recommend because of the fact it didn't irritate my skin and I love the way my skin feels and looks after using. I love Clinique and the products I've used in the past has shown results and I will continue to purchase from them. The purple packaging is really nice as well. 
Always use SPF with this product! 
I received this sample for free for my honest review.

author: cathy
body: I was super excited to try this product, after using this for a week, I notice a difference in my face and neck,  my face was so much smoother and there was no heavy feeling, it was not greasy at all,  i did not feel the greasy sticky feeling when you use serum on my neck. I will be telling my family how great this is and I will be buying this again.

author: hjunell1
body: My face felt amazing once I put this product on.  I have used this product around my eyes for the past 7 days.  I have noticed a difference in the fine lines (Smile Lines) around my eyes.  I just love that it is light weight and feels like I have not added anything to my face at all

author: Novagym

author: Bearsmom7
body: I have always loved the Clinique brand, but this smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting serum is simply amazing. I have used it for only one week, and I see a definite difference in my skin. It is very nourishing, and leaves my skin hydrated and supple. There is no greasy feeling, or slimy residue left behind. It absorbs quickly and cleanly. I have used other, more expensive creams and serums with poor results. They show no difference after months of use, and often leave a film behind. I will definitely continue to purchase and use this serum because I can see improvements in my facial appearance already. I have already recommended it to family and friends. This one is a winner!

header: Instant improvement in fine lines on forehead!
body: This serum is amazing! My forehead has deep lines in it and my skin was feeling dry so I put some of the serum on it and just a few minutes later I could feel an improvement! The tight dry sensation had improved and when I looked in the mirror I could see a difference ... the deep lines in my forehead were less pronounced. I love the smooth thick texture of the serum as well. It glides on smoothly and feels luxurious. There is no scent, which is also a plus. I will continue to use this serum.

author: Kelbel

author: Groovy
header: Great addition to my skin care routine
body:
I received a sample of Clinique Smart Clinical Repair serum to try out and after ten days of 2X daily application, I'm quite pleased with it.  My middle-aged skin tends towards dryness, and I have mild rosacea, which can make for a rough texture on my nose, so finding products that treat wrinkles that my skin will both tolerate and absorb can be a challenge.  The Smart Clinical Repair serum has a nice texture, not too heavy and my skin definitely absorbed it well.  My skin was left feeling soft, but not greasy.  My daily sunscreen/moisturizer went on easily over it. I could even see using it as a primer for foundation because it makes my skin feel so smooth.

The serum gives my skin a little bit of reflectiveness, so right away the look of some of my finer lines were minimized, which was a nice instant ego boost.  Ten days in, I do think some of the finer lines look fainter, and the texture of my skin is definitely improved.  I wouldn't say it improves my skin redness, but it's definitely not making it worse, which again, for rosacea skin, is a win.  It's definitely gentle; I haven't had any tingling or stinging.  Overall it's a good product and I look forward to seeing what my skin looks like a month into using it!

header: Lovely formula with no retinol peeling
body: I am always nervous to try a new retinoid because of the reaction it can cause on my skin, so I was happy to see that this product didn't irritate it at all, and the hyaluronic acid made things feel nice and hydrated. I really liked this serum, and would definitely purchase it.

author: @freshfacedove40
body: This product is on the thicker side and somewhat like a jelly texture but melts into the skin after 30 seconds, leaving your skin with the most beautiful glow. I like that it is long-lasting glow my dry skin needs.  I see immediate improvements with my dry skin, it plumps and keeps the redness and irritation at bay for me. It's perfect for aging skin and I will buy the larger size so I can attest to the long term affects of this product.

body: Aside from my love of the purple packaging, I also love how smooth my skin feels immediately after application.  It feels a bit like a high end primer.  It leaves a nice glow to the skin.  Best of all there is no fragrance.  I also did not experience any irritation while using this twice per day for a week.  Initially, I was worried as it states you must wear sunscreen.  I already do this daily but the product I use did not pair well with this product.  I had immediate pilling and flaking.  So I changed brands of sunscreen and had no further issue.  I would recommend this product to anyone looking for something effective but gentle.  I like it enough, I would buy more.
